WeaponFragment_DoubleUP_Common.name: Flame Gold
WeaponFragment_DoubleUP_Common.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.

EquipFragment_DoubleUP_Common.name: Overclocking Chip
EquipFragment_DoubleUP_Common.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

WeaponFragment_DoubleUP_Superpower.name: Masterfully Refined
WeaponFragment_DoubleUP_Superpower.description: Forged with materials from the finest Omnium weaponry recycled and through meticulous craftsmanship, this currency holds worth only known to those with discerning eyes, redeemable for limited weapons.

EquipFragment_DoubleUP_Superpower.name: Entropy Increase Chip
EquipFragment_DoubleUP_Superpower.description: Raw material processed through meticulous procedures for specific chip production, enabling a substantial performance upgrade. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

Likeability_unlock1.name: Upgrade Drive: Aesperia
Likeability_unlock1.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of an Aesperia Simulacrum.

Likeability_unlock2.name: Upgrade Drive: Vera
Likeability_unlock2.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of a Vera Simulacrum.

Likeability_unlock3.name: Upgrade Drive: Domain 9
Likeability_unlock3.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of a Domain 9 Simulacrum.

gift_Likeability_unlock.name: Random Upgrade Drive
gift_Likeability_unlock.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of a Simulacrum.

choose_Likeability_unlock.name: Free Pick Upgrade Drive I
choose_Likeability_unlock.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of a Simulacrum.

Likeability_unlock_show.name: Random Upgrade Drive
Likeability_unlock_show.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of a Simulacrum.

Item_gift_1001.name: Flower bouquet
Item_gift_1001.description: A nicely presented batch of flowers and a prime gift choice, though watch out for those who are allergic to pollen or dislike plants. The flowers are produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_1002.name: Dumbbells
Item_gift_1002.description: An instrument for weight training and mostly used for fitness—except in certain drastic situations... Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1003.name: Nice picture frame
Item_gift_1003.description: Specifically made for safekeeping precious photos, thus built from special materials and difficult to take apart. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_1004.name: Postcard of Aida
Item_gift_1004.description: Shows different landscapes on Aida. Despite Omnium radiation pollution and other adverse conditions, there is still scenery worth preserving. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1005.name: Wool scarf
Item_gift_1005.description: It's supposed to be made of processed wool, but since that is now obsolete, the "wool" is actually a composite material. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1006.name: Custom poker deck
Item_gift_1006.description: No one knows who created this deck, but judging from the rules of play, the maker must have been a very interesting fellow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1007.name: Mini potted plant
Item_gift_1007.description: Miniature potted plant. Please note that the plant is artificial and needs no conventional care. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1008.name: Retro harmonica
Item_gift_1008.description: For playing lovely melodies. It's hard to come by, so only a few people on Aida can actually play one. Nowadays, that's probably limited to the true music aficionados. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1009.name: Paper pinwheel
Item_gift_1009.description: A plain toy that couldn't be more ordinary, but nonetheless has never failed to bring comfort and joy. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1010.name: Snack box
Item_gift_1010.description: Snack box created by Fennie on Astra, containing various irresistible munchies. A very popular gift across all sectors. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1011.name: Moonflower Ornament
Item_gift_1011.description: A model ornament made with the moon flower as a prototype. After conducting an ecological transformation program for some time, the buds of the moon flower were found for the first time on a gobi in Vera.

Item_gift_2001.name: Tool set
Item_gift_2001.description: Designed for practical purposes and is ready to use. May also be applied as spare parts. Receives a big thumbs-up from technicians for its versatility. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2002.name: Chess set
Item_gift_2002.description: A game for two players, though some people actually prefer playing by themselves. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2003.name: Plush toy
Item_gift_2003.description: Kids' favorite plush toy. Adorable with a scent reminiscent of a warm day under the sun. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2004.name: Tailor-made suit
Item_gift_2004.description: Custom-made suit, finer and suaver than the common variety, with accessories to boot. Those with dramatic flair should like it. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2005.name: Vitamin pack
Item_gift_2005.description: Wellness supplement. A necessity for those working too long or too indulged in playing games to have proper meals. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2006.name: Gem necklace
Item_gift_2006.description: How much is this gem necklace worth? Forget all the speculations and just keep this valuable safe! Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2007.name: Cat throw pillow
Item_gift_2007.description: A throw pillow in the shape of a cat. Very relaxing and therapeutic to hold. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2008.name: Coloring book
Item_gift_2008.description: The seller said once all the pages have been colored in, you can trade it in for a brand new one. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2009.name: Meteorite in a bottle
Item_gift_2009.description: Meteorite in a clear bottle. The meteorite seems to be a space rock that's not burned out and some sort of mineral mixture giving off a faint glow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2010.name: Perfume bottle
Item_gift_2010.description: Lovely, elegant glass vial with pleasantly scented liquid inside. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2011.name: Tartarus ornament
Item_gift_2011.description: A miniature figure allegedly takes after the form of Tartarus. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2012.name: New Kalka ornament
Item_gift_2012.description: Receiving a flood of complaints protesting the discontinued production of the old Kalka figure, the makers decided to offer a new version. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2013.name: Mad Dumont figurine
Item_gift_2013.description: Nobody knows when the fad for the Mad Dumont figurine began, except everyone wants one all of a sudden. Produced in Aesperia, Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2014.name: Moonrabbit kit
Item_gift_2014.description: Assembly required. Based on the image of moonrabbit. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2015.name: Spirit Princess figurine
Item_gift_2015.description: Miniature figurine based on Spirit Princess, the smart servant. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2016.name: Mirroria Toy Bricks
Item_gift_2016.description: The Mirroria pocket model has a high level of craftsmanship.

Item_gift_2017.name: Rabbit Throw Pillow
Item_gift_2017.description: A throw pillow in the shape of a rabbit. It's very relaxing and therapeutic to hold it.

Item_gift_2018.name: Inkwell
Item_gift_2018.description: For those who love to consume knowledge. But don't consume it, of course.

Item_gift_2019.name: Small Wooden Sword
Item_gift_2019.description: A handmade accessory by a craftsman with a superb mastery of ancient techniques. It holds some value as a collector's item.
source: Joltville: Purchase from the Geomancy House

Item_gift_2020.name: Broiling Sun Scarf
Item_gift_2020.description: An elegant scarf that brings a lot of warm in winter.

Item_gift_3001.name: New game console
Item_gift_3001.description: New high-end game console, designed by a computer genius. The high production cost has caused its shortage. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3002.name: Snow globe
Item_gift_3002.description: Originated in the Warren Snowfield, it reflects pure driven snow during winter. It's now been remade into a household decoration. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3003.name: Music box
Item_gift_3003.description: A metal music box. Not sure if its previous owner broke it or what, but the pleasant tune has been shut off somehow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3004.name: Silver cookware
Item_gift_3004.description: An expensive-looking complete set of cookware. Supposedly it was owned by a neurotic chef who never let anyone touch these precious tools. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3005.name: Aida comic
Item_gift_3005.description: Depicts the adventures of Tata on Aida in monthly issues. The limited quantity and popularity have led to fights over the comic book every release. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3006.name: Banges Specialty
Item_gift_3006.description: Contains various specialties from Banges, each box a random selection to represent local diversity. Of course, that means you never know exactly what you're going to get. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3007.name: 3d Hykros puzzle
Item_gift_3007.description: A puzzle that's sweeping Hykros. The novel appearance and gameplay are nothing but fun. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3008.name: Warren fossil
Item_gift_3008.description: Ancient remains sealed in ice, discovered in Warren Snowfield. Very rare and highly collectible. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_3009.name: Crown token
Item_gift_3009.description: Limited commemorative coins minted by Crown with a portrait of the mines' owner on the front and a stylized "K" on the back. Collect seven of these babies and get a day off with pay—maybe. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_3010.name: Limited Tata figurine
Item_gift_3010.description: Limited collectible figurine, an Aida comic memorabilia. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3011.name: Metal Alf figurine
Item_gift_3011.description: To fully resemble the original Alf, the makers made this one out of metal. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3012.name: Smarty doll
Item_gift_3012.description: A toy based on the image of Smarty. The makers replaced the artificial plant on its head with a live plant, making it highly collectible. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3013.name: Limited Peanut figurine
Item_gift_3013.description: Very rare miniature figurine with data storage and volume control features. Since it's based on the feline Peanut, it's popular among cat lovers. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3014.name: Void Angel figurine
Item_gift_3014.description: A miniature figurine based on the Void Angel. It's white all over and requires special care to keep spotless. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3015.name: Angela ornament
Item_gift_3015.description: A miniature replica of Angela, the smart servant, that even includes the pair of cute pink wings on her back. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3016.name: Ultimate Warrior Otter
Item_gift_3016.description: Designed for the 40th anniversary of the Ultimate Warrior Battlefield: Ultimate Warrior Battlefield 40 is now available. Buy it now and get limited merchandise of the powerful SSR Otter.

Item_gift_3017.name: School Idol Linnie
Item_gift_3017.description: This is the No.1 best-selling figurine in Mirroria and it strikingly resembles someone familiar at first glance. It's rumored to be based on a popular administrator from Mirroria, although the creator firmly denies these claims.

Item_gift_3018.name: Death Metal
Item_gift_3018.description: The infinite soul shock that spreads out from the deep roar is the music enlightenment for some.

Item_gift_3019.name: Puzzle Blocks
Item_gift_3019.description: A must-have for parties. It's always fun to play games with ingenious friends.

Item_gift_3020.name: Mirroria Travel Guide
Item_gift_3020.description: A digital travel guide for visitors of Mirroria. Funny enough, its author never considered it could become useful someday.

Item_gift_3021.name: Baguenaudier
Item_gift_3021.description: Even if you just can't solve it... you can't smash it apart!

Item_gift_3022.name: Panda Doll
Item_gift_3022.description: A unique panda doll that is said to be the secret mascot of the Pavilion of Literature.

Item_gift_3023.name: Legend of the Sword God
Item_gift_3023.description: A famous Wuxia novel in Domain 9, written by the novelist, Xin Jian. The sword that brings justice to the world.
source: Joltville: Purchase from the Geomancy House

Item_gift_3024.name: Heavenly Palm
Item_gift_3024.description: Young man, you have amazing bone structure. You're a martial arts genius. I'll leave the important responsibility of protecting the peace and justice in Domain 9 to you! I have this book here, Heavenly Palm. The Heavenly Palm is a palm technique beyond the eyes of mortals...
source: Joltville: Purchase from the Geomancy House

Item_gift_3025.name: Agarwood Fan
Item_gift_3025.description: Here comes a draught of fragrance.

Item_gift_3026.name: Ink Pen
Item_gift_3026.description: A specially-crafted fountain pen with ink designed to resist freezing, even in the most frigid conditions.

Item_gift_3027.name: Fur Blanket
Item_gift_3027.description: A blanket made of the fine coat of a rare ferocious beast. It provides excellent protection against the cold.

Item_gift_3028.name: White Tiger Ice Sculpture
Item_gift_3028.description: A carefully carved white tiger ice sculpture that has been specially treated and sealed to keep the ice from melting. It makes a fine gift.

breakthrough_show.name: For augmenting weapons.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chest II

weapon_show_sr.name: Random SR Weapon
weapon_show_sr.description: Possible Rewards: Thunderous Halberd, Staff of Scars, The Terminator, Pummeler, and Nightingale's Feather.

weapon_show_ssr.name: Random SSR Weapon
weapon_show_ssr.description: Possible Rewards: Rosy Edge, Icewind Arrow, Absolute Zero, Scythe of the Crow, Chakram of the Seas, Negating Cube, Dual EM Stars, Thunderblades, Molten Shield V2.

weapon_show_ssr_orange_Balance.name: Random SSR Weapon
weapon_show_ssr_orange_Balance.description: Possible rewards: Chakram of the Seas, Guren Blade, Thunderblades, Dual EM Stars, Venus, Negating Cube, Molten Shield V2, Scythe of the Crow, Icewind Arrow, Absolute Zero, or Rosy Edge.

matrix_show_sr.name: Random SR Matrix Chip
matrix_show_sr.description: Possible Rewards: Robarg: Matrix, Apophis: Matrix, Frost Bot: Matrix, Sobek: Matrix, Barbarossa: Matrix, Pepper: Matrix, Hilda: Matrix, Ene: Matrix, Bai Ling: Matrix, Echo: Matrix.

matrix_show_ssr_Balance.name: Random SSR Matrix Chip
matrix_show_ssr_Balance.description: Possible rewards: Shiro Matrix, Claudia Matrix, Crow Matrix, Samir Matrix, Nemesis Matrix, Zero Matrix, Huma Matrix, KING Matrix, Tsubasa Matrix, Cocoritter Matrix, or Meryl Matrix.

matrix_show_ssr_BossInvasion.name: Random SSR Matrix Chip
matrix_show_ssr_BossInvasion.description: Possible Rewards: Haboela Matrix, Scylla Matrix, Meryl Matrix, Tsubasa Matrix, Cocoritter Matrix, KING Matrix, Shiro Matrix, Zero Matrix, Samir Matrix, Huma Matrix, Crow Matrix.

matrix_show_ssr.name: Random SSR Matrix Chip
matrix_show_ssr.description: Possible Rewards: Meryl Matrix, Tsubasa Matrix, Cocoritter Matrix, KING Matrix, Shiro Matrix, Zero Matrix, Samir Matrix, Huma Matrix, Crow Matrix.

Vera_huiyu.name: Grayspace Scriptures
Vera_huiyu.description: Used to observe the position of Grayspace Entities and help Wanderers to identify the entrance to the Grayspace.

Item_VeraBuff_Gold.name: Gold Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_Gold.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of gold.

Item_VeraBuff_Superpower.name: Active Ore Collector
Item_VeraBuff_Superpower.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can improve the acquisition of activator blocks.

Item_VeraBuff_CoreExp.name: Engine Builder
Item_VeraBuff_CoreExp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the number of engine parts acquired.

Item_VeraBuff_Crystal.name: Cluster Refiner
Item_VeraBuff_Crystal.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of clusters.

Item_VeraBuff_WeaponExp.name: Forge Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_WeaponExp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can improve the acquisition of weapon EXP.

Item_VeraBuff_MatrixExp.name: Drill Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_MatrixExp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can improve the acquisition of Matrix EXP.

Item_VeraBuff_EleMine.name: Elemental Ore Refiner
Item_VeraBuff_EleMine.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of elements.

Item_VeraBuff_Food.name: Gathering Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_Food.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of food ingredients.

Item_VeraBuff_Exp.name: Training Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_Exp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of EXP for the Executor.

Item_Vera_Gun1.description: Special operations gun equipped with Cryo Bullets

Item_Vera_Gun7.name: Naysayers
Item_Vera_Gun7.description: Special operations gun equipped with Chaos Bullets

Item_Vera_Gun8.name: Puppizer Shape-Shifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun8.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Doggie Miniature Simulacrum Simulator

Item_Vera_Gun9.name: Kittenizer Shape-Shifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun9.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Kitty Miniature Simulacrum Simulator

Item_Vera_Gun11.name: Giggs Shape-Shifting Gun

Item_Vera_Gun12.name: Tata Shape-Shifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun12.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Tata Miniature Simulacrum Simulator

Item_Vera_Gun13.name: Pallas Shapeshifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun13.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Pallas Miniature Simulacrum Simulator

Item_Vera_BadImitation8.name: Infernal Steel Lizard Trial Card
Item_Vera_BadImitation8.description: Infernal steel lizard novice Simulacrum data card

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation1.name: Shapeshifting Charm: Ignisville
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation1.description: The miniature Simulacrum Simulator of an Ignisville Domain Guard has been made into a spell. Put it on a target to temporarily transform it into an Ignisville Domain Guard.

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation2.name: Shapeshifting Charm: Sparrotail
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation2.description: The miniature Simulacrum Simulator of Sparrotail has been made into a spell. Put it on a target to temporarily transform it into Sparrotail.

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation3.name: Shapeshifting Charm: Joltville
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation3.description: The miniature Simulacrum Simulator of a Joltville Domain Guard has been made into a spell. Put it on a target to temporarily transform it into a Joltville Domain Guard.

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation4.name: Shapeshifting Charm: Longxiang
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation4.description: The miniature Simulacrum Simulator of Longxiang has been made into a spell. Put it on a target to temporarily transform it into Longxiang.

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation5.name: Shapeshifting Charm: Moundslinger
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation5.description: The miniature Simulacrum Simulator of a moundslinger has been made into a spell. Put it on a target to temporarily transform it into a moundslinger.

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation6.name: Shapeshifting Charm: Firerat
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation6.description: The miniature Simulacrum Simulator of a firerat has been made into a spell. Put it on a target to temporarily transform it into a firerat.

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation7.name: Shapeshifting Charm: Folium Tiger
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation7.description: The miniature Simulacrum Simulator of a folium tiger has been made into a spell. Put it on a target to temporarily transform it into a folium tiger.

Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation_SnowRabbit.name: Red Snow Plum
Item_Jiuyu_BadImitation_SnowRabbit.description: Red snow plum blossoms left behind by Exquisite Rabiit.

Item_Jiuyu_Bless_Attack.name: Simulated Magnetic Field: Fervor
Item_Jiuyu_Bless_Attack.description: A chip containing the mysterious induced magnetic field obtained from the statue.

Item_Jiuyu_Bless_Defense.name: Simulated Magnetic Field: Defense
Item_Jiuyu_Bless_Defense.description: A chip containing the mysterious induced magnetic field obtained from the statue.

Item_Jiuyu_Bless_Protect.name: Simulated Magnetic Field: Feedback
Item_Jiuyu_Bless_Protect.description: A chip containing the mysterious induced magnetic field obtained from the statue.

Item_Vera_Cooking1.name: Kun Ji's Signature Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking1.description: Kun Ji Noodles' Signature. You can never go wrong with it when you don't know what to eat.

Item_Vera_Cooking2.name: Kun Ji's Pork Chop Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking2.description: Nourishing and delicious pork rib noodle soup, nutritious but not greasy.

Item_Vera_Cooking3.name: Kun Ji's Sliced Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking3.description: Noodles with a unique flavor. The chef standing by the pot and cutting blocks of dough directly into boiling water was the favorite show for diners in the past when they were waiting.

Item_Vera_Cooking4.name: Kun Ji's BBQ Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking4.description: Soft and flavorful BBQ pork topped with marinade thick dressing. You'll finish the whole bowl before knowing it.

Item_Vera_Cooking5.name: Kun Ji's Won Ton Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking5.description: The longbeard noodles are covered with delicate wontons, which are a great treat both in appearance and taste.

Item_Vera_Cooking6.name: Cocoa Milk Tea
Item_Vera_Cooking6.description: An incredible drink that will put a smile on everyone's face! Tea flavored drink. Watch out for the risk of insomnia.

Item_Vera_Cooking7.name: Sugar-Free Black Tea
Item_Vera_Cooking7.description: What's the difference between iced tea and ice tea?

Item_Vera_Cooking8.name: Lemon Passion Clash
Item_Vera_Cooking8.description: A refreshing passion fruit drink that cools you down.

Item_Vera_Cooking9.name: Dragon in the Cloud
Item_Vera_Cooking9.description: Originated from the famous recipe of Mirafleur Hall—"Green Dragon Hidden in Fairy Fog."

Item_Vera_Cooking10.name: Healthy Soup
Item_Vera_Cooking10.description: Originated from the famous recipe of Mirafleur Hall—"Eyes Wide Azure."

Item_Vera_Cooking11.name: Runner
Item_Vera_Cooking11.description: Best-selling alternative special drink in Mirroria that comes in bitter and sweet flavors, but all have the same packaging and color, so it's hard to tell the two flavors apart.

Item_Vera_Cooking12.name: Tapioca milk tea
Item_Vera_Cooking12.description: Classic milk tea with chewy tapioca pearls.

Item_Vera_Cooking13.name: Rib Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking13.description: Can never go wrong with noodles and pork chop.

Item_Vera_Cooking14.name: Braised Meat Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking14.description: Fatty but not greasy, with a deliciously refreshing sauce.

Item_Vera_Cooking15.name: Eel Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking15.description: Chewy noodles with crispy rice eels!

Item_Vera_Cooking16.name: Mushroom Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking16.description: Made with fresh mushrooms that are full of flavor!

Item_Vera_Cooking17.name: Prawn Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking17.description: Made with fresh shrimps and a refreshing soup base.

Item_Vera_Cooking18.name: Beef Noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking18.description: Fragrance soup base with chewy noodles.

Item_Vera_Cooking20.name: Pita Bread in Mutton Soup
Item_Vera_Cooking20.description: Well-cooked meat in a thick soup that has lots of flavors.

Item_Vera_Cooking21.name: Biluochun Tea
Item_Vera_Cooking21.description: The green and the white complement each other.

Item_Vera_Cooking22.name: Dahongpao Tea
Item_Vera_Cooking22.description: The refreshing green becomes a bright orange-yellow after adding hot water.

Item_Vera_Cooking23.name: Oolong Tea
Item_Vera_Cooking23.description: The soup is clear, fragrant, and a little sweet.

Item_Vera_Cooking24.name: Salmon Sushi
Item_Vera_Cooking24.description: Guaranteed to be the freshest salmon!

Item_Vera_Cooking25.name: Tuna Sushi
Item_Vera_Cooking25.description: Guaranteed to be the freshest tuna!

Item_Vera_Cooking26.name: Salmon Roe Sushi
Item_Vera_Cooking26.description: Guaranteed to be the freshest fish roe!

Item_Vera_Cooking27.name: Sweet Prawn Sushi
Item_Vera_Cooking27.description: Guaranteed to be the freshest shrimp!

Item_Vera_Cooking28.name: Vegetarian Bun
Item_Vera_Cooking28.description: A large vegetable bun at a great price.

Item_Vera_Cooking29.name: Kung Fu Meat Bun
Item_Vera_Cooking29.description: A large bun with thin skin and lots of meat inside.

Item_Vera_Cooking30.name: Soft Red Bean Bun
Item_Vera_Cooking30.description: A soft bun filled with red bean paste.

Item_Vera_Cooking31.name: Fragrant Roast Duck
Item_Vera_Cooking31.description: Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside.

Item_Vera_Cooking33.name: Specialty Lamb Skewer
Item_Vera_Cooking33.description: No one can resist a good lamb skewer.

Item_Vera_Cooking34.name: Boneless Grilled Fish
Item_Vera_Cooking34.description: Grilled fish with no bones is a must-have.

Item_Vera_Cooking35.name: Char-Grilled Mushroom
Item_Vera_Cooking35.description: Be careful about eating wild mushrooms!

Item_Vera_Cooking36.name: Hawthorn Tang Hulu
Item_Vera_Cooking36.description: Sweet and sour, just like childhood.

Item_Vera_Cooking37.name: Strawberry Tang Hulu
Item_Vera_Cooking37.description: Can't stop eating these big and sweet strawberries!

Item_Vera_Cooking38.name: Grape Tang Hulu
Item_Vera_Cooking38.description: A tang hulu made from sweet grapes.

Item_Vera_Cooking40.name: Chocolate ice cream
Item_Vera_Cooking40.description: One can never go wrong with chocolate ice cream.

Item_Vera_Cooking41.name: Melon Ice Cream
Item_Vera_Cooking41.description: Why not just have melons by themselves?

Item_Vera_Cooking42.name: Matcha Ice Cream
Item_Vera_Cooking42.description: Freshly ground powder makes the tea incredibly fragrant.

Item_Vera_Cooking44.name: Movie Buff Cola
Item_Vera_Cooking44.description: A must-have drink when having fun.

Item_Vera_Cooking46.name: Puffy Potato Chips
Item_Vera_Cooking46.description: Potato chips are the go-to snack for just about every occasion.

Item_Vera_Cooking47.name: Bang Bang Popcorn
Item_Vera_Cooking47.description: Would you like a movie to go with your popcorn?

Item_Vera_Cooking48.name: Instant noodles
Item_Vera_Cooking48.description: The spicy noodles will leave their mark on your lips for a long time.

Item_Vera_Cooking51.name: Twisty sausage
Item_Vera_Cooking51.description: This chewy treat is even better when fried.

Item_Vera_Cooking52.name: Massive lollipop
Item_Vera_Cooking52.description: Where do I put this if I can't finish?

Item_Vera_Drinking1.description: It is said that the number of sips taken to finish the drink can be used to test the guest's patience. Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking2.description: If you are not skilled enough when preparing it, the sweetness can often overpower the rich fruitiness. Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking3.name: Light Flyer
Item_Vera_Drinking3.description: There's a lot of debate over whether the drink's color should be called "azure" or "light green." Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking4.name: Beacon
Item_Vera_Drinking4.description: A drink can't be judged by its appearance, and the health benefits of this drink stand out from the crowd. Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking5.description: If not for the artificial fruit in its ingredients, I'm afraid that the taste of freshness can be even better. Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking6.description: What bartenders say most about this drink is "Sorry, we can't make it without ice." Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking8.description: The tropical flavor is carefully crafted for some sceneries that can't be seen in Vera. Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.
