Item_Vera_Drinking8_bar.description: The tropical flavor is carefully crafted for some sceneries that can't be seen in Vera. Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking9.name: Nightingale Heart
Item_Vera_Drinking9.description: If it tastes bad... So what? You should appreciate the elegant gradient effect... Tip: This drink is low in alcohol and may cause mild dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking10.name: Curtain
Item_Vera_Drinking10.description: You can't have your fun without Coke after all, even when you're drinking alcohol. Tip: This drink is high in alcohol and may cause significant dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking11.name: Cactus Pillow
Item_Vera_Drinking11.description: The tingling spiciness that lingers on your lips will ensure that you won't oversleep the next day. Tip: This drink is high in alcohol and may cause significant dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking12.name: Old Wharf
Item_Vera_Drinking12.description: A timeless classic, but no one knows how many times the formula has been modified along the way. Tip: This drink is high in alcohol and may cause significant dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking13.name: Sprouting Sapling
Item_Vera_Drinking13.description: This glass of liquor appeared in a homemade short film made by young people in Mirroria, and it has been popular for a while. Tip: This drink is high in alcohol and may cause significant dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking14.name: Respect
Item_Vera_Drinking14.description: Even if you can't drink much, you'd better keep a glass at hand to show your style when you are attending business dinners. Tip: This drink is high in alcohol and may cause significant dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking15.name: Foreign Friend
Item_Vera_Drinking15.description: Feel free to order a glass of this drink anytime without anyone noticing it's your first time at the place. Tip: This drink is high in alcohol and may cause significant dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Drinking16.name: Emperor's New Clothes
Item_Vera_Drinking16.description: I thought it was an urban legend before I drank it myself... Rejoice, this drink is real! Tip: This drink is high in alcohol and may cause significant dizziness after consumption; underage drinking is prohibited.

Item_Vera_Sobering.name: Hangover Relief
Item_Vera_Sobering.description: A Mirafleur Hall potion that can eliminate the effects of alcohol. It can quickly neutralize the alcohol concentration in the body for the purpose of sobering up, and is effective in dealing with drunk and disorderly guests. Don't drink too much!

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking1.name: Longjing
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking1.description: Famous tea with a clear fragrance and pleasant taste. The fresh leaves look so green and juicy.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking2.name: Pu'er
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking2.description: Bright red tea that makes it look just like an antique.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking3.name: Tieguanyin
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking3.description: It is said that this tea has a long-lasting fragrance that still remains after numerous uses, even if it's just faint by then.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking4.name: Gigantic Meat Bun
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking4.description: A single bite of the meat bun, oh so satisfying!

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking5.name: Flowing Bean Bun
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking5.description: The bean paste is still a little sticky, but it's delicious.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking6.name: Nutritious Vegetable Bun
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking6.description: Brush after you eat to remove any stray vegetables stuck between your teeth!

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking7.name: Crabapple Tang Hulu
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking7.description: Juicy and delicious tang hulu with a fruity aroma.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking8.name: Raspberry Tang Hulu
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking8.description: A sweet, delicious, and mouth-watering snack.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking9.name: Green Apple Tang Hulu
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking9.description: A sweet and sour snack. Maybe it has some benefits for the skin?

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking10.name: Dumpling
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking10.description: Nothing beats a good old dumpling when it comes to food! Various fillings available. Surely there's something for everyone.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking11.name: Siu Mai
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking11.description: A pomegranate-shaped dumpling filled with pickled glutinous rice and a small amount of Chinese sausage, fragrant and delicious with the best of both steamed stuffed buns and pot stickers. A perfect breakfast food.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking12.name: Steamed Bun
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking12.description: Steamed buns fresh off the steamer, soft and delicious with a perfectly-proportioned bun exterior and rich filling.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking13.name: Rice Cake
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking13.description: A pastry made from boiled and pounded glutinous rice. It can be steamed, fried or boiled in various ways. Soft, sticky, and very filling.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking14.name: Spring Roll
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking14.description: A traditional snack with a long history in Domain 9, a deep-fried roll with fillings wrapped inside a thin pancake, crispy on the outside and tender inside, very delicious.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking15.name: Eel Noodles
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking15.description: A bowl of chewy noodles topped with quick-fried eel. The people of Domain 9 have a special attachment to traditional food. Even though they have long left their home planet, they are still tirelessly looking for the familiar taste.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking16.name: Braised Meat Noodles
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking16.description: After three days of stewing, the marbled game meat has reached a unique taste, fragrant and not greasy. Pair it with noodles or dip it in a rich soup as a special treat with long lasting relish and aromas on your lips.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking17.name: Prawn Noodles
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking17.description: Pair some fried fresh shrimp with noodles for a fragrant, chewy and delicious experience!

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking18.name: Rib Noodles
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking18.description: 10 simple steps can transform an ordinary piece of chop into a braised heaven. The meat is so tender and the sauce so fragrant. Use it as a topping for a simple yet hearty bowl of noodles.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking19.name: Braised Pork Liver Noodles
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking19.description: The pork liver, after 72 hours of braising, is paired with handmade thin noodles. This rich and chewy bowl is very popular among noodle lovers.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking20.name: Sticky Rice Hashbrown
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking20.description: Crispy golden on the outside and soft and chewy snow-white inside, these fragrant and crunch glutinous rice cakes are perfect for breakfast.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking21.name: Tea Egg
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking21.description: A kind of flavored boiled eggs with tea leaves, spices and soy sauce added during the cooking process. Once cooked, the eggs are gently cracked to fully absorb the flavor. It makes a perfect snack between meals.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking22.name: Shredded Radish Cake
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking22.description: A perfect snack made with flour, shredded radish, and eggs. It's crispy on the outside and very fragrant, refreshing, and slightly sweet, satisfying your craving for good food with every bite.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking23.name: Hot and Sour Vermicelli
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking23.description: The boiled vermicelli is added to a carefully prepared soup. It's spicy, refreshing, fragrant and sour all at the same time. You are guaranteed to sweat!

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking24.name: Hot Dry Noodles
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking24.description: The boiled noodles are mixed with a thick sesame paste, sesame oil and other condiments. It's delicious and leaves lingering aromas in your mouth.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking25.name: Rougamo
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking25.description: When a freshly baked bun meets chopped braised pork in cured sauce, you better jump at it while it's still hot for the best experience of its crispiness, tenderness, and deliciousness.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking26.name: Cheung Fun
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking26.description: A thin roll made from rice noodles filled marinated minced meat and eggs, white in color, soft, chewy and very smooth with a lingering aftertaste.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking27.name: Steamed Stuffed Bun
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking27.description: A bite-sized steamed bun with a juicy meat filling. Take a bite and all your craving for food will be satisfied. Better enjoyed with dark vinegar.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking28.name: Tang Yuan
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking28.description: A glutinous rice ball filled with a sweet red bean paste. A festival food well loved by the people of Domain 9.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking29.name: Wound Sealing Powder
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking29.description: For effectively treating various traumas, it is widely acclaimed among the Domain Guards.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking30.name: Chrysanthemum Drink
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking30.description: A tea drink made with various herbs to treat insomnia and dizziness.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking31.name: Nine Treasure Soup
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking31.description: A traditional herbal medicine primarily used to treat cough and asthma.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking32.name: Six-Ingredient Pill
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking32.description: An ancient herbal medicine prescription for treating various diseases. It can effectively relieve symptoms from dizziness, tinnitus to weakness and soreness of the waist and the knees.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking33.name: Biotae Seed Soup
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking33.description: A decoction made with a long list of herbs to treat insomnia and dreaminess.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking34.name: Blade Shot
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking34.description: A drug used in the past to cultivate elite warriors has been brought back through research conducted by folk masters. We'll have to wait for someone brave to test out its effects, which is already rather obvious judging from the blade symbol on the tube.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking35.name: Enhanced Blade Shot
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking35.description: A drug used in the past to cultivate elite warriors has been brought back through research conducted by folk masters. We'll have to wait for someone brave to test out its effects, which is already rather obvious judging from the blade symbol on the tube.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking36.name: Piercing Shot
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking36.description: A drug used in the past to cultivate elite warriors has been brought back through research conducted by folk masters. We'll have to wait for someone brave to test out its effects, which is already rather obvious judging from the crossed-out blade symbol on the tube.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking37.name: Rejuvenation Shot
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking37.description: A drug used in the past to cultivate elite warriors has been brought back through research conducted by folk masters. We'll have to wait for someone brave to test out its effects, which is already rather obvious judging from the blood symbol on the tube.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking38.name: Enhancement Shot
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking38.description: A drug used in the past to cultivate elite warriors has been brought back through research conducted by folk masters. We'll have to wait for someone brave to test out its effects, which is already rather obvious judging from the explosion symbol on the tube.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking39.name: Warmheart Cooler
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking39.description: The golden liquid shines brightly in the glass bottle. Give it a gentle swirl and you'll see delicate bubbles jumping with joy. Take one sip and you can already feel a flow of warmth spread slowly. The subtle smell of alcohol is a sweet comfort for your body and soul, just like the spring sunshine filtered through a thin layer of clouds.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking40.name: Creamy Almond Soup
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking40.description: A rich milky fragrance is added to this smooth and delicate almond soup. Take a spoonful and feel its silky touch on the tip of your tongue. The subtle almond aroma interweaves with the mellow cream flavor to create a lasting taste you won't be able to forget, a sweet warmth on a cold winter night.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking41.name: Grapefruit Water with Honey
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking41.description: The crystal clear grapefruit water sweetened with honey gives off a pleasant scent and a golden warmth with each sip. Enjoy it on a cold day and feel the warm sunshine through the thin fog.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking42.name: Maple Candy
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking42.description: A maple leaf shaped candy, it even has tiny lines that resemble the veins. Sweet and fragrant, it fills the air with an autumn breeze.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking43.name: Hot Bagel
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking43.description: Fresh out of the oven, this bagel releases an irresistible scent. With its crispy exterior and soft, chewy center, each bite feels like a warm embrace on a sunny day.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking44.name: Roasted Sweet Potato
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking44.description: Slowly roasted over charcoal until the skin is crispy golden, this sweet potato exudes an alluring sweet aroma.

Item_Jiuyu_Cooking45.name: Moundslinger Cookie
Item_Jiuyu_Cooking45.description: Baked by a mech moundslinger on a whim, this lets you understand their language for a while after eating it. He thinks it tastes great, but the actual flavor... well, that might be another story.

Item_Cooking_1001_autouse.name: Fried mushrooms
Item_Cooking_1001_autouse.description: Taste aside, at least it's cooked and not raw.

Item_Cooking_1002_autouse.name: Seaweed and egg soup
Item_Cooking_1002_autouse.description: Got fresh laver and rich in protein, good for filling up the tummy.

Item_Cooking_1003_autouse.name: Crispy grilled fish
Item_Cooking_1003_autouse.description: One of the popular eats in the port city of Banges. Cheap and delicious.

Item_Cooking_1004_autouse.name: Wholegrain bread
Item_Cooking_1004_autouse.description: Made from processed grain, nutritious and easily kept. Every Wanderer should carry some.

Item_Cooking_1005_autouse.name: Breakfast cereal
Item_Cooking_1005_autouse.description: Once a life-saving ration enough to feed five to six people. Given the improved condition, people add milk to it now instead of water.

Item_Cooking_1006_autouse.name: Sizzling meat
Item_Cooking_1006_autouse.description: How would you like it cooked? Real men just eat it after a few seconds of grilling on rocks under a hot sun.

Item_Cooking_1007_autouse.name: Seafood soup
Item_Cooking_1007_autouse.description: They said one bite will pep you up, two will make you healthy, despite the average taste.

Item_Cooking_1008_autouse.name: Crispy chicken burger
Item_Cooking_1008_autouse.description: Chicken burgers seen in fast food joints. Few things top the combo of hot, crunchy chicken and crispy lettuce.

Item_Cooking_1009_autouse.name: Spicy burger
Item_Cooking_1009_autouse.description: No matter how long it's been, it never fails to stir your appetite.

Item_Cooking_1010_autouse.name: Egg fried rice
Item_Cooking_1010_autouse.description: This is the twist you need when you get tired of eating plain white rice.

Item_Cooking_1011_autouse.name: Steamed crab
Item_Cooking_1011_autouse.description: Seafood is best when served fresh. The problem is, where to start?

Item_Cooking_1012_autouse.name: Iced strawberry soda
Item_Cooking_1012_autouse.description: Mix pureed strawberries into soda, then add ice. A summer essential.

Item_Cooking_1014_autouse.name: Thundercloud blueberry soda
Item_Cooking_1014_autouse.description: The blueberry is as dark as a rain cloud. Be careful not to spill it on you, since it's hard to wash off.

Item_Cooking_1015_autouse.name: Golden egg and tomato
Item_Cooking_1015_autouse.description: No, I didn't scramble the eggs by accident...

Item_Cooking_1016_autouse.name: Simple power salad
Item_Cooking_1016_autouse.description: The most basic salad for meeting the daily nutrient requirement. The choice for a low-fat diet.

Item_Cooking_1017_autouse.name: Lettuce salad
Item_Cooking_1017_autouse.description: A nice salad with simple ingredients and a robust flavor.

Item_Cooking_1018_autouse.name: Mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_1018_autouse.description: A perfect combination of fresh mushrooms and crispy lettuce.

Item_Cooking_1019_autouse.name: Fried egg
Item_Cooking_1019_autouse.description: Start a wonderful day off with fried eggs!

Item_Cooking_1020_autouse.name: Steamed conch
Item_Cooking_1020_autouse.description: It retains all of its original taste! A sprinkle of chopped green onion would improve it, though.

Item_Cooking_1021_autouse.name: Steamed egg with sea urchin
Item_Cooking_1021_autouse.description: Sea urchin with smooth steamed egg is delicious and comforting, particularly popular in the snowfield.

Item_Cooking_1022_autouse.name: Double Berry Jam Toast
Item_Cooking_1022_autouse.description: Fusion of two berries for a sweet-sour symphony in your mouth.

Item_Cooking_1023_autouse.name: Tomato and fried egg pasta
Item_Cooking_1023_autouse.description: Perfectly sour and easy to make. A tasty low-calorie treat.

Item_Cooking_1024_autouse.name: Meat and potato stew
Item_Cooking_1024_autouse.description: The meat absorbed all the nutrients, so it's extremely healthy!

Item_Cooking_1025_autouse.name: Fries
Item_Cooking_1025_autouse.description: It's not junk food but pure happiness!

Item_Cooking_1027_autouse.name: Fried chicken
Item_Cooking_1027_autouse.description: Simple and quick meal. The crispy golden coating will make passersby drool.

Item_Cooking_1028_autouse.name: Honeyed fruit juice
Item_Cooking_1028_autouse.description: Fresh juice with dabs of honey, slightly shaken. A tinge of sweetness amid the sour.

Item_Cooking_1029_autouse.name: Fruit cake
Item_Cooking_1029_autouse.description: There's no stress a piece of delicious cake can't solve. If there is, have a second!

Item_Cooking_1030_autouse.name: Iced orchid surprise
Item_Cooking_1030_autouse.description: Summer special. Feel the surf party in your mouth!

Item_Cooking_1031_autouse.name: Stir-fried broccoli
Item_Cooking_1031_autouse.description: Healthy low-fat food, though not a favorite for most.

Item_Cooking_1032_autouse.name: Boiled scallops
Item_Cooking_1032_autouse.description: A simple tasty dish without any seasoning needed.

Item_Cooking_1033_autouse.name: Meat bun
Item_Cooking_1033_autouse.description: The juice that bursts out when you bite into one is the essence!

Item_Cooking_1034_autouse.name: Sliced fish with mushroom
Item_Cooking_1034_autouse.description: A perfect complement of sliced fish and mushroom.

Item_Cooking_1035_autouse.name: Roast rump
Item_Cooking_1035_autouse.description: Set up the grill and grab a chair. Yeah, that's the smell...

Item_Cooking_1036_autouse.name: Dandelion mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_1036_autouse.description: Ever tried dandelion with mushroom? It will make you light on your feet.

Item_Cooking_2001_autouse.name: Surf and Turf
Item_Cooking_2001_autouse.description: Banges's home cooking for that hometown taste.

Item_Cooking_2002_autouse.name: Red wheat bread
Item_Cooking_2002_autouse.description: Most common food among the people of Aida that reflects their simple life.

Item_Cooking_2003_autouse.name: Fiddlehead pie
Item_Cooking_2003_autouse.description: Healthy biscuit with fiddlehead filling, not too popular among kids, though.

Item_Cooking_2004_autouse.name: Chocolate bread
Item_Cooking_2004_autouse.description: Stuffed with chocolate! Just hold off your diet for a day.

Item_Cooking_2005_autouse.name: Firecap mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_2005_autouse.description: What's more comforting than a piping hot firecap mushroom soup when you're scaling snowy peaks?

Item_Cooking_2006_autouse.name: Black moss soup
Item_Cooking_2006_autouse.description: Fill up the stomach now and grab something better later.

Item_Cooking_2007_autouse.name: Balloon fruit salad
Item_Cooking_2007_autouse.description: Specially selected salad. Sweet and sour, kids' favorite!

Item_Cooking_2009_autouse.name: Spicy eel
Item_Cooking_2009_autouse.description: Is the electric eel fully cooked? How come my tongue feels tingly?

Item_Cooking_2010_autouse.name: Eel and mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_2010_autouse.description: A spicy challenge for the taste buds. Down it in one gulp if you dare! And no water allowed!

Item_Cooking_2011_autouse.name: Sea crab soup
Item_Cooking_2011_autouse.description: All good things of a crab are in the stew.

Item_Cooking_2012_autouse.name: Sweet pomegranate juice
Item_Cooking_2012_autouse.description: Am I seeing things, or is the juice actually glowing?

Item_Cooking_2013_autouse.name: Cocoa milk
Item_Cooking_2013_autouse.description: Drink a cup before bedtime and have a sweet dream!

Item_Cooking_2014_autouse.name: Firedragon fruit tea
Item_Cooking_2014_autouse.description: Couple this with a cake for a perfect afternoon tea!

Item_Cooking_2015_autouse.name: Barnacle stew
Item_Cooking_2015_autouse.description: A taste that you will enjoy!

Item_Cooking_2017_autouse.name: Snow azalea tea
Item_Cooking_2017_autouse.description: Why don't you have some while vegging by the campfire in cold winter?

Item_Cooking_2018_autouse.name: Pine cocoa
Item_Cooking_2018_autouse.description: Nut-flavored cocoa milk. Nut lovers can add more nuts to it.

Item_Cooking_2019_autouse.name: Nut tea
Item_Cooking_2019_autouse.description: Smell how fresh the nuts are...

Item_Cooking_2020_autouse.name: Purple yam pie
Item_Cooking_2020_autouse.description: Filling pie and portable enough for long hikes.

Item_Cooking_2021_autouse.name: Snow lotus soup
Item_Cooking_2021_autouse.description: Snow lotus tastes rather bland, so sugar is added to make it a popular dessert.

Item_Cooking_2022_autouse.name: Truffle fried rice
Item_Cooking_2022_autouse.description: Stir-fry the truffle, then mix it with fried rice.

Item_Cooking_2023_autouse.name: Caterpillar fungus noodles
Item_Cooking_2023_autouse.description: Am I at the age when I have to watch my diet?

Item_Cooking_2024_autouse.name: Caviar sushi
Item_Cooking_2024_autouse.description: A visually pleasant roll makes it a classy dish. If you can't make it, you're better off mixing them in a bowl.

Item_Cooking_2025_autouse.name: Caviar potato balls
Item_Cooking_2025_autouse.description: Soft potato balls drenched in premium caviar. You'll want seconds.

Item_Cooking_2027_autouse.name: Steak with mushroom sauce
Item_Cooking_2027_autouse.description: I think I'm seeing steaks flying across the sky...

Item_Cooking_2029_autouse.name: Juicy meat sandwich
Item_Cooking_2029_autouse.description: Take your time and make yourself a good breakfast!

Item_Cooking_2030_autouse.name: Salmon sashimi
Item_Cooking_2030_autouse.description: This is what food should taste like!

Item_Cooking_2031_autouse.name: Snail baked rice
Item_Cooking_2031_autouse.description: Looks like a weird fusion, but much tastier than it looks.

Item_Pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
Item_Pumpkin.description: Pumpkin is a popular, delicious fruit.

Item_Dandelion_001.name: Dandelion
Item_Dandelion_001.description: When the white petals are scattered to the four winds, I shall take my leave.

Item_Dandelion_zhongzi.name: Dandelion seed
Item_Dandelion_zhongzi.description: Has potential to grow into a new plant after leaving the original.

Item_Bug_001.name: Firefly
Item_Bug_001.description: Captured and released in the night for Celine. A dancing glow in the darkness.

Item_Honey_001.name: Honey
Item_Honey_001.description: Everybody's favorite sweet. Only the bees have to work hard.

Item_Honey_002.name: Bee nectar
Item_Honey_002.description: Everybody's favorite sweet. Only the bees have to work hard.

Item_Egg_001.name: Poultry Egg
Item_Egg_001.description: So, guess it's going to be a chick or a baby hawk? Hey, are you hungry?
source: Often found in bird nests at high places

Item_Milk_001.name: Milk
Item_Milk_001.description: A common beverage, ready to drink and may be stored for a while. A nutritious fave.

Item_Shell_001.name: Conch
Item_Shell_001.description: Legend has it a beautiful, kind girl lives inside. And it tastes pretty good.

Item_Shell_002.name: Scallop
Item_Shell_002.description: One of the primary food source for coastal dwellers. Already seasoned with sea salt, just grill and serve.

Item_Shells_003.name: Carrion snail
Item_Shells_003.description: A rare variety of giant snail with a weird appetite, but is surprisingly tasty.

Item_Shells_005.name: Hermit crab
Item_Shells_005.description: It has grown again! And now it gets a new... steamy "house."

Item_Shells006.name: Portunid
Item_Shells006.description: Lives on the shallow edge of the sea and sometimes comes ashore to soak up the sun. Very delicious.

Item_Shells007.name: Sea urchin
Item_Shells007.description: A delicacy from the shallow edge of the sea, though not for everyone.

Item_Shells008.name: Oyster
Item_Shells008.description: A favorite of the luminaries in the city. Rumors circulate about it having special effects.

Item_Shells009.name: Barnacle
Item_Shells009.description: Looks scary, but yummy to the tongue!

Item_Meat_001.name: Game meat
Item_Meat_001.description: The more the beast moved, the better the meat.

Item_Meat_002.name: Poultry meat
Item_Meat_002.description: You've had scrambled eggs, right? This is to make it a matching course.

Item_Meat_003.name: Rear hock
Item_Meat_003.description: Delicious when grilled or roasted. Goes well with mustard.

Item_Meat_004.name: Prime Cut
Item_Meat_004.description: The more the beast moved, the better the meat.

Item_Meat_005.name: Fatty cut
Item_Meat_005.description: The less the beast moved, the fattier the meat.

Item_Greens_001.name: Lettuce
Item_Greens_001.description: You want to be healthy? Eat it.

Item_Greens_002.name: Wild cabbage
Item_Greens_002.description: It resembles a ball, but that doesn't mean you can kick it like one.

Item_Greens_003.name: Broccoli
Item_Greens_003.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Item_Mushroom_001.name: Mushroom
Item_Mushroom_001.description: Fungi seen in wild grasslands. Young lasses just love to pick them.

Item_Mushroom_002.name: Suncap
Item_Mushroom_002.description: Sprouts toward the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Item_Mushroom_004.name: Firecap
Item_Mushroom_004.description: Seems to be a variety of woodear fungus transformed by elements of flame. Tastes rather spicy.

Item_Mushroom_005.name: Monkey head mushroom
Item_Mushroom_005.description: Bland in both taste and appearance, but allegedly very high in nutrients.

Item_Mushroom_006.name: Black Truffle
Item_Mushroom_006.description: Rare and expensive mushroom that grows in rather specific, stringent environments.

Item_Mushroom_007.name: Ghost mushroom
Item_Mushroom_007.description: Fungi indigenous to caves. You'll be seeing stars after massive consumption.

Item_Staples_001.name: Homi grain
Item_Staples_001.description: Gift from the earth. Soft, sweet, and delicious when cooked.

Item_Staples_002.name: Brown rice
Item_Staples_002.description: An offshoot of homi grain that contains the power of the flame element.

Item_Staples_003.name: Sweet Potato
Item_Staples_003.description: Tastes great when baked, but eating too much of it won't make you pleasant around other people.

Item_Staples_005.name: Purple yam
Item_Staples_005.description: A variety of potatoes that were exposed to radiation. Extremely nutritious.

Item_Fishes_001.name: Silver bass
Item_Fishes_001.description: Silver bass can be found in either freshwater or the sea. They are meaty and delicious.

Item_Fruit_001.name: Fallen Fruit
Item_Fruit_001.description: Fruit fallen to the ground. Edible if you clean the mud off.

Item_Fruit_002.name: Strawberry
Item_Fruit_002.description: Don't wait for it to ripen, or it would be eaten by wild animals long before that.

Item_Fruit_003.name: Phosphogranate
Item_Fruit_003.description: After the initial sour-sweet taste comes... blandness, yet it's a waste to throw it away.

Item_Fruit_004.name: Firedragon Fruit
Item_Fruit_004.description: Upgraded dragon fruit with double nutrients, though eating too much of it makes you aggressive.

Item_Follows002.name: Snow azalea
Item_Follows002.description: Extremely high in medicinal value without side effects. Consume as much as you want.

Item_Fruits006.name: Thornmato
Item_Fruits006.description: This new variety of tomato is not to be missed.

Item_Fruits008.name: Lard gourd
Item_Fruits008.description: Tastes pretty good, actually, despite the irradiated appearance.

Item_Nuts004.name: Walnut shell
Item_Nuts004.description: Eat more of it if you want to become smarter.

Item_Follows001.name: Snow lotus
Item_Follows001.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Item_Staples006.name: Barley
Item_Staples006.description: No one's farming anymore, leaving it to grow in the wild as it may.

Item_Nuts003.name: Pinecone
Item_Nuts003.description: An apple might not be the only thing that drops on your head. It could be a pinecone.

Item_Fishes006.name: Dabry's Sturgeon
Item_Fishes006.description: Sturgeon living in shallow waters. Small in size, great for braising or stew.

Item_Fishes005.name: Lake bass
Item_Fishes005.description: This fish is good any way you cook it.

Item_Nuts002.name: Cocoa Beans
Item_Nuts002.description: Do you anticipate chocolate when you see the cocoa beans too?

Item_Nuts001.name: Hazelnut
Item_Nuts001.description: A certain account pegs this as the culprit of the cracking of tectonic plates during Ice Age.

Item_Greens007.name: Laver
Item_Greens007.description: A variety of kelp. Easily washed ashore by waves.

Item_Greens008.name: Fiddlehead
Item_Greens008.description: Time to eat your veggie! Won't grow tall if you're finicky!

Item_Greens009.name: Fish mint
Item_Greens009.description: If you can stand the taste, you can't get enough of it.

Item_Fruits009.name: Balloon Fruit
Item_Fruits009.description: The matured form goes wherever the wind takes it.

Item_Drugs_001.name: Beast paw
Item_Drugs_001.description: An enemy's paw with long claws for that extra crunch.

Item_Drugs_003.name: Lizard tail
Item_Drugs_003.description: Hardly anyone gets why this is a delicacy, but it is!

Item_Drugs_005.name: Small Blueberry Jar
Item_Drugs_005.description: You can swallow everything inside with one gulp.

Item_Drugs_007.name: Caviar
Item_Drugs_007.description: Used to be a rare delicacy, until the mass production process was developed...

Item_Drugs_008.name: Crimson petal
Item_Drugs_008.description: The alluring color says much about this unusual ingredient.

Item_Drugs_010.name: Dried meat
Item_Drugs_010.description: The unidentified meat was crudely processed and smelled strange. Hyena hooligans often carried it with them and "eat" it!

Item_Drugs_011_1.name: Fire gel
Item_Drugs_011_1.description: Just a slight dab will do. Too much will set your mouth on fire.

Item_Drugs_011_2.name: Ice gel
Item_Drugs_011_2.description: With just enough water elemental power to make it an edible jelly.

Item_Drugs_011_3.name: Lightning gel
Item_Drugs_011_3.description: Contains statics. Supposedly tingles and numbs the tongue.

Item_Drugs_012_1.name: Fire crystal
Item_Drugs_012_1.description: Crystal formed from the flame element. Supposedly can be used for seasoning when cooking.

Item_Drugs_012_2.name: Ice crystal
Item_Drugs_012_2.description: Often mistaken for simple ice cubes, a mistake intense to the gullet when devoured.

Item_Drugs_012_3.name: Lightning crystal
Item_Drugs_012_3.description: Watch out, it will numb your tongue completely!

Item_Vera_Harvest_001.name: Chilis
Item_Vera_Harvest_001.description: The real champion must take a bite! Oh spicy!!!

Item_Vera_Harvest_003.name: Aloe
Item_Vera_Harvest_003.description: The fertile herb is said to have beauty benefits.

Item_Vera_Harvest_004.name: Rose Petal
Item_Vera_Harvest_004.description: Shall I collect it for cooking or bathing...

Item_Vera_Harvest_006.name: Beetroot
Item_Vera_Harvest_006.description: Brought us the natural coloring. Thank you, beetroot.

Item_Vera_Harvest_008.name: Thornfruit
Item_Vera_Harvest_008.description: A small and crimson fruit that is only found in the Confounding Abyss. It's been found that the fruit is indeed edible and doesn't actually taste too bad.

Item_Vera_Harvest_009.name: Pumpkin
Item_Vera_Harvest_009.description: Perhaps... It would make a great decoration?

Item_Vera_Harvest_010.name: Soy
Item_Vera_Harvest_010.description: Plain little beans, but they can make a lot of good food.

Item_Vera_Harvest_011.name: White Jade Radish
Item_Vera_Harvest_011.description: The crisp and juicy white radish is delicious in any way.

Item_Vera_Harvest_012.name: Corn
Item_Vera_Harvest_012.description: Who doesn't love a sweet, soft and mellow corn?

Item_Vera_Harvest_014.name: Fleshy Tail
source: Obtained by defeating caiman wyrm in Domain 9.

Item_Vera_Harvest_015.name: Rib
Item_Vera_Harvest_015.description: Premium animal ribs, I've got a lot of ideas about how to cook them...

Item_Vera_Harvest_016.name: Antelope Antlers
Item_Vera_Harvest_016.description: It may have antelope in its name, but it looks like ordinary deer antlers!

Item_Vera_Harvest_017.name: Behemoth Bones
Item_Vera_Harvest_017.description: Besides snapping off those blue crystals as decorations, this bulky head is completely useless.
source: Third City: Defeat Crystal Hoof: Culton

Item_Vera_Harvest_018.name: Solid Bone Fragment
Item_Vera_Harvest_018.description: Some tooth fragments, and maybe some cavities if you're unlucky.
source: Third City: Defeating shielded beasts and sand otters.
Third City: Defeat Crystal Hoof: Culton

Item_Vera_Harvest_019.name: Gale Claw
Item_Vera_Harvest_019.description: Solid bone structure with no risk of fractures.

Item_Vera_Harvest_020.name: Grayspace Spine
Item_Vera_Harvest_020.description: A chill runs down your spine from catching sight of it.
source: Confounding Abyss: Defeating humanoid Grayspace Entities.
Third City: Defeat Grayspace Entity: Enlightener
Miasmic Swamp: Defeating G-hatchers and G-Disguisers.

Item_Vera_Harvest_021.name: Marrow Concentrate
Item_Vera_Harvest_021.description: It's absolutely disgusting to get submerged in.

Item_Vera_Harvest_022.name: Crystamax Core
Item_Vera_Harvest_022.description: It's said to be the source of energy for Grayspace Entities, and its significance is extraordinary.

Item_Vera_Harvest_023.name: Crystamax Shard
Item_Vera_Harvest_023.description: Not a very pure or large Crystamax, but it's better than nothing.

Item_Vera_Harvest_024.name: Gray Matter Crystal
Item_Vera_Harvest_024.description: A crystal formed from gray matter.

Item_Vera_Harvest_025.name: Gray Matter Chunk
Item_Vera_Harvest_025.description: Some gray matter peeled off from the bodies of Grayspace Entities.
source: Confounding Abyss: Defeating beastly Grayspace Entities.

Item_Vera_Harvest_026.name: Marzoid Ore
Item_Vera_Harvest_026.description: An ore with a really cool name.

Item_Vera_Harvest_027.name: Marzoid Debris
Item_Vera_Harvest_027.description: The debris of an ore with a really cool name.

Item_Vera_Harvest_028.name: Thornfruit Juice
Item_Vera_Harvest_028.description: Fruit juice with a beautiful hue. It looks just as delicious.

Item_Vera_Harvest_029.name: Lost Data Module
Item_Vera_Harvest_029.description: It's obviously not something an ordinary person can crack.

Item_Vera_Harvest_030.name: Machinery Core
Item_Vera_Harvest_030.description: Ah! What kind of cutting-edge technology created this!?

Item_Vera_Harvest_031.name: Lost Text
Item_Vera_Harvest_031.description: Precious text. Please cherish it as you would your own graduation thesis.

Item_Vera_Harvest_032.name: Tactical Structure
Item_Vera_Harvest_032.description: The complex design makes the impossible possible.

Item_Vera_Harvest_033.name: Coating Base
Item_Vera_Harvest_033.description: Internal configuration... What configuration! Look at the paint first!

Item_Vera_Harvest_034.name: Broken Part
Item_Vera_Harvest_034.description: No matter how great a structure is, it cannot miss a single screw.

Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Material
Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show.description: Chance of obtaining the following materials: tactical structures, coating bases, and broken parts.

Item_Show_Ocean_Harvest.name: Materials
Item_Show_Ocean_Harvest.description: Choose one of the following: Ambergris, stingray mouthparts, turtle spine, swordfish fin, skull shark skeleton, skull shark tooth, shed single horn, sea meme, fanged mackerel fangs, snout snail wings, filamentous hygrobacterium, Haboela's giant horn, ink sac, seawater fish fin, cachalot bone, slime, poison sac, turtle horn, cuttlebone, Grayspace wing membrane, filth, electric storage sac, snout snail tusk, neon material, tentacle, small hard shell, large hard shell。

Item_Ocean_Harvest_001.name: Starfish Roe
Item_Ocean_Harvest_001.description: A brown-colored cooking ingredient that is very nutritious, but not widely accepted.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_002.name: Pufferfish Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_002.description: Full of collagen that melts in your mouth. Don't get pricked by the spikes!

Item_Ocean_Harvest_003.name: Octopus Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_003.description: There are plenty of uses for the chewy tentacles.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_004.name: Small Seawater Fish Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_004.description: Compared to freshwater fish, they have considerably fewer bones.
source: Grand Sea: Catching Small Seawater Fish

Item_Ocean_Harvest_005.name: Leafdragon Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_005.description: An expensive medicinal ingredient with a unique flavor.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_006.name: Orange Anemone
Item_Ocean_Harvest_006.description: The edible part of an anemone containing fluorescent substances.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_007.name: Dragon-Necked Turtle Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_007.description: Taken from the neck of a dragon-necked turtle. Some say eating this will extend one's lifespan.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_008.name: Dragon-Necked Turtle Egg
Item_Ocean_Harvest_008.description: The egg of a large marine creature. Very different from bird eggs, both inside and out.
source: Grand Sea Shallows: Dragon-Necked Turtle Nest

Item_Ocean_Harvest_009.name: Jellyfish
Item_Ocean_Harvest_009.description: The crunchy texture makes it a great ingredient for a cold dish.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_011.name: Large Seawater Fish Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_011.description: The most tender and juicy part of a large marine fish. Can also be eaten raw.
source: Grand Sea: Hunting Large Marine Fish

Item_Ocean_Harvest_012.name: Squid Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_012.description: Has the same tender tentacles as the octopus. Wonder how different it tastes.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_013.name: Lobster Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_013.description: Its price is even more astounding than its great taste.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_014.name: Crab Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_014.description: Whether sea crabs taste better or lake crabs taste better is still an ongoing debate.
source: Grand Sea: Catching Sea King Crab

Item_Ocean_Harvest_015.name: Red Sea Urchin
Item_Ocean_Harvest_015.description: Natural dye from Mother Nature. It's purely organic and doesn't impact the environment.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_016.name: Pink Sea Urchin
Item_Ocean_Harvest_016.description: Natural dye from Mother Nature. It's purely organic and doesn't impact the environment.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_018.name: Herb Seasoning
Item_Ocean_Harvest_018.description: A kind of delicious and spicy powder that has the aroma of plants.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_019.name: Chilled Punch
Item_Ocean_Harvest_019.description: A fruit punch with a blend of sauces, juices, and various spices. Best served chilled.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_020.name: Ginger Lemonade
Item_Ocean_Harvest_020.description: Has a strong sour and spicy taste, able to drive away coldness in the body.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_021.name: Seafood Sauce
Item_Ocean_Harvest_021.description: Not actually made with seafood, this seafood sauce is used for cooking.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_022.name: Seawater Fish Fin
Item_Ocean_Harvest_022.description: An important organ for fish to maintain balance, but deep-sea fish seem to have evolved to use it as a weapon.
source: Grand Sea: Hunting Jadescale Feathered Serpents

Item_Ocean_Harvest_023.name: Cachalot Bone
Item_Ocean_Harvest_023.description: The behemoth roams the depths of the sea, setting off a tsunami.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_024.name: Ambergris
Item_Ocean_Harvest_024.description: A secretion with a special flavor, which exudes a surprisingly wonderful fragrance after dilution.
source: Periodically produced by Grand Sea: Umbra Whale

Item_Ocean_Harvest_025.name: Neon Material
Item_Ocean_Harvest_025.description: Biologically secreted fluorescent substances will even make you shine after you eat them.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_026.name: Slime
Item_Ocean_Harvest_026.description: Please avoid direct contact during collection as it is difficult to clean the stain.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_028.name: Tentacle
Item_Ocean_Harvest_028.description: Tentacles that are soft to the touch, which may contain small amounts of toxins.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_029.name: Poison Sac
Item_Ocean_Harvest_029.description: A poison sac that stores toxins. It's fine to look at it, but do not lick.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_030.name: Stingray Mouthparts
Item_Ocean_Harvest_030.description: A sharp mouthpiece that can tear the enemy apart. Not something that you want to mess with.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_031.name: Turtle Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_031.description: If you can't eat it directly, grind it into powder and consume it with water. Merchants will always find a way to sell.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_032.name: Turtle Spine
Item_Ocean_Harvest_032.description: An effective weapon that the dragon-necked turtle uses for passive defense.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_033.name: Swordfish Fin
Item_Ocean_Harvest_033.description: Spikes are sharp as a sword and powerful when charging.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_034.name: Cuttlebone
Item_Ocean_Harvest_034.description: The inner shell of the gray cuttle, which has high medicinal value.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_035.name: Skull Shark Skeleton
Item_Ocean_Harvest_035.description: It's hard to imagine how evolution could bring machinery and biology together.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_036.name: Skull Shark Tooth
Item_Ocean_Harvest_036.description: On average, skull sharks replace their teeth once a week, and it sounds like they never have to go to the dentist.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_037.name: Skull Shark Egg
Item_Ocean_Harvest_037.description: With a thick egg sheath, signs of life become visible when you look at it against the light.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_038.name: Conch Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_038.description: The fresh conch meat is rich and smooth. This delicious food is a must-have appetizer.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_039.name: Small Hard Shell
Item_Ocean_Harvest_039.description: A hard shell that gets stronger when it is smaller in size.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_040.name: Shoddy Single Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_040.description: A shoddy single horn that offers no value.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_041.name: Shed Single Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_041.description: A naturally shed single horn with a flawless look.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_042.name: Grayspace Wing Membrane
Item_Ocean_Harvest_042.description: The wing membrane that ripples in the sea can bring great horror.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_043.name: Sea Meme
Item_Ocean_Harvest_043.description: Genetic information that organisms have evolved to adapt to the deep-sea environment.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_044.name: Filth
Item_Ocean_Harvest_044.description: The filth hidden inside the swamp has no special value.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_045.name: Fanged Mackerel Fangs
Item_Ocean_Harvest_045.description: Dense spiral entrenched teeth that can tear the prey apart.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_046.name: Electric Storage Sac
Item_Ocean_Harvest_046.description: Contains high voltage current. Please apply some special measures before touching.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_047.name: Large Hard Shell
Item_Ocean_Harvest_047.description: A large hard shell that can host marine organisms and is very strong.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_048.name: Snout Snail Tusk
Item_Ocean_Harvest_048.description: The teeth of snout snails are incredibly hard.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_049.name: Snout Snail Wings
Item_Ocean_Harvest_049.description: Thin wings that flow in the sea, seem to have special kinetic energy.
source: Defeat the snout snail with a specific element.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_050.name: Disintegrated Gravel
Item_Ocean_Harvest_050.description: Disintegrated debris after the volcanic eruption. They hit the prey with a strong heat flow that impacted the prey.
source: Grand Sea Volcano Entrance: Defeat Haboela

Item_Ocean_Harvest_051.name: Disintegrated Core
Item_Ocean_Harvest_051.description: The disintegrated core that supports Haboela's actions, which offers great research value.
source: Grand Sea Volcano Entrance: Defeat Haboela

Item_Ocean_Harvest_052.name: Haboela's Giant Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_052.description: Haboela's iconic horn. Acquiring it will show your strength.
source: Grand Sea Volcano Entrance: Defeat Haboela

Item_Ocean_Harvest_054.name: Elementia
Item_Ocean_Harvest_054.description: It seems to be a special organ that reacts to various elements, and is also an unsolved mystery about deep sea Abyssants.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_056.name: Disc Coral
Item_Ocean_Harvest_056.description: Layers of coral. Seems to be common.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_058.name: Algae
Item_Ocean_Harvest_058.description: The seaweed that drifts with the tide seems to be carefree.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_060.name: Rock Conch
Item_Ocean_Harvest_060.description: Conch that is unique to submarine volcanic hot springs.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_061.name: Red Shell
Item_Ocean_Harvest_061.description: Shellfish that is unique to submarine volcanic hot springs.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_062.name: Filamentous Hygrobacterium
Item_Ocean_Harvest_062.description: Spectral blue fungi dropped from grove fungus.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_063.name: Glandular Filaments
Item_Ocean_Harvest_063.description: Spider silk secreted by Abyssant: Nakya. Very resilient.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest1.name: High-spec Sensor
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest1.description: High-specification parts with ultra-high sensitivity, essential for the production of special equipment.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest2.name: Pressure Control Unit
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest2.description: Essential unit for submarine machinery, which can be automatically adjusted according to the pressure to protect the operation of the equipment.
source: Dragon Breath Volcano: Combat Simulation Device

Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest3.name: Resilient Film
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest3.description: Extremely tough membrane-like material that can withstand high-pressure environments.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_001.name: Begonia
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_001.description: A colorful and alluring flower with petals that are often used as a seasoning.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_002.name: Sorrel
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_002.description: A herbaceous plant exclusive to Marshville, rich in minerals, ideal for brewing tea or making soup.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_003.name: Peach
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_003.description: A specialty peach that's nutritious, juicy, sweet, and delicious.
source: Near the Aquaville Distant Beacon Entrance

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_004.name: Bamboo Shoots
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_004.description: A bamboo shoot that has been immediately dug out upon emerging from the ground. An earthen smell still lingers on it.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_005.name: Black Crow's Feather
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_005.description: The whistling from it cutting through the wind seems audible as you gaze upon it.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_006.name: Zhuyan Scale Mail
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_006.description: The patterns on the scale mail make it obvious that it was no ordinary civilization behind its creation.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_007.name: Graystone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_007.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. An essential material used in the production of certain alloy devices.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_008.name: Red Ore
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_008.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its bright crimson hue is eerily reminiscent of blood.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_009.name: Sky Crystal
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_009.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its crystal-clear appearance sparkles brightly in the sunlight.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_010.name: Umbra Rock
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_010.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its unusual texture grants it a strange color.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_011.name: Standard Lamellar Armor
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_011.description: A small, standard-style lamellar armor that offers pretty good defensive performance.
source: Ignisville: Defeat Ignisville Domain Guard dark wretch
Ignisville: Defeat Joltville Domain Guard dark wretch
Aquaville: Defeat Aquaville Domain Guard dark wretches

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_012.name: Green Jade
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_012.description: Unique to Ignisville, it is green on the outside and white on the inside. Smooth like jade, it has a crunchy mouthfeel and is slightly sweet, from whence it gets its name: Green Jade.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_013.name: Colorful Scale
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_013.description: A large scale that reflects various colors in light.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_014.name: Sorghum
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_014.description: A herbaceous plant, highly adaptable. It was consumed as a stable food in times of food shortage.
source: Possible drop from picking Domain 9 plants

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_015.name: Green Plum
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_015.description: Mildly sweet, it promotes the secretion of saliva and slakes thirst. Often consumed as a snack by those who like sour.
source: Possible drop from picking Domain 9 plants

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_016.name: Ginseng
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_016.description: Warm in nature and sweet with a touch of bitterness, it tonifies vital energy, restores veins, strengthens the spleen, nourishes the lungs, promotes the secretion of body fluid, and soothes the nerves.
source: Possible drop from picking Domain 9 plants

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_017.name: Lingzhi
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_017.description: A precious medicinal material that grows only in a few regions. It supports the healthy energy, and nourishes and strengthens the body.
source: Possible drop from picking Domain 9 plants

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_018.name: Jadestone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_018.description: A piece of rough jadestone just mined from the mountains. It can be processed and made into various vessels.
source: Possible drop from smashing Domain 9 ores

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_019.name: Roughstone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_019.description: A piece of raw ore, a necessity for forging and smelting.
source: Possible drop from smashing Domain 9 ores

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_020.name: Raw Crystal
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_020.description: A piece of rough crystal, it needs to be processed and polished before it can be made into various articles.
source: Possible drop from smashing Domain 9 ores

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_021.name: Shellstone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_021.description: A piece of rock that grows from the shell on a beast's back.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_022.name: Beast Bone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_022.description: A bone of a wild beast that seems to also possess a special medicinal effect.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_023.name: Beast Hide
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_023.description: Animal hide that can be processed into various leather products.
source: Marshville: Defeat ink foxes and trichroma foxes

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_024.name: Silk Cocoon
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_024.description: The silkworm has long turned into a moth and took off, leaving behind an empty cocoon.
source: Joltville: Purchase from Brocade House Apprentice

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_025.name: Salt
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_025.description: The salt extracted from the brine crystallization in the mine is an important raw material used in both cooking and production.
source: Joltville: Purchase from Jade Dew Corner

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_026.name: Brocade Rice
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_026.description: A stable food for the people of Domain 9, also used to brew alcoholic drinks.
source: Joltville: Purchase from Jade Dew Corner

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_027.name: Medicinal Herbs
source: Joltville: Purchase from Golden Elixir Pavilion

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_028.name: Weapon License
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_028.description: A key system that grants permission to use weapons.
source: Aquaville: Defeat Tie Yuan dark wretches

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_029.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_029.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_030.name: Power Core
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_030.description: A very valuable Power Core that keeps machinery running.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_031.name: Mechs Bolt
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_031.description: A common mechanical part that may be small but very useful.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_032.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_032.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_033.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_033.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

PENPEN_Harvest.name: Pet Control Module
PENPEN_Harvest.description: The control module used to upgrade Pen Pen's jetpack. Its control system is more suitable for Pen Pen.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

Item_Jiuyu_Mine_01.name: Dark Essence
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_01.description: A crystal formed on the surface from leaking leyline energy. Affected by the environment, it produces a lattice that tends to reflect more purple light, from whence it gets its name. It is a low-energy source.

Item_Jiuyu_Mine_02.name: Ginger Essence
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_02.description: A crystal formed through energy leaking to the surface from leylines. Easily affected by the environment, these produce a lattice that reflects more yellow light, from whence it gets its name. It is a high-energy source.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_001.name: Perfect Ascension Elixir
Item_Jiuyu_Market_001.description: A beverage brewed with selected grains and a small amount of scarce ingredients. Its price sure reflects its outstanding quality.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_002.name: Bamboo Leaf Brew
Item_Jiuyu_Market_002.description: The ingredients are wrapped inside bamboo leaves to ferment. The resulted drink thus has the fragrance of bamboo, mellow and good for the health.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_003.name: Maiden's Fragrance
Item_Jiuyu_Market_003.description: It has been a traditional custom for over a thousand years that when a family gives birth to a daughter, they will host a banquet where this beverage is served to neighbors and friends, hence the name.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_004.name: White Jade Dew
Item_Jiuyu_Market_004.description: A drink carefully brewed with top-quality mountain spring water, refreshing and fragrant at a very reasonable price.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_005.name: Herbal Marrow Brew
Item_Jiuyu_Market_005.description: Fifteen different herbs are prepared and processed in combination with the bones of beasts to make this drink. There's a hint of bitterness from the herbs. It is believed to be good for the body, prolong life, nourish vital energy, and preserve the health.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_006.name: Tusu Wine
Item_Jiuyu_Market_006.description: Tusu originally refers to a kind of broad-leaved grass, which is surprisingly not used in this drink but an inspiration for the trademark.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_007.name: Fruity Rice Punch
Item_Jiuyu_Market_007.description: A drink made with a variety of fruits and sweet rice, a favorite among children in Domain 9.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_008.name: Enlightenment Tablet
Item_Jiuyu_Market_008.description: It appears to be a tablet but is actually a large number of nano-droids that will automatically screen and treat lesions as soon as they get inside. However, they are unable to tackle severe diseases.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_009.name: Wang's Dragon Amrita
Item_Jiuyu_Market_009.description: One dose of this top-secret recipe of the Wang clan is said to be able to renew life for the dying for another hour.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_010.name: Herbal Longevity Tonic
Item_Jiuyu_Market_010.description: An oral solution made of all natural herbal essence extracts. Take it and start to feel energetic and strong again.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_011.name: Bone Plaster
Item_Jiuyu_Market_011.description: Cover the affected area with it and the medicine will slowly penetrate into the skin, effectively easing the pain.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_012.name: Golden Vein Ointment
Item_Jiuyu_Market_012.description: Promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis, relaxing tendons and activating collaterals, it's effective against injuries from falls, fractures, contusions, and strains.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_013.name: Fast-Acting Heart Capsule
Item_Jiuyu_Market_013.description: It can effectively protect the blood vessels by promoting blood circulation and maintaining a healthy heart rate.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_014.name: Rejuvenation Compound
Item_Jiuyu_Market_014.description: The pill carefully made using a compound formula can restore your complexion to a certain extent.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_015.name: Moon Glow Satin
Item_Jiuyu_Market_015.description: This design colored using Brocade House's special secret dyes can reflect unique patterns under the moonlight. Each bolt of it is said to be different, extremely scarce resulting in a long wait time after ordering.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_016.name: Limpid Cicada Wings
Item_Jiuyu_Market_016.description: This fabric made of silk soaked in Brocade House's secret formula is light and cool, perfect for hot summer days.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_017.name: Minghai Linen
Item_Jiuyu_Market_017.description: The silk material with an exquisite pattern is personally designed and produced by Master Minghai, suitable for all kinds of clothing.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_018.name: Spirit Beast Fleece
Item_Jiuyu_Market_018.description: The flannelette woven with animal fleece provides excellent thermal protection.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_019.name: Summer Floral Brocade
Item_Jiuyu_Market_019.description: Elaborately dyed brocade with a complex pattern specially for summer wear, silky and refreshing, comfortable and highly durable.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_020.name: Jade Yarn
Item_Jiuyu_Market_020.description: This plain yarn is commonly used by ordinary people to make curtains or other clothing.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_021.name: Mercerized Cotton
Item_Jiuyu_Market_021.description: This fabric is commonly used by ordinary people in Domain 9, warm and comfortable, easy to dye and very cost-effective.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_022.name: Titabalt Longsword
Item_Jiuyu_Market_022.description: A standard long sword made of a recently developed rare alloy. Light, sharp, practical, and beautiful, often carried by a guard of honor.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_023.name: Blackflame Censer
Item_Jiuyu_Market_023.description: An average looking incense burner, but it can actually control the shape of the smoke thanks to its extremely complicated internal structure. It can enhance one's quality of life and relax one's mood when used at home.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_024.name: Composite Stone Slate
Item_Jiuyu_Market_024.description: A marble spliced stone slab, often chosen as a floor material for relatively solemn places.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_025.name: Jade Smithing Bench
Item_Jiuyu_Market_025.description: Smithing benches are commonly found in jade shops for processing various ores and jade materials. However, since opening aggregates became a popular pastime, smithing benches are made more and more exquisitely these days to meet the needs of metaphysics.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_026.name: Agarwood Box
Item_Jiuyu_Market_026.description: A box made of agarwood with an exquisite pattern, it exudes a refreshing fragrance.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_027.name: Beasthide Bag
Item_Jiuyu_Market_027.description: A purse made of animal fur. Cheap, durable, and trendy in style.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_028.name: Forging Hammer
Item_Jiuyu_Market_028.description: A small hammer for forging, but many people also use it to hit other things and charge accordingly.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_029.name: Shengwen Carved Dracojade Box
Item_Jiuyu_Market_029.description: A jade container with a very exquisite pattern. You know it's expensive at first glance.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_030.name: Emerald Fan
Item_Jiuyu_Market_030.description: The perfect choice of color and texture together with an ingenious design created this most desirable shape.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_031.name: Two-Sided Jade Pendant
Item_Jiuyu_Market_031.description: A pendant carved out of a fine piece of jade with the most exquisite techniques, a perfect accessory for a respectable man.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_032.name: Auspicious Animal Seal
Item_Jiuyu_Market_032.description: A seal engraved with various fabled auspicious animals. Rarely used these days, it's pursued by many literati to add to their private collection or to make their personal seal.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_033.name: Crystal Bangle
Item_Jiuyu_Market_033.description: A crystal bangle, clear and translucent but not selling very well due to its cheap glass look.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_034.name: Jadestone Tea Set
Item_Jiuyu_Market_034.description: A tea set made of jade, not so much for drinking tea but to admire and appreciate.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Jiuyu_Market_035.name: Exquisite Rock Carving
Item_Jiuyu_Market_035.description: A white marble carving of a carp jumping over the dragon gate. A pair of it makes a fine gift.
source: Joltville: Reward for submitting bazaar orders

Item_Vera_GameToken.name: Arcade coupon
Item_Vera_GameToken.description: These coupons obtained from the arcade games in the Mirroria Entertainment Center can be redeemed for amazing gifts.

Item_Vera_RaceToken.name: Race point
Item_Vera_RaceToken.description: Obtained by participating in group races.
source: Join the racing event in Mirroria

Item_Vera_Chip.name: Copper Bloom
Item_Vera_Chip.description: A special token only usable within Joy Square. Use miras to exchange for it at the entrance.

Item_8v8_coin.name: Critical Point
Item_8v8_coin.description: A specially prepared reward for those who muster up the courage to stare into the Abyss.

Item_FishCoin.name: Fisherman Token
Item_FishCoin.description: Currency used by fishing professionals to trade their catches, each is one engraved with a different kind of fish.
source: Go fishing and sell what you caught

Item_ColosseumCoin.name: Beast Coin
Item_ColosseumCoin.description: Coins earned through matches in the Beast Brawl Arena. Can be used to redeem rewards.

Item_BattleField_Resource.name: Discarded Swords
source: Marshville: Defeat Yi Hu Dark Wretches
Marshville: Defeat Marshville Domain Guard dark wretches

Blindbox_coin_03.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_03.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.

Blindbox_coin_04.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_04.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.

Blindbox_coin_05.name: Exhibition Coupon
Blindbox_coin_05.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.

Blindbox_coin_06.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_06.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.

Item_Condiment_01.name: Carbonated water
Item_Condiment_01.description: Pretty bland but gives off a tingling sensation. Probably better when blended with something else.

Item_Condiment_02.name: Soy
Item_Condiment_02.description: One of the popular emergency provisions and the main ingredient for various products. Take it straight and you might get the runs.

Item_Condiment_03.name: Salad dressing
Item_Condiment_03.description: The perfect complement for salads. Few things are better than a perfect salad with the perfect dressing.

Item_Condiment_04.name: Wasabi
Item_Condiment_04.description: A condiment appreciated by those who seem to prefer choking while eating their food... Gak!

Item_Greens010.name: Peat moss
Item_Greens010.description: The best choice for detox, though it has a weird taste.

Item_Greens011.name: Black moss
Item_Greens011.description: Grows on the exposed cliff face. It's edible, at least.

Item_Condiment_05.name: Onion
Item_Condiment_05.description: Nutritious and full of flavor, teary eyes are the price for preparation, though.

Item_Condiment_06.name: Rice
Item_Condiment_06.description: Has a unique aroma after it's cooked. One of the most versatile ingredients in the world.

Item_Condiment_07.name: Milk
Item_Condiment_07.description: A nutrient product of maternal love.

Item_Mushroom_003.name: Raincap
Item_Mushroom_003.description: Sprouts toward the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Item_Mushroom_0031.name: Umbrella mushroom
Item_Mushroom_0031.description: Has a very distinct taste and is incredibly delicious.

Item_Mushroom_0041.name: Treecap
Item_Mushroom_0041.description: Fungi growing on trees. So-so in taste.

Item_Mushroom_0042.name: Woodear fungus
Item_Mushroom_0042.description: What? You never had it before? You're missing out, my friend!

Item_Fishes0051.name: Common taimen
Item_Fishes0051.description: Omnivorous fish with a very long maturity cycle, can grow up to 2 meters.

Item_Milk_003.name: Quality milk
Item_Milk_003.description: A common beverage, ready to drink and may be stored for a while. A nutritious fave.

Item_Fruit_0021.name: Mock strawberry
Item_Fruit_0021.description: A dead ringer for strawberry with a similar flavor.

Item_Meat_006.name: Prime Cut
Item_Meat_006.description: The more the beast moved, the better the meat.

Item_Staples_0031.name: Snowy potato
Item_Staples_0031.description: Tastes great when baked, but eating too much of it won't make you pleasant around other people.

Item_Nuts0031.name: Spire nuts
Item_Nuts0031.description: A special variant of pinecone. Very rare, so get it when you have a chance!

Item_Follows0011.name: Cauliflower
Item_Follows0011.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Item_Greens_0031.name: Broccoflower
Item_Greens_0031.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Item_Gold.name: Gold
Item_Gold.description: This coin, minted from tin and gold, is currently the most popular currency across the land.

Item_vigor.name: Vitality
Item_vigor.description: Wanderer's vitality that replenishes every day. Can be used to participate in various events.

Item_MedalofValor_1.name: Warrior badge I
Item_MedalofValor_1.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
source: Join Limited-Time Event: A Warrior's Efforts

Item_MedalofValor_2.name: Warrior badge II
Item_MedalofValor_2.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
source: Join the limited-time event: Executor Training.

Blindbox_coin_01.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_01.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.

Blindbox_coin_02.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_02.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.

mount_006_coin.name: Exhibition Coupon
mount_006_coin.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.

Item_Reputation1.name: Bounty EXP
Item_Reputation1.description: Made out of special metal and represents the contributions from the wanders of Aida to this planet. Worth endeavoring for.

Item_Reputation2.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation2.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.

Item_Reputation3.name: Navia bounty coin
Item_Reputation3.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of a mechanical windmill. Can be used to exchange for special items.

Item_Reputation4.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation4.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.

Item_Reputation5.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation5.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.

item_GuildMeritorious.name: Merit
item_GuildMeritorious.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

Item_Guildcapital.name: Crew Fund
Item_Guildcapital.description: Obtained through daily Crew activities and donations.

Item_Experience.name: EXP
Item_Experience.description: A mysterious yet powerful force for character growth.

Item_Diamond.name: Tanium
Item_Diamond.description: Stable crystals, most commonly used for energy supply. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.

Item_Artifact_updata.name: Omnium alloy
Item_Artifact_updata.description: The latest metal material made from multiple types of metals with Omnium with good hardness, quality, and ductility. Mostly used for refining high-tech weapons and machines.

Item_FakeDiamond.name: Dark Crystal
Item_FakeDiamond.description: Contains unstable energy and is sometimes used as a power source. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.

item_guild_1.name: Merit
item_guild_1.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

item_guild_2.name: Crew Fund
item_guild_2.description: Obtained through daily Crew activities and donations.

item_guild_3.name: Crew honor
item_guild_3.description: Obtained through Crew missions for rewards on the Crew page.

item_ticket_01.name: Proof of Purchase
item_ticket_01.description: From Banges Tech, Matrix chip home delivery available.

item_Cafe_1.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_1.description: Meat, veggies, and fruit. When mixed properly, they can orchestrate a delicacy as well.

item_Cafe_2.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_2.description: Some prefer to cut it into slices and eat it raw. However, it also tastes good when simply cooked.

item_Cafe_3.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_3.description: Fresh turkey stewed with the right ingredients for a total of forty-nine days...

item_Cafe_4.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_4.description: A perfect combo of pastry and fruit. Children's favorite.

item_Cafe_5.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_5.description: A drink made from common fruits.

item_Cafe_100.name: Mysterious ingredient
item_Cafe_100.description: One has to figure out how to cook it themself through research.

StrengthenStone_01.name: Booster Module
StrengthenStone_01.description: A common mechanical part, available in many different sizes.
source: Daily Supply - Black Market Supply Box

StrengthenStone_02.name: Advancement Module
StrengthenStone_02.description: A component with aim assist and weapon adjustment system for precision firing.
source: Daily Supply - Black Market Supply Box

StrengthenStone_03.name: Booster Module II
StrengthenStone_03.description: A common mechanical part, available in many different sizes.
source: Type III Key: Rudolph password chest
Type III Key: Magma password chest
Type III Key: Culton password chest
Type III Key: Harrah password chest
Type III Key: Eva password chest
Type III Key: Nakya password chest

StrengthenStone_04.name: Advancement Module II
StrengthenStone_04.description: A component with aim assist and weapon adjustment system for precision firing.
source: Type III Key: Rudolph password chest
Type III Key: Magma password chest

StrengthenStone_05.name: Booster Module III
StrengthenStone_05.description: A rare, high-precision component with a low yield.

StrengthenStone_06.name: Advancement Module III
StrengthenStone_06.description: A component with aim assist and weapon adjustment system for precision firing.

EVA_stone_01.name: Radiant Alloy
EVA_stone_01.description: Material developed by Mirroria for the maintenance of the Radiance mecha. Used to enhance its combat capabilities.
source: Dropped from the Defense Breach event

EVA_stone_02.name: Lumicore Drive
EVA_stone_02.description: Material developed by Mirroria for the modification of the Radiance mecha. Used to significantly enhance its combat capabilities.
source: Dropped from the Defense Breach event

EVA_stone_03.name: Power Module
EVA_stone_03.description: An electronic component containing the power supply component of an EVA, featuring high-level manufacturing difficulty. Can be used for its maintenance and tier-up.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

EVA_stone_04.name: Advanced Power Module
EVA_stone_04.description: An electronic component containing the power supply component of EVA, featuring high-level manufacturing difficulty. Can be used for its maintenance and tier-up.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

EVA_stone_box.name: Mecha Upgrade Material Supply Box
EVA_stone_box.description: A specially prepared exploration giftbox for Executors, containing essentials for enhancing their mecha.
source: Obtained from the Town Tour Sweepstakes event.

StrengthenStone_Balance_01.name: Enhancement Welding Material
StrengthenStone_Balance_01.description: Welding material used for equipment enhancement. Use it to significantly enhance your equipment.
source: Daily Supply - Black Market Supply Box

StrengthenStone_Balance_02.name: Enhancement Chip
StrengthenStone_Balance_02.description: A new model of equipment chip. Use it for advancement upgrades of the built-in systems of your equipment.
source: Daily Supply - Black Market Supply Box

EquipFragment.name: Base Chip
EquipFragment.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.
source: Order Matrices with proofs of purchase
Obtained via conversion after overclocking chip expiration

WeaponFragment.name: Black Gold
WeaponFragment.description: Token forged by smiths from old Omnium weapons. Circulated only in special markets. Redeemable for weapons.
source: Obtained via conversion when the flame gold is expired
