Item_Mine001.name: Iron Ore
Item_Mine001.description: One of the most commonly seen metal ores that has a wide variety of usages.

Item_Mine002.name: Tungsten
Item_Mine002.description: A rare ore that can only be found in high altitude localities. Despite its plain appearance, the ore contains massive energy.

Item_Mine003.name: Titanium ore
Item_Mine003.description: A rare ore that only grows on high mountains. It's the ideal material in the view of blacksmiths.

Item_Mine004.name: Striped stone
Item_Mine004.description: A type of ore commonly seen near waterfalls that got its name for the stripes washed out by the current. Although it looks special, it is not good for forging.

Item_Plant001.name: Lilies
Item_Plant001.description: A common plant normally seen around St. Maurice. The flowers are white and pure, so they're often used in important ceremonies.

Item_Plant002.name: Azaleas
Item_Plant002.description: Common flowers that grow on plains and platforms. Judging from their bright color, maybe we can use them to dye hair?

Item_Plant003.name: Violets
Item_Plant003.description: Flowers with a luxury color that grow on high mountains and loved by women.

Item_Mine_fire.name: Firecore
Item_Mine_fire.description: Shards with fire elemental power, give off a slight heat when melted down.

Item_Mine_fire_02.name: Heart of Lava
Item_Mine_fire_02.description: Rare ore containing fire elemental power. The fiery redness is a sufficient proof of the power within.

Item_Mine_fire_03.name: Sunsource
Item_Mine_fire_03.description: Rare ore containing great fire elemental power. You can feel the swelling heat inside just holding it.

Item_Mine_ice.name: Icecore
Item_Mine_ice.description: Shards with ice elemental power, clear as a crystal.

Item_Mine_ice_02.name: Heart of Winter
Item_Mine_ice_02.description: Rare ore with ice elemental power. The high purity ice element within gives it a rich blue appearance.

Item_Mine_ice_03.name: Snowsource
Item_Mine_ice_03.description: Rare ore containing great ice elemental power. A thin cold vapor always shrouds it, like an eternal layer of frost.

Item_Mine_thunder.name: Magcore
Item_Mine_thunder.description: Shards with volt elemental power, glow faintly in the dark.

Item_Mine_thunder_02.name: Heart of Lightning
Item_Mine_thunder_02.description: Rare ore with volt elemental power. Flashes can be seen inside it in good lighting.

Item_Mine_thunder_03.name: Lightningsource
Item_Mine_thunder_03.description: Rare ore containing great volt elemental power, whose surface periodically emits electricity. So handle with care or you'll get zapped.

Item_Mine_physic.name: Rockcore
Item_Mine_physic.description: Extremely hard shards formed under Omnium's influence, with a drab appearance.

Item_Mine_physic_02.name: Heart of Summit
Item_Mine_physic_02.description: Rare and extremely hard ore that requires special Omnium technology to forge.

Item_Mine_physic_03.name: Landsource
Item_Mine_physic_03.description: Whole and hard rare ore. The transparent crystal sometimes emits a tiny unknown pulse like a heartbeat.

Item_Mine_superpower.name: Activator Block
Item_Mine_superpower.description: The ore shard containing altered energy which pulses with an extremely weak life sign...
source: Low chance of collecting elemental ores
Purchase and use an Active Ore Collector.

Item_Mine_superpower_02.name: Fission Crystal
Item_Mine_superpower_02.description: The rare ore containing altered energy which continues to divide and expand like cells.

Item_Mine_superpower_03.name: Proliferating Crystal Cluster
Item_Mine_superpower_03.description: A huge, rare ore rich in altered energy. It seems to be using its own consciousness to seek evolution and will continue to grow if left unchecked.

Item_breakthrough_A1.name: Nano Coating I
Item_breakthrough_A1.description: Coating developed from new technology that slightly improves weapon performance.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chest II

Item_breakthrough_A2.name: Nano Coating II
Item_breakthrough_A2.description: Redeveloped coating after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_A3.name: Nano Coating III
Item_breakthrough_A3.description: Coating developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B1.name: Acidproof Glaze I
Item_breakthrough_B1.description: Acidproof material developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chest II

Item_breakthrough_B2.name: Acidproof Glaze II
Item_breakthrough_B2.description: Redeveloped glaze after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B3.name: Acidproof Glaze III
Item_breakthrough_B3.description: Glaze developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C1.name: Booster Frame I
Item_breakthrough_C1.description: Fortified framework developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chest II

Item_breakthrough_C2.name: Booster Frame II
Item_breakthrough_C2.description: Redeveloped frame after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C3.name: Booster Frame III
Item_breakthrough_C3.description: Fortified framework developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D1.name: Nanofiber Frame I
Item_breakthrough_D1.description: Premium frame developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chest II

Item_breakthrough_D2.name: Nanofiber Frame II
Item_breakthrough_D2.description: Redeveloped premium frame after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D3.name: Nanofiber Frame III
Item_breakthrough_D3.description: Premium framework developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_fire.name: Ionic Crystal: Inferno
Item_breakthrough_fire.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain high concentrations of flame energy.

Item_breakthrough_ice.name: Ionic Crystal: Blizzard
Item_breakthrough_ice.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain high concentrations of frost energy.

Item_breakthrough_thunder.name: Ionic Crystal: Thunderbolt
Item_breakthrough_thunder.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain high concentrations of volt energy.

Item_breakthrough_physic.name: Ionic Crystal: Concentration
Item_breakthrough_physic.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain extremely high concentrations of energy.

Item_equiptupo_A1.name: Movement Coordination Module
Item_equiptupo_A1.description: An advanced module for coordinating combat stances.
source: Void Abyss Monthly First Clear Reward

Item_equiptupo_B1.name: Sense Enhancement Module
Item_equiptupo_B1.description: Enhances perception of combat situations. Empowers sharp senses of battle even in heavy armor.
source: Void Abyss Monthly First Clear Reward

Item_equiptupo_C1.name: Core Control Module
Item_equiptupo_C1.description: Core module used to control the complete set of equipment flexibly and effectively.
source: Void Abyss Monthly First Clear Reward

Item_equiptupo_D1.name: Information Processing Module
Item_equiptupo_D1.description: Used for combat information processing. It has adopted the latest chip architecture and offers powerful information processing and computing capabilities.
source: Void Abyss Monthly First Clear Reward

Item_equiptupo_E1.name: Armor Management Module
Item_equiptupo_E1.description: A key module for efficient armor management.
source: Void Abyss Monthly First Clear Reward

Item_equiptupo_F1.name: High Speed Transmission Module
Item_equiptupo_F1.description: Machinery module with an ultra-high transmission coefficient that can make unbelievable actions, even under high-speed maneuvers.
source: Void Abyss Monthly First Clear Reward

Item_equiptupo_coin.name: Augmentation Factor
Item_equiptupo_coin.description: Accumulated experimental data needed for equipment augmentation.

Item_equiptupo_reroll1.name: Augment Stats Fortification Chip
Item_equiptupo_reroll1.description: A protective chip used to secure augmentation stat data.

Item_equiptupo_reroll2.name: Random Stats Fortification Chip
Item_equiptupo_reroll2.description: A protective chip used to secure random stats.

fragment_breakthrough_fire.name: Crystal Shard: Inferno
fragment_breakthrough_fire.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain high concentrations of flame energy.

fragment_breakthrough_ice.name: Crystal Shard: Blizzard
fragment_breakthrough_ice.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain high concentrations of frost energy.

fragment_breakthrough_thunder.name: Crystal Shard: Thunderbolt
fragment_breakthrough_thunder.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain high concentrations of volt energy.

fragment_breakthrough_physic.name: Crystal Shard: Concentration
fragment_breakthrough_physic.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain extremely high concentrations of energy.

fragment_breakthrough_show_Balance.name: Random Crystal Shard
fragment_breakthrough_show_Balance.description: Using laboratory recrystallization, these artificially produced ionic crystals contain extremely high concentrations of energy.

hardware_001.name: Triangular gear
hardware_001.description: The most essential parts to support the functioning of machines.

hardware_002.name: Alloy round studs
hardware_002.description: Enhanced parts for machines with less weight and increased hardness, and thus have a higher price.

hardware_003.name: Power Core
hardware_003.description: A very expensive high-tech component, safe and efficient because it blocks radiation while supplying massive Omnium energy.

GenePointItem_Attack.name: Originum (Attack)
GenePointItem_Attack.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

GenePointItem_Assist.name: Originum (Support)
GenePointItem_Assist.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

GenePointItem_Def.name: Originum (Feature)
GenePointItem_Def.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

Mount_Strengthen_1_1.name: E53 Coolant
Mount_Strengthen_1_1.description: A must for vehicle maintenance, also extends generator or engine life.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_1_2.name: FF79 Alloy Lubricant
Mount_Strengthen_1_2.description: Composite lubricant that lasts longer than ordinary lubricants and is environmentally friendly.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_1_3.name: Power Gears
Mount_Strengthen_1_3.description: Very durable alloy gears able to withstand constant operation. A must for vehicle improvement.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_1_4.name: Leveler
Mount_Strengthen_1_4.description: Necessary component to adjust the balance of a vehicle, maximizing its speed by improving stability.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_2_1.name: Precision Instrument
Mount_Strengthen_2_1.description: Instrument to diagnose vehicle conditions, with greater coverage and precision after rounds of development.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_2_2.name: Shock Absorber
Mount_Strengthen_2_2.description: The most popular anti-shock component currently on the market. The quality makes it a beginning retrofitter's choice.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_2_3.name: Universal Bearing
Mount_Strengthen_2_3.description: A common component for reducing friction between rotating parts. As the most prevalent of its kind, it has different models for different spots.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_2_4.name: Electronic Control Unit
Mount_Strengthen_2_4.description: A component with aim assist and vehicle adjustment system for precision firing.
source: Open password chests after Dimension level 30.

Mount_Strengthen_3_1.name: Turbocharger
Mount_Strengthen_3_1.description: Advanced turbo system developed by Banges Tech to greatly improve engine performance, thus a popular component for racers.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chests
Rare drop by boss level mechs

Mount_Strengthen_3_2.name: High-Performance Transmission
Mount_Strengthen_3_2.description: Component attached to the engine. Most users are thrilled by the sudden acceleration it provides, but its true value lies in the reliable, efficient deceleration.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chests
Rare drop by boss level mechs

Mount_Strengthen_3_3.name: Gyroscope
Mount_Strengthen_3_3.description: A component interconnecting major parts, relying on flexible rotations to reduce friction, extend lifespan of parts, and cut down on noise.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chests
Rare drop by boss level mechs

Mount_Strengthen_3_4.name: High-Energy Battery
Mount_Strengthen_3_4.description: Advanced Omnium battery developed by Hykros. Safety and efficiency are the biggest selling points.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chests
Rare drop by boss level mechs

Mount_Strengthen_4_1.name: Power Core
Mount_Strengthen_4_1.description: A very expensive high-tech component, safe and efficient because it blocks radiation while supplying massive Omnium energy.
source: Random loot by deciphering password chest II
Rare drop by boss level mechs

Mount_Strengthen_4_2.name: Titanium Housing

source: Void Abyss Monthly First Clear Reward

fragment_FightPet_1.name: Kalka Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_1.description: An early smart servant model developed by Dr. Claire of Cetus Island. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
source: Domain 9: Use a Signet II to open a Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Zhuyan Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Black Crow Tai Chi Chest
Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Taotie Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Obtained from some Vermilion Chests

fragment_FightPet_2.name: Void Angel Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_2.description: A multi-purpose smart servant from the Old Federation days that can be used in a variety of situations. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
source: Domain 9: Use a Signet II to open a Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Black Crow Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Zhuyan Tai Chi Chest
Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Taotie Tai Chi Chest

fragment_FightPet_3.name: Angela Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_3.description: A smart servant from the Old Federation days originally intended for use as an entertainment performer. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
source: Domain 9: Use a Signet II to open a Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Zhuyan Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Black Crow Tai Chi Chest
Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Taotie Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Field Energy Hunt completion reward

fragment_FightPet_4.name: Moonrabbit Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_4.description: A mechanical assistant smart servant developed by Banges Tech. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
source: Domain 9: Use a Signet II to open a Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Zhuyan Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Black Crow Tai Chi Chest
Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Taotie Tai Chi Chest

fragment_FightPet_5.name: Flame Sparrow Shard
fragment_FightPet_5.description: A mechanical assistant smart servant developed by Banges Tech. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
source: Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Black Crow Tai Chi Chest

fragment_FightPet_6.name: Mi-a: Assistance Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_6.description: The first encountered smart servant introduced by Shirli back in the Astra Shelter. A quiet one that is really good at taking care of people. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it.
source: Domain 9: Use a Signet II to open a Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Zhuyan Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Black Crow Tai Chi Chest
Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Taotie Tai Chi Chest
Ignisville: Obtained from some Vermilion Chests

fragment_FightPet_7.name: Zongyun Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_7.description: A key product created through collaboration between Tianzhang Pavilion and Niners Heavy Machinery. Its main goal is said to be investing R&D toward the universalization of Madam Qinglong's partner pets.
source: Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Taotie Tai Chi Chest

fragment_FightPet_8.name: Leia Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_8.description: "The 'Ultimate Weapon' series manufactured by Xiling Alliance Co. Ltd., model γ1O-A. Xiling is the sole smart servant supplier to Hykros and is part of the Hykros-Domain 9 Smart Servant Committee. Founded by Ms. Shelly and Ms. Ling Qiao, two of this century's greatest female engineers, the company launched its first mass-produced smart servant in small batches within just a month of its founding. The company is mainly known for its research and production of smart servants, related products, and merchandise. As it moves into the future, the company is focusing more on vertical integration by forming deep connections with famous brands, such as Ultimate Warriors, and creating an original commercial complex. If you're interested in investing, please contact us at * * * - * * * *. To meet new needs in combat, the Smart Servant Combat Module test has been conducted."

fragment_FightPet_9.name: Aurawolf Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_9.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the legends of Domain 9. Its combat module has been tested in response to new combat requirements.
source: Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Taotie Tai Chi Chest

fragment_FightPet_10.name: Snowy Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_10.description: A tiger-themed smart servant that leaves ice crystals in her path. The combat module has been tested in response to new combat requirements.
source: Marshville: Use a Signet to open a Xingtian Tai Chi Chest

fragment_FightPet_11.name: Pen Pen Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_11.description: Misato's pet, usually housed in a custom freezer in Misato Katsuragi's apartment. It enjoys hot baths and can cleverly press buttons with its wingtips. Besides adopting human habits of sleeping and bathing, it even enjoys reading newspapers. However, it somehow got into the fridge when Shinji and others moved into the Star Apartments in Mirroria.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

Item_VeraCoin.name: Mira
Item_VeraCoin.description: The currency issued by and circulates in Mirroria. Can be used on vending machines, service stations, restaurants, and other facilities across Mirroria.

Item_VeraCoinRare.name: Veron
Item_VeraCoinRare.description: Old Mirroria currency that is already out of circulation. It's said that you can still use these coins on some gachapon machines.

Item_JiuyuCoin.name: Dominium
Item_JiuyuCoin.description: A common currency and the only legal currency of Domain 9 issued by Zhen Gong. It contains a small amount of the material used to make timestamps as an anti-counterfeiting measure.
source: Joltville: Pawn items in Prosperity Pawnshop

Item_Show_Equip_0.name: Explorer's Armor
Item_Show_Equip_0.description: Lightweight leather armor worn by the shelter's exploration team.

Item_Show_Equip_1.name: Vanguard Armor
Item_Show_Equip_1.description: No longer used by Hykros, but still a hot item on the black market.

Item_Show_Equip_2.name: Falcon Armor
Item_Show_Equip_2.description: The new material guarantees protection with a simplified design.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

Item_Show_Equip_3.name: Elite Armor
Item_Show_Equip_3.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. Provides excellent defense and resistance in just about any extreme circumstances.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

Item_Show_Equip_4.name: Fortress Armor
Item_Show_Equip_4.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 55.
Play Frontier Clash after reaching Lv. 50

Item_Show_Equip_4_1234.name: Fortress Armor
Item_Show_Equip_4_1234.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.

Item_Show_Equip_White_Balance.name: Wasteland Armor
Item_Show_Equip_White_Balance.description: Armor providing minimal protection, crafted from salvaged scrap parts commonly found in the wastelands.

Item_Show_Equip_Green_Balance.name: Wilderness Armor
Item_Show_Equip_Green_Balance.description: Armor designed to excel in challenging outdoor environments, offering exceptional performance in the wilderness.

Item_Show_Equip_Blue_Balance.name: Stealth Armor
Item_Show_Equip_Blue_Balance.description: Armor designed for covert operations, offering special features such as stealth and concealment.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

Item_Show_Equip_Purple_Balance.name: Tracker's Armor
Item_Show_Equip_Purple_Balance.description: Armor designed for savage hunting, lightweight and agile for swift maneuvers.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

Item_Show_Equip_Orange_Balance.name: Blazing Sky Armor
Item_Show_Equip_Orange_Balance.description: Armor integrated with the Phantom Sky AI assistance, optimizing the wearer's movements, reducing damage taken, and enhancing strength.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 55.
Play Frontier Clash after reaching Lv. 50

TreasureChest1.description: Use it to locate and collect Omnium scattered beneath the surface. Emits partial information intermittently. Just don't let others spot your placement.

TreasureMap.name: Collector signal
TreasureMap.description: Complete information sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.

TreasureMapFragment.description: Partial information sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.

TreasureMapFragment2_1.description: Loose signals sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.

TreasureMapFragment2_2.name: Collector segment
TreasureMapFragment2_2.description: Loose signals sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.

item_activity_cooking_RM_1.name: Apple
item_activity_cooking_RM_1.description: A rare kind of fruit. It's said that it can only be found when collecting fallen fruits in specific seasons. Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_2.name: Wild boar meat
item_activity_cooking_RM_2.description: Wild boar can be found in the forests on Astra. Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_3.name: Turkey
item_activity_cooking_RM_3.description: A rare ingredient. It's said that all the wild turkeys were taken by the Hyenas. Maybe we can get some from them. Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_4.name: Sesame
item_activity_cooking_RM_4.description: A rare ingredient. It's said it looks quite like brown rice. Maybe we can find some while collecting brown rice. Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_5.name: Sugar cube
item_activity_cooking_RM_5.description: A scarce resource in short supply. Maybe we can find some from the Heirs of Aida. Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_6.name: Grapes
item_activity_cooking_RM_6.description: A rare fruit that has never been found in the wild. Some say that the Ravagers have planted some in their secret base. Maybe we can get some from them. Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_7.name: Salmon
item_activity_cooking_RM_7.description: A rare ingredient. Salmon have long been extinct on Aida. Only lake bass come fairly close to how true salmon tastes. Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.
source: Defeat Sobek in the Crown region

item_activity3_food1.name: Glutinous Rice Flour
item_activity3_food1.description: Soft, smooth, and fragrant glutinous rice. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.
source: Collect Homi Grain and Brown Rice
Join the racing event in Mirroria
Participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square

item_activity3_food2.name: Lotus Seed
item_activity3_food2.description: Sweet and silky lotus seeds are delicious when made into a paste! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.
source: Join the racing event in Mirroria
Participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square

item_activity3_food3.name: Black Pepper
item_activity3_food3.description: A whiff of it makes the nose kinda itchy... An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.
source: Join the racing event in Mirroria
Participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square

item_activity3_food4.name: Ice Cream
item_activity3_food4.description: Finish it before it melts! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.
source: Join the racing event in Mirroria
Participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square

item_activity3_food5.name: Bean Paste
item_activity3_food5.description: Enough sugar was put in while it was being made. Add more and you're going to lose some teeth! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.
source: Join the racing event in Mirroria
Participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square

item_activity3_food6.name: Nuts
item_activity3_food6.description: A variety of small and exquisite nuts that are rich in nutrients. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.
source: Collect balloon fruits, pinecones, and hazelnuts
Join the racing event in Mirroria
Participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square

item_activity3_food7.name: Ham
item_activity3_food7.description: Red meat with streaks of white fat gives a unique and delicious flavor. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.
source: Hunt the Gooseneck Beast and Horror Beast
Hunt saber-toothed wolf and flame-red lizard
Hunt the shield armor rhino and giant horn rhino
Join the racing event in Mirroria
Participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square

Harvest_Shells_001.name: Conch
Harvest_Shells_001.description: Legend has it a beautiful, kind girl lives inside. And it tastes pretty good.

Harvest_Shells_002.name: Scallop
Harvest_Shells_002.description: One of the primary food source for coastal dwellers. Already seasoned with sea salt, just grill and serve.

Harvest_Shells_003.name: Carrion snail
Harvest_Shells_003.description: A rare variety of giant snail with a weird appetite, but is surprisingly tasty.

Harvest_Shells_005.name: Hermit crab
Harvest_Shells_005.description: It has grown again! And now it gets a new... steamy "house."

Harvest_Shells_006.name: Portunid
Harvest_Shells_006.description: Sea crabs living on the shallow edge of the sea which sometimes come ashore to soak up the sun. Very delicious.

Harvest_shells_007.name: Sea urchin
Harvest_shells_007.description: A delicacy from the shallow edge of the sea, though not for everyone.

Harvest_shells_008.name: Oyster
Harvest_shells_008.description: A favorite of the luminaries in the city. Rumors circulate about it having special effects.

Harvest_Shells_009.name: Barnacle
Harvest_Shells_009.description: It looks scary, but yummy to the tongue!

Harvest_Fruit_001.name: Fallen Fruit
Harvest_Fruit_001.description: Fruit fallen to the ground. Edible if you clean the mud off.

Harvest_Fruit_002.name: Strawberry
Harvest_Fruit_002.description: Don't wait for it to ripen, or it would be eaten by wild animals long before that.

Harvest_Fruit_003.name: Phosphogranate
Harvest_Fruit_003.description: After the initial sour-sweet taste comes... only blandness left, yet it's a waste to throw it away.

Harvest_Fruit_004.name: Firedragon Fruit
Harvest_Fruit_004.description: Remember to remove the seeds before eating it.

Harvest_Fruit_006.name: Thornmato
Harvest_Fruit_006.description: Although the plant's leaves turned into thorns after being exposed to Omnium radiation, the fruit itself tastes much better than before.

Harvest_Fruit_007.name: Balloon Fruit
Harvest_Fruit_007.description: The matured form goes wherever the wind takes it.

Harvest_Fruit_008.name: Lard gourd
Harvest_Fruit_008.description: Tastes pretty good, actually, despite the irradiated appearance.

Harvest_Greens_001.name: Lettuce
Harvest_Greens_001.description: Are you craving power? Eat it, then you will have infinite power!

Harvest_Greens_002.name: Wild cabbage
Harvest_Greens_002.description: It resembles a ball, but that doesn't mean you can kick it like one.

Harvest_Greens_003.name: Broccoli
Harvest_Greens_003.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Harvest_Greens_005.name: Spicy onion
Harvest_Greens_005.description: Made my eyes water when I cut it, so I tried to rub my face...

Harvest_Greens_007.name: Laver
Harvest_Greens_007.description: A type of kelp. Easily washed ashore by waves.

Harvest_Greens_008.name: Fiddlehead
Harvest_Greens_008.description: Time to eat your veggie! Won't grow tall if you're finicky!

Harvest_Greens_009.name: Fish mint
Harvest_Greens_009.description: If you can stand the taste, you can't get enough of it.

Harvest_Greens_010.name: Peat moss
Harvest_Greens_010.description: The best choice for detox, though it has a weird taste.

Harvest_Greens_011.name: Black moss
Harvest_Greens_011.description: Grows only on the exposed cliff face. It's edible, at least.

Harvest_Mushroom_001.name: Mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_001.description: Fungi seen in wild grasslands. Young lasses just love to pick them.

Harvest_Mushroom_002.name: Suncap
Harvest_Mushroom_002.description: Sprouts toward the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Harvest_Mushroom_004.name: Firecap
Harvest_Mushroom_004.description: Seems to be a variety of woodear fungus transformed by elements of flame. Tastes rather spicy.

Harvest_Mushroom_005.name: Monkey head mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_005.description: Bland in both taste and appearance, but allegedly very high in nutrients.

Harvest_Mushroom_006.name: Black Truffle
Harvest_Mushroom_006.description: Rare and expensive mushroom that grows in rather specific, stringent environments.

Harvest_Mushroom_007.name: Ghost mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_007.description: Fungi indigenous to caves. Eat too much of them and you'll be seeing stars.

Harvest_Fishes_001.name: Silver bass
Harvest_Fishes_001.description: Silver bass can be found in either freshwater or the sea. They are meaty and delicious.

Harvest_Fishes_005.name: Lake bass
Harvest_Fishes_005.description: This fish is good any way you cook it.

Harvest_Fishes_006.name: Dabry's Sturgeon
Harvest_Fishes_006.description: Sturgeon living in shallow waters. Small in size, great for braising or stew.

Harvest_Follows_001.name: Snow lotus
Harvest_Follows_001.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Harvest_Follows_002.name: Small Azalea
Harvest_Follows_002.description: Extremely high in medicinal value without side effects. Consume as much as you want.

Harvest_Nuts_001.name: Hazelnut
Harvest_Nuts_001.description: A certain account pegs this as the culprit of the cracking of tectonic plates during Ice Age.

Harvest_Nuts_002.name: Cocoa Beans
Harvest_Nuts_002.description: Cocoa beans are versatile. One can make bitter coffee or sweet chocolates with them.

Harvest_Nuts_003.name: Pinecone
Harvest_Nuts_003.description: An apple might not be the only thing that drops on your head. It could be a pinecone.

Harvest_Nuts_004.name: Walnut shell
Harvest_Nuts_004.description: Eat more of it if you want to become smarter.

Item_Q201100_01.name: Sugar Paper
Item_Q201100_01.description: This appears to be something used to entertain children during the event. The event organizers must have missed it...

Item_Q201100_02.name: Lollipop
Item_Q201100_02.description: This appears to be something used to entertain children during the event. The event organizers must have missed it...

Tower_xingyuan1.name: Astrum
Tower_xingyuan1.description: The most widely-used energy source before Omnium was introduced to Aida. Can be used to power Omnium machinery, which is quite uncommon in this day and age.

Energy_Tower1.name: Astra exploration points
Energy_Tower1.description: From Astra and into the unknown! Explore every corner of the world!

Energy_Tower2.name: Banges exploration points
Energy_Tower2.description: From the prosperous docks to the underground black market, how many unknown faces does Banges hide?

Energy_Tower3.name: Navia exploration points
Energy_Tower3.description: The barren island and the wastelands—two different worlds, each holding their own secrets and waiting to be discovered.

Energy_Tower4.name: Crown exploration points
Energy_Tower4.description: The secrets of the mountains are like precious minerals, waiting quietly for the day they are excavated.

Energy_Tower5.name: Warren exploration points
Energy_Tower5.description: The remote snowfields, both beautiful and mysterious... Their true face is rarely seen by the world.

Energy_Tower7.name: Artificial Island exploration progress
Energy_Tower7.description: Decorate and innovate. Then, traverse every detail of this small world.

Energy_Tower8.name: Outer Islands Exploration Progress
Energy_Tower8.description: Decorate and innovate. Then, traverse every detail of this small world.

RewardQuestBox_01.description: A box that the chamber of commerce specifically prepared for bounty hunters with all kinds of weird stuff in it.

Title_1_1_1_1.description: Obtained after reaching 100% Astra exploration progress.

Item_fashion_002.description: Transform into an anti-radiation jacket after being equipped.

gift_xianhua.name: Flowers
gift_xianhua.description: Give flowers to your friends to increase Intimacy.

Item_q204110_01.name: Lost Giftbox
Item_q204110_01.description: Lorry left this giftbox at the Astra Shelter.

Item_q202240_02.name: Blooming Flowers
Item_q202240_02.description: This flower was Nonna's favorite before she aberrated!

Item_q204150_01.name: Message
Item_q204150_01.description: A message from the Oz family. The handwriting on it is illegible.

item_q204150_02.name: Family Portrait
item_q204150_02.description: A portrait of the Oz family.

StrengthenLevel_Transfer_01.name: Transfer Module
StrengthenLevel_Transfer_01.description: A small, precise device that can record, transcribe, and reform the enhancement information of equipment.

Item_RefreshQuest_01.name: Refreshing disk
Item_RefreshQuest_01.description: Use it to reset Bounty Missions.

Item_Bigsecret_RefreshWeapon.name: Illusinator
Item_Bigsecret_RefreshWeapon.description: The latest breakthrough of a mysterious research lab. It's said that it can be used to refresh the Recommended Weapons for the current floor in Bygone Phantasm.

Item_PetExp_02.name: β memory chip
Item_PetExp_02.description: A chip used to implant training memories into smart servants. An optimized version of the α chip, featuring marginally upgraded data capacity.

Item_PetExp_03.name: γ memory chip
Item_PetExp_03.description: The most cutting-edge chip for implanting training memories into smart servants. Features both upgraded data capacity and significantly improved information entry efficiency.

Item_WormholeLuckyCoin.name: Lucky Coin
Item_WormholeLuckyCoin.description: A coin said to have the power of changing one's luck, but not necessarily for the better. Use it to reset the random effect in Wormhole.

Item_RegressionCoin.name: Raid Coin
Item_RegressionCoin.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a mechanical windmill relief.

RegressionAwardExp.name: Scattered Stardust
RegressionAwardExp.description: EXP item for upgrading your Stellar Rank in the Stellarway Restart event.

NoviceRewardEXP.name: Withering Star Card:
NoviceRewardEXP.description: EXP item for upgrading your Journey Level in event A Fresh Journey

fashion_dress_18_1.name: Wasteland (1d)
fashion_dress_18_1.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_18_2.name: Wasteland (3d)
fashion_dress_18_2.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_18_3.name: Wasteland (7d)
fashion_dress_18_3.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_18_4.name: Wasteland
fashion_dress_18_4.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_21_4.name: Midnight
fashion_dress_21_4.description: Danger and opportunity lie ahead. Let us step into that night and go on an adventure.
source: Available at the Banges Expo event

fashion_dress_22_4.name: Era
fashion_dress_22_4.description: The core design concept of this casual sportswear is "rebellion, passion, and showiness." Those who see this can't help remembering the times before they moved to Aida on the Distant Beacon.

fashion_dress_23_4.name: Early Sakura
fashion_dress_23_4.description: An outfit made for the early spring out of soft fabrics, as soft as cherry blossom petals slowly floating down onto one's shoulders.
source: Available at the Banges Expo event

fashion_dress_24_4.name: Desert Exploration
fashion_dress_24_4.description: An outfit that combines practicality and comfort. Suitable for exploration in the desert.

fashion_dress_26_4.name: Starlight
fashion_dress_26_4.description: Upon wearing this dress, a sense of mission will arise... one that pushes the wearer to work hard all day and night to perform official duties.

fashion_dress_29_4.name: Fantasy
fashion_dress_29_4.description: Descend from the firework-filled sky, and rise from the soul of music. Dance the first delicate steps toward the golden age of fantasy.
source: Obtained from the Wheel of Fantasy event

fashion_dress_31_4.name: Fluffy Party
fashion_dress_31_4.description: This is the Fluffy Party! A furry look is the ticket!

fashion_dress_32_4.name: Silent Wings
fashion_dress_32_4.description: I witnessed the battleship burning on the fringe of Orion.

fashion_dress_33_4.name: Seaside Vacation
fashion_dress_33_4.description: It's time to kick back and relax! I heard that Banges may hold a Graceday Celebration event...
source: Obtained from the Summer Seabreeze event

fashion_dress_34_4.name: Clear Rainbow
fashion_dress_34_4.description: With a summertime mood like this, every day should be spent in joy.

fashion_dress_35_4.name: Academy Era
fashion_dress_35_4.description: Vows of the past are like the colorful bookmarks in that textbook.
source: Obtained from The Best Years event

fashion_dress_36_4.name: Race the Wind
fashion_dress_36_4.description: Youth is to be bold and do the unthinkable.
source: Obtained from the Race the Wind event

fashion_dress_37_4.name: Dawn
fashion_dress_37_4.description: Go far away to witness the miracle.

fashion_dress_38_4.name: Dreamy Phantom
fashion_dress_38_4.description: An outfit that is both mysterious and romantic in a dark tone blended with black and dark green. It's undoubtedly a trendsetter.
source: Obtained from the Dreamy Phantom gachapon event

fashion_dress_39_4.name: Rosy Banquet
fashion_dress_39_4.description: On a day when real ghosts and fiends can blend in with the festive crowd unnoticed, put this on and attend a costume party that smells like danger...
source: Obtained from the Thorned Rose event

fashion_dress_40_4.name: Dynamic Youth
fashion_dress_40_4.description: Rebelliousness and the pursuit of Individuality can't be suppressed. It should be flaunted!

fashion_dress_41_4.name: Wild Beat
fashion_dress_41_4.description: Shaking up the dunes with might, rock and roll will never die.
source: Obtained from the Wild Beat event

fashion_dress_42_4.name: Noir
fashion_dress_42_4.description: Rational thinking and wild imagination are both essential.

fashion_dress_43_4.name: Reflected Whispers
fashion_dress_43_4.description: Meet a brilliant future decorated with gold flakes.
source: Obtained from the Reflected Whispers event

fashion_dress_44_4.name: Wonderful Night
fashion_dress_44_4.description: Gather 'round with your friends and spend a warm winter's night together!
source: Obtained from the Reflected Whispers event

fashion_dress_45_4.name: Hoodie
source: Obtained from the Reflected Whispers event

fashion_dress_46_4.name: Spring Splendor Attire
fashion_dress_46_4.description: Jade shines, in golden rays. Spring dress, made of silken threads.
source: Obtained from the Spring Splendor Attire event

fashion_dress_47_4.name: Purple Fantasy
fashion_dress_47_4.description: Purple symbolizes luck and wealth. Does that mean more chests await?

fashion_dress_48_4.name: Retro Revival
fashion_dress_48_4.description: Seasons come and go, yet sentiments remain everlasting. During a beautiful spring afternoon, why not enjoy a nice excursion?

fashion_dress_49_4.name: Black & White
fashion_dress_49_4.description: Polar opposites can come together in celebration, singing and dancing to the same tune.

fashion_dress_50_4.name: Innarsian Fashion
fashion_dress_50_4.description: Formalwear which introduces classical elements on top of Innarsian design.

fashion_dress_51_4.name: Jade Elegance
fashion_dress_51_4.description: Serving to honor the techniques of ancient times, the embroidery of a classical painting on this article of clothing is simple, yet endlessly elegant.

fashion_dress_52_4.name: Searching in the Crowd
fashion_dress_52_4.description: Looking back inadvertently, I noticed that you stood out among the crowd.

fashion_dress_53_4.name: Starry Cruise
fashion_dress_53_4.description: A light fabric mixed with leather and metal accents, this outfit gives off the freedom of going on a long journey with no luggage.
source: Obtained from the Starry Cruise gachapon event

fashion_dress_54_4.name: Dimensional Leap
fashion_dress_54_4.description: Onward to a new world, and a new fantasy journey begins!

fashion_dress_55_4.name: Seabreeze Whispers
fashion_dress_55_4.description: In the scorching summer heat, strolling on the beach, the swaying veil brings the midsummer vibes.
source: Obtained from the Seabreeze Whispers event

fashion_dress_56_4.name: Play in Time
fashion_dress_56_4.description: Hand me just one game token, and I'll take you on a day-long adventure!

fashion_dress_57_4.name: Elite Grandeur
fashion_dress_57_4.description: The next expedition is on the horizon. With the finest attire dressed and your spirit high, let's get ready to set forth!
source: Obtained from the Elite Grandeur gachapon event

fashion_dress_58_4.name: Silken Adornment
fashion_dress_58_4.description: Screaming pumpkin puppets in a lively masquerade. Wear it to shine in the spotlight on the stage or vanish into the night, leaving behind only a trace of crimson and a whispering breeze.
source: Obtained from the Silken Adornment event

fashion_dress_59_4.name: Edge of Daylight
fashion_dress_59_4.description: Golden threads outline the horizon at sunrise, and pink crystals freeze the clouds at sunset. The daylight is so blinding that only for a moment near the edge of the earth do humans dare to look directly at it.

fashion_dress_60_4.name: Lord of Sacred Snow
fashion_dress_60_4.description: As the bell of the frosty dawn chimes, the castle gates open slowly, and the crowd ascends the steps to celebrate. Who shall be crowned upon the throne and underneath the sacred snow?

fashion_dress_61_4.name: Magnificent Nightmare
fashion_dress_61_4.description: Roses bloom on the night of the lunar eclipse, emitting a decadent fragrance. Nightmares of fairies are cut into dresses, while dreams become prophecies.
source: Obtained from the Magnificent Nightmare gachapon event.

fashion_dress_63_4.name: Majestic Dragon
fashion_dress_63_4.description: Dressed in embroidered brocade, with crimson gold embellishments. As the first breeze of spring in the new year passes through, a gentle movement of the sleeves emits a faint sound akin to the roar of a dragon.
source: Obtained from the Majestic Dragon event

fashion_dress_64_4.name: Raiding Fantasy
fashion_dress_64_4.description: A co-branded outfit inspired by Unit-01, which has sparked off a new fashion trend in Mirroria.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

fashion_dress_65_4.name: Scarlet Red
fashion_dress_65_4.description: A collab outfit inspired by EVA-02. Popular among people for its excellent color coordination and fashionable design.
source: Obtained from the Scarlet Red gachapon event.

fragment_imitation_fashion_23_w_2.name: Coral Weave Shard
fragment_imitation_fashion_23_w_2.description: Even at the bottom of the sea, Coral Weave seems to withstand the current and emit a gentle breeze. Although it may not be as easy to conceal in the darkness as before, its appearance is now far more stunning.

fragment_imitation_fashion_23_2.name: Azure Heart Shard
fragment_imitation_fashion_23_2.description: "Maybe I would be wearing this if I had gone to Innars for work, rather than stay in Mirroria." Perhaps this is the reality of another universe.

fragment_fashion_dress_31_4.name: Fluffy Party Shard
fragment_fashion_dress_31_4.description: This is the Fluffy Party! A furry look is the ticket!

fragment_imitation_fashion_50.name: Zeke Shard
fragment_imitation_fashion_50.description: He defines himself by his duties.

fragment_Hat_33_4_4.name: Silky Voice Shard
fragment_Hat_33_4_4.description: Wear it proudly as some kind of trophy.
source: Possible loot from Scylla password chests

fragment_Hat_34_4_4.name: Fluffy Marshmallow Shard
fragment_Hat_34_4_4.description: Grab a handful if you're hungry.
source: Possible loot from Eva password chests

fragment_Hat_35_4_4.name: Haboela's Touch Shard
source: Possible loot from Haboela password chests

fragment_Hat_36_4_4.name: Garland of Flowers Shard
source: Possible loot from Robarg password chests

fragment_Hat_37_4_4.name: Wingspan Shard
fragment_Hat_37_4_4.description: Caring for the Interdimensional Frostfire Dragon starts from you and me.
source: Possible loot from Frostfire Dragon password chests

fragment_Hat_38_4_4.name: Year's End Firecracker Shard
fragment_Hat_38_4_4.description: Looks like burning firecrackers, but is actually just a light strip.
source: Obtain from the New Year's Lanterns event.

fragment_Hat_43_4_4.name: Steel Feathers Shard
fragment_Hat_43_4_4.description: Black Crow's feathers are lightweight and resilient. As soon as the feathers are turned into a headpiece, the appearance becomes less important while the strength of its wearer is manifested.
source: Possible loot from Black Crow Tai Chi Chests

fragment_Hat_44_4_4.name: Undying Flame Shard
fragment_Hat_44_4_4.description: A delicate headpiece made of a special kind of nanofiber by Domain 9 crafters. It looks like the flame flickering on the head of Fulmination. Scarce and only available in a small quantity in the market.
source: Possible drop from Xingtian Tai Chi Chests

fragment_Hat_56_4_4.name: Horn of Harvest Shard
fragment_Hat_56_4_4.description: Long before our time, it was celebrated as a symbol of fertility, often made better by pairing it with flowers and fruits.
source: Possible drop from Merbelle Tai Chi Chests

fragment_Hat_70_4_4.name: Snowy's Flower Shard
fragment_Hat_70_4_4.description: "Do you like this headwear too? You can have it then! Take good care of it, okay?"

fragment_Hat_29_4_4.name: Candy Pumpkin Shard
fragment_Hat_29_4_4.description: Worried you can't fit more candy in your pockets? It's time you carry around a portable candy jar!

fragment_fashion_decoration_74_4.name: Bewilderment Eyepiece Shard
source: Possible loot from Sobek password chests

fragment_fashion_decoration_75_4.name: Rock Helmet Mask Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_75_4.description: They are used to hiding all emotions.
source: Possible loot from Magma password chests

fragment_fashion_decoration_76_4.name: Fawn Mask Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_76_4.description: Who's the pure and harmless fawn?
source: Possible loot from Rudolph password chests

fragment_fashion_decoration_79_4.name: Proof of Nakya Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_79_4.description: A beautiful red headband, a proof of valor obtained by defeating Abyssant: Nakya.
source: Possible loot from Abyssant: Nakya password chests

fragment_fashion_decoration_82_4.name: Inlaid Gold Ornament Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_82_4.description: A phoenix-inspired ornament, meticulously crafted using ancient inlaid gilding techniques. When resonating with timestamp energy, it begins to hover and sway gracefully.
source: Possible loot from Zhuyan Tai Chi Chests

fragment_fashion_decoration_86_4.name: Ring of Gluttony Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_86_4.description: An accessory made out of Taotie's armor. Wear it by electromagnetic adsorption.
source: Possible drop from Taotie Tai Chi Chests

fragment_fashion_decoration_90_4.name: Lunar Together Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_90_4.description: To honor the festive season, Mirroria collaborated with renowned historians. Drawing inspiration from ancient celebrations of our homeland, our expert designers created this exquisite festive decoration.

fragment_fashion_decoration_91_4.name: Tiny Devil Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_91_4.description: Beware of the tiny devils lurking in the night. Watch your neck!

fragment_fashion_decoration_91.name: Tiny Devil Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_91.description: Beware of the tiny devils lurking in the night. Watch your neck!

fragment_fashion_decoration_93_4.name: Azure Vision Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_93_4.description: Special crystalline goggles with a light blue coating, offering strong protection against bright light, severe frost, and water vapor. Highly practical.

fragment_fashion_decoration_94_4.name: Merit Headband Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_94_4.description: Made from the horn on Ying Zhao's head, crafted by artisans to retain its original shape and quality, honoring the merits of those who have defeated Ying Zhao.
source: Possible drop from Ying Zhao Tai Chi Chests

fragment_fashion_decoration_95_4.name: Fortuna Veil Shard
fragment_fashion_decoration_95_4.description: Fei Lian is considered the incarnation of auspiciousness, and its twin horns are believed to have the function of bringing good fortune. The mask made from the twin horns of Fei Lian is named Fortuna due to this association.
source: Possible drop from Fei Lian Tai Chi Chests

fragment_makeup_face_053.name: Tribal Mark Shard
fragment_makeup_face_053.description: It indicates some kind of... destiny.
source: Possible loot from Harrah password chests

fragment_makeup_face_054.name: Identification Code Shard
fragment_makeup_face_054.description: Even using this marking won't make you one of them.
source: Possible loot from Frost Bot password chests

fragment_makeup_face_055.name: Peace Treaty Shard
fragment_makeup_face_055.description: Are you sure it won't want to come after you even more because of this?
source: Possible loot from Apophis password chests

fragment_makeup_face_056.name: Scarlet Stamp Shard
fragment_makeup_face_056.description: It leaves you with more than just profound "memories."
source: Possible loot from Barbarossa password chests

fragment_makeup_Eyeball_018.name: Sweet Rose Shard
fragment_makeup_Eyeball_018.description: Some say these contact lenses are the same kind as someone extremely famous, but no one dares to verify.
source: Possible loot from Lady Lucia password chests

fragment_makeup_Eyeball_019.name: Wandering Eyes Shard
source: Possible loot from Devourer password chests

fragment_makeup_Eyeball_020.name: The Overlap Shard
fragment_makeup_Eyeball_020.description: One must differentiate between the layers of truth and illusions.
source: Possible loot from Culton password chests

Hat_2_4_4.name: Layer Cake
Hat_2_4_4.description: Creamy, sweet, and soft like a sponge cake.

Hat_3_4_4.name: Curtain
Hat_3_4_4.description: After the curtains fall, Dracula stretches his wings in a place beyond the spotlight.

Hat_4_4_4.name: Demon Holiday
Hat_4_4_4.description: Don't look at me in a strange way. Of course I also take vacations.
source: Available at the Banges Expo event

Hat_5_4_4.name: Demon Devotee
Hat_5_4_4.description: I'm not good-looking, but I'm very gentle.
source: Available at the Banges Expo event

Hat_7_4_4.name: Shirli Hairpin
Hat_7_4_4.description: A handmade clay hairpin from Celine of Astra Shelter, shows a very cute expression.

Hat_8_4_4.name: Donut
Hat_8_4_4.description: Hang it as a decoration, and take it down to eat it at any time you wish. How convenient.

Hat_9_4_4.name: Ice Crown
Hat_9_4_4.description: One's temperament can be fully shown... but other than Meryl, who else can bear such cold air of a fully automatic air conditioner on their head?

Hat_10_4_4.name: Antenna
Hat_10_4_4.description: It's not an ear, or a feeler or any external organ.

Hat_11_4_4.name: Small Round Bean
Hat_11_4_4.description: This hair clip looks incredibly familiar... Who could have lost it?

Hat_12_4_4.name: Heart to Heart
Hat_12_4_4.description: Just by wearing this, even a bruiser could easily become a cutie.

Hat_13_4_4.name: Tsubasa Hairpin
Hat_13_4_4.description: You will be considered the same as her... which is that you don't belong anywhere.

Hat_14_4_4.name: Frigg Hairpin
Hat_14_4_4.description: Although it seems like it doesn't quite fit the character... some Heirs of Aida still like it very much.

Hat_15_4_4.name: Rhythmic Headphones
Hat_15_4_4.description: It's supposed to be a music player. Instead, because of its chic design, it is often used as an accessory. What a shame!

Hat_16_4_4.name: Night Butterfly
Hat_16_4_4.description: A matching accessory specifically picked out to smoothly sneak into a banquet... But, how do you move around in something so clunky?
source: Obtained from the Wheel of Fantasy event

Hat_17_4_4.name: Dragon Boat Branch
Hat_17_4_4.description: I saw something similar on the bow of the mechanical dragon boat made for the festival... Was it taken from there?
source: Obtained from the Wormwood's Aroma event

Hat_18_4_4.name: Pigeon Cap
Hat_18_4_4.description: The brave and determined pudgy pigeon fears nothing.
source: Obtained from the Pure White event

Hat_19_4_4.name: Meow Meow
Hat_19_4_4.description: The same accessory worn by the renowned idol of Mirroria, Meow Meow. It's said that those who wear it will have a chance to share the stage with Meow Meow during her concert.
source: Obtained from the Pure White event

Hat_20_4_4.name: Animal Hairpin
Hat_20_4_4.description: An animal hairpin that can sit firmly in one's hair. It seems to have no special function other than to look cute. But honestly, isn't that enough?
source: Obtained from the Summer Seabreeze event

Hat_21_4_4.name: Birthday Crown
Hat_21_4_4.description: A shiny crown that draws the attention of everyone in its vicinity. But it can't play a birthday song on loop.
source: Obtained from the Crimson Ruby event

Hat_22_4_4.name: Crystal Loop
Hat_22_4_4.description: Best not to touch it unless you wanna get stung.

Hat_23_4_4.name: Fox Mask
Hat_23_4_4.description: There seems to be an urban legend about a masked individual sneaking around Mirroria...
source: Obtained from The Best Years event

Hat_24_4_4.name: Black Bunny Ears
Hat_24_4_4.description: That black rabbit is so cute, how did you...

Hat_26_4_4.name: Enchanted Hat
Hat_26_4_4.description: A magical item commonly seen in fantasy novels. Handfuls of candies can be hidden within. Available for the first Full Hair or Front Hair selections.

Hat_27_4_4.name: Rosy Letter
Hat_27_4_4.description: Join the carnival night parade with the most elegant and fitting, yet also mysterious, outfit.
source: Obtained from the Thorned Rose event

Hat_28_4_4.name: Visible Little Specter
Hat_28_4_4.description: Is there something on my head? A-Anything?
source: Obtained from the limited-time event: A Sweet Night of Horror

Hat_29_4_4.name: Candy Pumpkin
Hat_29_4_4.description: Worried you can't fit more candy in your pockets? It's time you carry around a portable candy jar!
source: Obtained from the limited-time event: A Sweet Night of Horror

Hat_30_4_4.name: Bucket Hat
Hat_30_4_4.description: Take all necessary sun protection measures.

Hat_31_4_4.name: Burger Crown
Hat_31_4_4.description: Take it with us and we'll be kings!

Hat_33_4_4.name: Silky Voice
Hat_33_4_4.description: Wear it proudly as some kind of trophy.
source: Possible loot from Scylla password chests

Hat_34_4_4.name: Fluffy Marshmallow
Hat_34_4_4.description: Grab a handful if you're hungry.
source: Possible loot from Eva password chests

Hat_35_4_4.name: Haboela's Touch
source: Possible loot from Haboela password chests

Hat_36_4_4.name: Garland of Flowers
source: Possible loot from Robarg password chests

Hat_37_4_4.name: Wingspan
Hat_37_4_4.description: Caring for the Interdimensional Frostfire Dragon starts from you and me.
source: Possible loot from Frostfire Dragon password chests

Hat_38_4_4.name: Year's End Firecracker
Hat_38_4_4.description: Looks like burning firecrackers, but is actually just a light strip.
source: Obtained from the Spring Dance event

Hat_39_4_4.name: Rabbit of Fortune
Hat_39_4_4.description: Weightless, as if supported by some mysterious force.
source: Obtained from the Spring Dance event

Hat_40_4_4.name: Jade Mirror
source: Obtained from the Spring Dance event

Hat_41_4_4.name: Couple's Accord
Hat_41_4_4.description: Hidden under the hat is the covenant between you and me.

Hat_42_4_4.name: Flaming Finch Headpiece
Hat_42_4_4.description: Rumor has it that if you wear this headpiece outside, you may just attract a real flaming finch. As long as they don't perch on your head, they shouldn't burn your hair...
source: Obtained from earning the Vermilion Statue Achievement

Hat_43_4_4.name: Steel Feathers
Hat_43_4_4.description: Black Crow's feathers are lightweight and resilient. As soon as the feathers are turned into a headpiece, the appearance becomes less important while the strength of its wearer is manifested.
source: Possible loot from Black Crow Tai Chi Chests

Hat_44_4_4.name: Undying Flame
Hat_44_4_4.description: A delicate headpiece made of a special kind of nanofiber by Domain 9 crafters. It looks like the flame flickering on the head of Fulmination. Scarce and only available in a small quantity in the market.
source: Possible drop from Xingtian Tai Chi Chests

Hat_56_4_4.name: Horn of Harvest
Hat_56_4_4.description: Long before our time, it was celebrated as a symbol of fertility, often made better by pairing it with flowers and fruits.
source: Possible drop from Merbelle Tai Chi Chests

Hat_60_4_4.name: Cream Cannon
Hat_60_4_4.description: Cream, cherries, and donuts... Are you ready for a calorie bomb?
source: Reward from the Refreshing Summer Breeze event

Hat_61_4_4.name: Support Headdress
Hat_61_4_4.description: A beautiful wish that beats with your heart.
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_62_4_4.name: Sweet Nap
Hat_62_4_4.description: Take a sweet nap in the sunny afternoon. Do not wake the Panda up.

Hat_63_4_4.name: Sunglasses Tata
Hat_63_4_4.description: "Do you have something to eat?" asked Tata wearing a pair of shades.

Hat_64_4_4.name: Pink Bow Hairband
Hat_64_4_4.description: After we wear the same headpiece, will you establish a bond with me?
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_65_4_4.name: Snow Dance
Hat_65_4_4.description: Outside the window, snowflakes fall in silence, while indoors, a waltz in 3/4 time plays, and footsteps twirl in harmony with the snowflakes.
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_66_4_4.name: Thousand-Star Knot
Hat_66_4_4.description: The light of a thousand stars shines with unity. The dazzling brilliance belongs only to the dazzling you.
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_67_4_4.name: Blue Bow Hairband
Hat_67_4_4.description: After we wear the same headpiece, will you establish a bond with me?

Hat_68_4_4.name: Morning Breeze
Hat_68_4_4.description: Racing down the forest trail, with the morning breeze and dew brushing past, the wind's whistle sings of freedom.
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_69_4_4.name: Rabbit Headband
Hat_69_4_4.description: A headband with rabbit ears. Seems like it's used for roleplaying.

Hat_70_4_4.name: Snowy's Flower
Hat_70_4_4.description: "Do you like this headwear too? You can have it then! Take good care of it, okay?"

Hat_71_4_4.name: Golden Legend
Hat_71_4_4.description: It is believed to bear the power of Domain 9's four mythical creatures. Only those of unparalleled skill and sheer determination can hope to attain such an honor.
source: Obtained from the Ultimate Champion Tournament event

Hat_72_4_4.name: Grandiose Top Hat
Hat_72_4_4.description: The final touch before setting out is the bright gaze from beneath the brim of the hat!
source: Obtained from the Elite Grandeur gachapon event

Hat_73_4_4.name: Crimson Bat
Hat_73_4_4.description: A crimson bat dances with you in the quiet night. Careful not to be spooked.
source: Obtained from the Silken Adornment event

Hat_74_4_4.name: Glass-Feather Blade
Hat_74_4_4.description: The blazing flames dance in the air like falling red feathers. But like a mirror, does it reflect beauty or death?
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_75_4_4.name: Familiar Metz: Melody
Hat_75_4_4.description: Awakening the musical magic, Metz unfolds a realm to the rhythm that is exclusively yours, casting away all boredom.
source: Obtained from the Lucky Tarot event.

Hat_76_4_4.name: Millet Headband
Hat_76_4_4.description: Tian Lang painstakingly sought the seed of millet and cultivated it carefully to ensure year-round blooms. It's a popular choice for making accessories, such as floral headbands.

Hat_77_4_4.name: Spin
Hat_77_4_4.description: "I'm so dizzy... Why am I seeing stars..."

Hat_78_4_4.name: Blade's Edge
Hat_78_4_4.description: Some keep their blades concealed, others display their sharp edges for all to see. What will you choose?
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_79_4_4.name: Sacred Snow Feather Crown
Hat_79_4_4.description: Above the snowy mountain peaks, the king of eagles rules the sky. Only its tail feathers befit the throne's master.

Hat_80_4_4.name: Roseate
Hat_80_4_4.description: Plucking the rose that blooms only during an eclipse, the dual-hued allure stains the hair ends, the blue enchantress adorns the strands, all to accentuate the Roseate.
source: Obtained from the Magnificent Nightmare gachapon event.

Hat_81_4_4.name: Tata's Ultimate Support
Hat_81_4_4.description: Executor, happy two-year anniversary! Tata loves you the most in the entire universe, crazy and head-over-heels for you! Long live the Executor!

Hat_82_4_4.name: Dragon King's Horn
Hat_82_4_4.description: Ruling over the four seas, soaring through the nine heavens, summoning clouds and rain, the leader of mystical beasts.

Hat_83_4_4.name: Plum Blossom Five Emperors' Coins
Hat_83_4_4.description: Out with the old year, in with the new, the plum blossom five emperors' coins will help you ward off difficulties and disasters, and pray for blessings and wealth.
source: Obtained from purchasing a Limited Gift Pack

Hat_84_4_4.name: Children Hairpin
Hat_84_4_4.description: A signal receiver designed in the style of a hairpin that looks somewhat like cat ears.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

Hat_85_4_4.name: 4th Angel Mask
Hat_85_4_4.description: An accessory crafted in the style of the 4th Angel's head, unexpectedly well-received upon its release.
source: Obtained from the Town Tour Sweepstakes event.
