Mount_014.name: Heavy Engine
Mount_014.description: A batch of retro yet high-tech heavy engines reclaimed from the ruins of an auto plant. Lighthouse R&D's modifications enable them to speed over winding roads and counterstrike gorgers.

activation1.name: Activation Core I
activation1.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.
source: Join Limited-Time Event: A Warrior's Efforts

activation2.name: Revitalized Energy Body
activation2.description: Revitalized energy body from the defeated raiding target. It may be of great interest to the researchers at Hykros.
source: Join the limited-time event: Executor Training.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.name: Pacemaker Emblem
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.description: The emblem is given to the HOTTA Studio's Mirroria Tour event participants. Appreciate Mirroria's beauty from a whole new perspective.

item_GreatRegression_coin.name: Proof of Stellarway
item_GreatRegression_coin.description: Executors returning from the break, I hope all of you haven't forgotten how to fight, and better believe that all efforts shall be rewarded.

hopkins1.name: Gold-backed card
hopkins1.description: Apparently accepted as currency at the Banges Black Market.
source: Join Limited-Time Event: A Warrior's Efforts

hopkins2.name: Proof of credit
hopkins2.description: You've got to win Hopkins' trust if you want the best goods from his Black Market. Prove yourself a worthy customer.
source: Join Limited-Time Event: A Warrior's Efforts

Mount006_1_Skin_01.name: Smoothie Meteor
Mount006_1_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Comes with free dessert coupons. Are you sure you don't want to try the new smoothie?

Mount006_2_Skin_01.name: Surveyor Meteor
Mount006_2_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. A vehicle made with reference to the appearance of a famous oceanologist. Well, the cute expression, though, could make the oceanologist both hate and love the vehicle at the same time, I guess?

Mount006_3_Skin_01.name: Arena Meteor
Mount006_3_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. A small number of past arena audience members wished that he'd leave a small autograph on the vehicle... But it'd probably cost a fortune by doing it on each one.

Mount006_4_Skin_01.name: Absconder Meteor
Mount006_4_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. If he comes to us for the copyright payment, just tell him that the related personnel has already been fired.

Mount006_5_Skin_01.name: Windrunner Meteor
Mount006_5_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. The performance should be identical to other models, yet it feels faster riding in this one.

Mount006_6_Skin_01.name: Freedom Meteor
Mount006_6_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. When will we race on another planet? Freedom Meteor is ready!

Mount006_7_Skin_01.name: Roaming Meteor
Mount006_7_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Could it be an illusion that I always feel like an ace when I'm on this thing? Or maybe it's not an illusion at all?

Mount006_8_Skin_01.name: Scuba Meteor
Mount006_8_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Its reinforced hull can adapt to greater pressure underwater... But this was not meant to be operated undersea.

Mount006_9_Skin_01.name: Supercomputing Meteor
Mount006_9_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Equipped with a mini supercomputer that can deal with all kinds of road surfaces. It's just sometimes the computer is too small to handle a large amount of calculations, and errors could occur.

Mount006_10_Skin_01.name: Modular Meteor
Mount006_10_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Even a homebody can be a skilled driver thanks to the training they received in racing games.

Mount006_11_Skin_01.name: Nightfeather Meteor
Mount006_11_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Sweeping past the corners like a nightfeather. Are you sure you don't want a race?

Mount006_12_Skin_01.name: Reminiscent Meteor
Mount006_12_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Sit in this beauty and be a bright star shooting across the sky.

Mount006_13_Skin_01.name: Phantasmic Meteor
Mount006_13_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. One could dream of lightning-fast rides in this vehicle.

Mount006_14_Skin_01.name: Steady Meteor
Mount006_14_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. You would unconsciously slow down and drive safely in this one―Hey! What are these little critters doing behind us?

Mount006_15_Skin_01.name: DIY Meteor
Mount006_15_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Did some modifications to it when I happened to see it the other day. Not sure if its performance gets affected...

Mount006_16_Skin_01.name: Rockin' Meteor
Mount006_16_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Its music system has fifty Aida hit songs preloaded. Turn up the tunes, and go for a ride.

Mount006_17_Skin_01.name: Justice Meteor
Mount006_17_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Take this buddy with you on your journey of justice and redemption.

Mount006_18_Skin_01.name: Snow Rose Meteor
Mount006_18_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. It's said that you will impress the Queen of Snow Roses if you race and win the championship in this vehicle.

Mount006_19_Skin_01.name: Electrovision Meteor
Mount006_19_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Features fluorescent lights on gold paint to catch everyone's attention.

Mount006_20_Skin_01.name: Neon Meteor
Mount006_20_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Whoever drives it will definitely be the brightest neon lighting on the street.

Mount006_21_Skin_01.name: Inspirational Meteor
Mount006_21_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. You could seize inspiration before it disappears when driving around in this vehicle.

Mount006_22_Skin_01.name: Miraculous Meteor
Mount006_22_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Restart and seize the future... with you.

Mount006_23_Skin_01.name: Glowing Meteor
Mount006_23_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Though this is a vehicle inspired by a rebel, you should still follow the traffic rules while driving it.

Mount006_24_Skin_01.name: Frosty Meteor
Mount006_24_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Equipped with a powerful fridge and air conditioning. Not a bad idea to refit it as a beverage truck.

Mount006_25_Skin_01.name: EM Meteor
Mount006_25_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Unlike other vehicles, this one has an extra battery as the backup energy source. One can drive without worrying about running out of energy in Omnium-scarce areas.

Mount006_26_Skin_01.name: Pouncing Cat Meteor
Mount006_26_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Its music system was preloaded with sounds of cats in it. This might give you an edge when hunting down rodents. "Kitty is out for hunting! Where is the target? Give an order!"

Mount006_27_Skin_01.name: Flame Chaser Meteor
Mount006_27_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Transform into a shooting star on fire that no one can pass in a race.

Mount006_28_Skin_01.name: Med Meteor
Mount006_28_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. Comes with a medical kit for safe journeys.

Mount006_29_Skin_01.name: Wishing Meteor
Mount006_29_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. If you happen to see a meteor shower while driving this vehicle, make a wish, and it might come true.

TFB_drop_2x.name: Joint Supply Chip I
TFB_drop_2x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.

TFB_drop_3x.name: Joint Supply Chip II
TFB_drop_3x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.

TFB_drop_4x.name: Joint supply chip III
TFB_drop_4x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.

Mount_007_a.name: Mechbird: Head
Mount_007_a.description: "Want me to design the new vehicle? Okay, first, the child-like exterior will attract attention..."

Mount_007_b.name: Mechbird: Torso
Mount_007_b.description: "Trunk space or the radio... I don't want to give up either one..."

Mount_007_c.name: Mechbird: Legs
Mount_007_c.description: "It won't crumble even under a truckload of fallen fruit. Probably."

Mount_007_d.name: Mechbird: Core
Mount_007_d.description: "The newest creation from R&D. I had the kid try it out, and it's surprisingly comfortable."

Title_1_6_1_2.name: Star Pastry Chef
Title_1_6_1_2.description: Unlocks by participating in the Sweets Workshop event.

Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.name: Beauty Beauty Voucher
Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.description: Would you like Celine to help you clean up again?

Title_1_1_6_1.name: Island Pioneer
Title_1_1_6_1.description: A title obtained after reaching 100% exploration on Artificial Island.

DevelopLog_1.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 1
DevelopLog_1.description: Starting log... It's early in the morning, and Mr. Kolador said there'd been an unusual retracement on the Artificial Island we're developing. How is that possible? He must be making a fuss. Retracement is a core technology of Hykros that only they can master. As an ordinary technician, if I can make it happen... Um..? There really is a transient unstable retracement, which seems to be related to the spacerift. I gotta fix it quickly. Am I losing my job? Maybe I'm qualified for Hykros now...?

DevelopLog_2.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 2
DevelopLog_2.description: Starting log... Today, we've debugged the spacerift on Artificial Island. All was normal, and everything went on smoothly. Mr. Kolador is such a wonderful man, as he didn't give me a hard time due to the rewind incident. However, my friend wasn't as lucky since he was fired by Cobalt-B today. Regardless of how I asked, he refused to tell me the reason. Yet, all that came out of his mouth was the word, moodcard, which I have absolutely no clue about. It was probably some embarrassing mistake. After all, Cobalt-B holds such a high bar.

DevelopLog_3.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 3
DevelopLog_3.description: Starting log... My colleagues have all gone bonkers! These fools have taken advantage of the SSR weapons Hykros provided for the people of Aesperia and started a fight with the Hyenas on the Artificial Island. You're just technicians, not Executors! So, get back to work! I'm the only one here working my butt off! If you were to read this log of mine, my esteemed Mr. Kolador, I'd hope you'll consider giving me a raise since that's definitely the best way to affirm my value. With that said, should I choose Dual EM Stars or Rosy Edge?

DevelopLog_4.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 4
DevelopLog_4.description: Starting log... Last night, I went to Cetus Island on my lonesome to watch the fireworks. Not only was it spectacular, but the music was also wonderful. That's why I proposed to Mr. Kolador that we should set off fireworks all day long on Artificial Island. However, he rejected the romantic proposal on the grounds that it might blow up the island's barrier. If Dr. Claire requires a staff member who's not just a puppet, I'm willing to join her... Never mind, please delete this paragraph. Mr. Kolador was quite right in what he said. That was thoughtless of me, and there's still so much I have to learn from him.

DevelopLog_5.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 5
DevelopLog_5.description: Starting log... Right now, I'm logging with my "little feet," stomping on the keyboard. Hykros's stuff is so unstable! Their weapons went haywire and shrunk me to the size of a needlebee, and I almost got swatted by the Executors! Development on the Artificial Island will have to be put on hold today. After all, it's too inconvenient for this "tiny me" to work. Mr. Kolador would understand me. Hopefully, Hykros will solve this problem within a week.

DevelopLog_6.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 6
DevelopLog_6.description: Starting log... I'm so excited, so excited! You have no idea what I saw today! I met Ms. Bai from the "other planet" in Navia! She was on a mission, but I'm sure she noticed me! Although she was far away, she must have seen me! Yes, I felt it! Initiate Hykros Special Order, and search for "Alaya"...

DevelopLog_7.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 7
DevelopLog_7.description: Starting log... I should be on my vacation now, but there is a new problem with the Artificial Island... So here I am again. Right now, everyone outside the Artificial Island must be setting off fireworks... I could really use a nap right now... a nap... right now... ZZzzz

DevelopLog_8.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 8
DevelopLog_8.description: Starting log... The vacation is over, and the Artificial Island is stable for now. I hope Mr. Kolador will give me an extra reward for my performance during the vacation! Besides, I found something suspicious today! It's so suspicious! A colleague of mine came back from his vacation with very thick hair! He used to be just like me... No, even worse than me! What on earth did he do during the vacation!? Perhaps I should go and ask him about it...

DevelopLog_9.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 9
DevelopLog_9.description: Starting log... There has been a minor issue with Banges recently, but Hykros managed the situation well. Now, some Banges residents, including me, are in quarantine. But! Quarantine won't stop me from developing the Artificial Island! Just connect to the Artificial Island server remotely, and I can start the work of love! Ah... the connection is so poor... Hope everyone in Banges can get better quickly, and for all of Aida to get better, come on!

DevelopLog_10.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 10
DevelopLog_10.description: Starting log... The construction of Artificial Island Phase 1 is almost complete. What is most crucial right now is to drive the Hyenas away, and the quickest solution for that would be to request The Executor Order for assistance. Gosh, I'm so clever! Anyways, I'll suggest it to Mr. Kolador right this instant... I've heard from a friend of Hykros that they've recently gotten hold of Vera's spacetime coordinates. I'd love to be able to head on over there to take a look once I'm done with my work on the Artificial Island...

breakfate_healingposition_continued_1.name: Shield Energy Cell
breakfate_healingposition_continued_1.description: Charges the shield around you with energy to resist the relentless impacts.

breakfate_healingposition_S.name: First Aid Kit
breakfate_healingposition_S.description: A pack with band-aids and bandages inside. Can be used to alleviate some pain.

breakfate_healingposition_M.name: Advanced First Aid Kit
breakfate_healingposition_M.description: A package filled with first-aid supplies to treat wounds.

breakfate_ReviveCoin.name: Rainbow coin
breakfate_ReviveCoin.description: Stand on the colorful lucky clouds to resurrect on the spot.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_2.name: Maid Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_2.description: Mi-a also looks cute in a maid outfit!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4.name: Explorer Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4.description: Mi-a looks cute as an explorer too!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_6.name: Panda Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_6.description: Cute as a button... Are you talking about Mi-a or her backpack?

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_7.name: Cutie Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_7.description: Don't take Mi-a's bag and eat it!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_8.name: Swimsuit Mi-a

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_9.name: Little Sorceress Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_9.description: Mi-a would like to turn you into a small pumpkin.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_10.name: Reindeer Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_10.description: Just as described in so many tales, Mi-a had prepared her gifts long beforehand, and eagerly awaited the coming of that night.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_11.name: Bunny Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_11.description: This isn't Dolly! I don't want to hug the wrong one!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_12.name: Garuda Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_12.description: The inspiration for this came from the mythical giant bird Shelly came across in a mysterious ancient book. It looks to be a perfect match for the flying Mi-a.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4_1.name: Explorer Mi-a Shard
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4_1.description: Collect 3 Explorer Mi-a shards to fuse Explorer Mi-a.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_101.name: Kalka
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_101.description: An early smart servant model developed by Dr. Claire of Cetus Island.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_102.name: Void Angel
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_102.description: A multi-purpose smart servant from the Old Federation days that can be used in a variety of situations.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_103.name: Angela
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_103.description: A smart servant from the Old Federation days originally intended for use as an entertainment performer.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_104.name: Moonrabbit
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_104.description: A mechanical assistant smart servant developed by Banges Tech.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_105.name: Flame Sparrow
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_105.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the local Flaming Finch.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_106.name: Zongyun
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_106.description: A key product created through collaboration between Tianzhang Pavilion and Niners Heavy Machinery. Its main goal is said to be investing R&D toward the universalization of Madam Qinglong's partner pets.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_107.name: Leia
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_107.description: The "Ultimate Weapon" series manufactured by Xiling Alliance Co. Ltd., model γ1O-A. Xiling is the sole smart servant supplier to Hykros and is part of the Hykros-Domain 9 Smart Servant Committee. Founded by Ms. Shelly and Ms. Ling Qiao, two of this century's greatest female engineers, the company launched its first mass-produced smart servant in small batches within just a month of its founding. The company is mainly known for its research and production of smart servants, related products, and merchandise. As it moves into the future, the company is focusing more on vertical integration by forming deep connections with famous brands, such as Ultimate Warriors, and creating an original commercial complex. If you're interested in investing, please contact us at * * * - * * * *.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_108.name: Aurawolf
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_108.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the legends of Domain 9.

fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_109.name: Snowy
fashion_Guidenpc_Pet_Balance_109.description: A tiger-themed smart servant that leaves ice crystals in her path.

chat_mia_phrase_9.name: Mi-a's Children's Day Voice Pack
source: Obtained from the Childlike Innocence event

Mount006_31_Skin_01.name: Scarlet Meteor
Mount006_31_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles. It's said that it can help you forget about your troubles when driving this vehicle.

bupoxiao.description: I will attack in Saki Fuwa form.

fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.name: Leaper Shard
fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles. It may appear to be customized for a kid, but a Jerboa is a Jerboa!

Mount012_1_Skin_01.name: Jumping Smart Servant
Mount012_1_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles. It's a customized version for a certain Wanderer and their lady companion. This smart servant must hold special meaning to the pair.

Mount012_2_Skin_01.name: Leaper
Mount012_2_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles. It may appear to be customized for a kid, but a Jerboa is a Jerboa!

Mount012_3_Skin_01.name: Ultimate Jerboa
Mount012_3_Skin_01.description: One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles. It is named the Super Ultimate in hopes that its owner would also have super ultimate justice and valor!

v222003_HOTTAcard_01.name: HOTTA Studio Temporary Staff Card
v222003_HOTTAcard_01.description: The temporary staff card of HOTTA Studio only allows access to certain places. It is engraved with the user's name and personal information. HOTTA Studio, a well-known company in Mirroria, focuses on game development and entertainment services.

v60500_taolesicard_normal.name: Dorothy's Black Card
v60500_taolesicard_normal.description: Dorothy's black card has no spending limit. It can only be used in this bodyguard mission.

v60500_taolesicard_bad.name: Dorothy's Black Card
v60500_taolesicard_bad.description: After hearing Fenrir recount the details of what happened, Dorothy thought that you wouldn't need this card because you like to use cash, so she canceled this card permanently.

v60500_taolesicard_good.name: Dorothy's Black Card
v60500_taolesicard_good.description: Dorothy has decided to give you something extra as thanks for taking care of Fenrir.

v10300_shizhangitem.name: Timestamp
v10300_shizhangitem.description: Timestamps are the power source of the Domain Guards, which can remove the damage reduction ability of the Darkness to help us defeat them. Have you ever wondered what the future looks like without timestamps? Ji Yu did, and that put her into countless restless days and nights.

imitation_fashion_26.name: No Fear of the Sun
imitation_fashion_26.description: UV rays are the enemy of all women... But she seems to enjoy bathing in the sunlight.

imitation_fashion_26_w.name: Sunny Breeze
imitation_fashion_26_w.description: Taking a vacation between consecutive jobs is worth a change in mood. Just tap a few times on your phone for a change of paint.

imitation_fashion_22.name: Ultimate Pure White
imitation_fashion_22.description: "Ultimate justice! Ultimate valor! The Ultimate Warriors who give Night City ultimate protection! Elegant, pure, mighty! Super, super ultimate!"
source: Obtained from the Pure White event

imitation_fashion_22_w.name: Pure Innocent Heart
imitation_fashion_22_w.description: The impeccable power has granted Heartstream with a new look.
source: Obtained from the Pure White event

imitation_fashion_21.name: Crimson Song
imitation_fashion_21.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!
source: Obtained from the Crimson Ruby event

imitation_fashion_21_w.name: Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_w.description: A magical creation that contains mysterious energy in the picture book Crimson Tale. It's also Little Red Riding Hood's closest friend.
source: Obtained from the Crimson Ruby event

imitation_fashion_21_bag.name: Crimson Song & Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_bag.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!
source: Obtained from the Crimson Ruby event

imitation_fashion_17.name: Shirli
imitation_fashion_17.description: It's an image extracted from memories... It's just an illusion.
source: Obtained from the limited-time mission Yesterday Once More

imitation_fashion_17_w.name: White Dwarf
imitation_fashion_17_w.description: A shining star might look small, but it gives off unimaginable energy.
source: Obtained from the limited-time mission Yesterday Once More

imitation_fashion_10.name: Argent Intuition
imitation_fashion_10.description: It's difficult to find a balance between formal attire and work clothes. Only she insists that true art is a mix of practicality and artistry...
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

imitation_fashion_10_w.name: Silver Flame Revolver
imitation_fashion_10_w.description: It would be great if I could apply paints of all colors to the flame... but there are still many technical problems to overcome.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

imitation_fashion_23.name: Sleek Summer Shade
imitation_fashion_23.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.

imitation_fashion_23_w.name: Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_w.description: The wind blown by this fan seems cooler than before... Though it may just be the visual effects which make it seem that way?

imitation_fashion_23_2.name: Azure Heart
imitation_fashion_23_2.description: "Maybe I would be wearing this if I had gone to Innars for work, rather than stay in Mirroria." Perhaps this is the reality of another universe.

imitation_fashion_23_w_2.name: Coral Weave
imitation_fashion_23_w_2.description: Even at the bottom of the sea, Coral Weave seems to withstand the current and emit a gentle breeze. Although it may not be as easy to conceal in the darkness as before, its appearance is now far more stunning.

imitation_fashion_23_bag.name: Sleek Summer Shade & Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_bag.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.

imitation_fashion_31.name: Millet Wonderland
imitation_fashion_31.description: A costume that Umi ordered for a fairly formal performance, in which she will play the heir to the Millet Castle and bring fantastic dreams to "guests" that stumble upon this place.
source: Obtained from the Millet Wonderland event

imitation_fashion_31_w.name: Gloom
imitation_fashion_31_w.description: There are many secrets surrounding the source of the Millet Castle's heir's magical powers.
source: Obtained from the Millet Wonderland event

imitation_fashion_34.name: Ivory Bloom
imitation_fashion_34.description: Thank you for staying courageous and holding my hand, even when faced with danger.
source: Obtained from the Ivory Bloom event

imitation_fashion_34_w.name: Akaba
imitation_fashion_34_w.description: Vermilion Bird changes its appearance after sensing Zhuque's intent.
source: Obtained from the Ivory Bloom event

imitation_fashion_30.name: Platinum Radiance
imitation_fashion_30.description: Shortly after Alyss's headache was cured, Mirroria Department of Science and Technology discovered previously unknown information in the Unyielding Wing. By reconstructing the data and importing it to the Unyielding Wing, they created a new Platinum Armor Form that differs from Anisoptera or Lepidoptera.
source: Obtained from the Platinum Radiance event

imitation_fashion_30_w.name: Platinum Wings
imitation_fashion_30_w.description: Unyielding Wing is converted to Platinum Armor Form to make Alyss even mightier.
source: Obtained from the Platinum Radiance event

imitation_fashion_36.name: Starlit Honor
imitation_fashion_36.description: The moon and the stars, just for you.
source: Obtained from the Starlit Honor event

imitation_fashion_36_w.name: Astraluna
imitation_fashion_36_w.description: The power of the stars and the moon gathers, condenses, and discharges here.
source: Obtained from the Starlit Honor event

imitation_fashion_37.name: Inkwell Refinement
imitation_fashion_37.description: Seemingly having undergone a prolonged seclusion, perhaps even immersing herself in ink to contemplate the true essence of elegance, Liu Huo reappears before us. Her aura, now visibly enhanced, signifies a deepened understanding of grace... a noticeable transformation.

imitation_fashion_37_w.name: Cinnabar
imitation_fashion_37_w.description: As the afterglow emblem encircles the pen, hold it to get overwhelmed by the inspiration from the poem...

imitation_fashion_41.name: Serene Grove
imitation_fashion_41.description: Amidst the clear breeze, within the serene bamboo grove.
source: Obtained from the Serene Grove gachapon event

imitation_fashion_41_w.name: Gilded Cloud
imitation_fashion_41_w.description: Auspicious clouds are drifting across the sky, painting it gold.
source: Obtained from the Serene Grove gachapon event

imitation_fashion_43.name: Summer Frost
imitation_fashion_43.description: Basking under the brilliant sun, summer frost blooms.
source: Obtained from the Summer Frost gachapon event

imitation_fashion_43_w.name: Flowerstream
imitation_fashion_43_w.description: Atop the waves, where snowflakes dance.
source: Obtained from the Summer Frost gachapon event

imitation_fashion_48.name: Brilliant Eclipse
imitation_fashion_48.description: Continuation and destruction merge into her sole thought.
source: Obtained from the Brilliant Eclipse gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_48_w.name: Swan Song
source: Obtained from the Brilliant Eclipse gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_49.name: Tranquil Melody
imitation_fashion_49.description: Under the clear sky and falling flowers, the bamboo beneath the eaves sing a tranquil melody. Playing the zither and flute, the pavilions and terraces as they were, these moments can linger a little longer.
source: Obtained from the Tranquil Melody gachapon event

imitation_fashion_49_w.name: Diaphlute
imitation_fashion_49_w.description: A treasured gift from an old friend, crafted by a master's hand. Renowned for its ethereal and clear tones, it was aptly named. "I play this cherished tune just for you!"
source: Obtained from the Tranquil Melody gachapon event

imitation_fashion_50.name: Zeke
imitation_fashion_50.description: He defines himself by his duties.
source: Obtained from the Brilliant Eclipse gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_50_w.name: Fading Shadows
source: Obtained from the Brilliant Eclipse gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_52.name: Sleep Talking
imitation_fashion_52.description: Scientists are helpless in their dreams, where logic and the laws of nature cease to matter. People who have retained a childlike imagination, on the other hand, are able to enjoy themselves very much in their dreams.
source: Obtained from the Sleep Talking gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_52_w.name: Heartcrest Metz
imitation_fashion_52_w.description: If a rose saves up its energy and unleashes it all at once in full bloom, will it also unlock an all-new evolutionary form...? I wonder...
source: Obtained from the Sleep Talking gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_53.name: Infiltrating Shadow
imitation_fashion_53.description: Concealed within the depths of darkness, it seamlessly infiltrates, leaving no trace but an air of mystique.
source: Obtained from the Infiltrating Shadow gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_53_w.name: CP-3000 Terrafire
imitation_fashion_53_w.description: Ablaze like the fires of hell, it unleashes its fury within the impregnable fortress.
source: Obtained from the Infiltrating Shadow gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_32.name: Fluffy White Chocolate
imitation_fashion_32.description: In winter, a full set of fluffy clothes is a necessity, including your ears! Also, don't forget to spray on some sweet, milky white chocolate perfume before you leave the house!
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

imitation_fashion_32_w.name: Zero Decibel
imitation_fashion_32_w.description: In a cold and quiet world, even the slightest sound pierces through the silence.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

imitation_fashion_55.name: Overlooking the Gray
imitation_fashion_55.description: The girl stood here and watched.
source: Obtained from the Overlooking the Gray gachapon event.

imitation_fashion_55_w.name: Glimmering Spear of Longinus
imitation_fashion_55_w.description: The roots of the Tree of Life emit its unique power.
source: Obtained from the Overlooking the Gray gachapon event.

imitation_33.name: Molinia
imitation_33.description: My name is Mo... Moli. Nice to meet you... (Waaah! I couldn't even finish my name right! I wish I had another chance...)
source: Obtained from the Silent Serenade event

linye.name: Lin
linye.description: She did allow her fans to use her photos, provided that it was not for commercial purposes, and only minor post-processing was done.

Title_1_4_5_1.description: Get in the top ten of Break From Destiny to unlock this title.

Mount_016.description: Once it accelerates to 888 miles per hour, it can break through the time barrier and go to any time period...

xinghuan.name: Lyra
xinghuan.description: I'm simply following Ms. Maidelin's orders, that's all.

gift_monthcard_autouse_overseas.name: Random Monthly Pass Box
gift_monthcard_autouse_overseas.description: Receive one of the following items at random: Gold nucleus, proof of purchase, random SSR Relic shard box, random SR Relic shard box, weapon battery II, weapon battery III, weapon battery IV, Matrix data pack II, Matrix data pack III, and Matrix data pack IV.

MapRadar.name: Radar Detector
MapRadar.description: The latest radar detector developed by the Mirroria Department of Science and Technology. An essential tool for Wanderers.

MapRadarPoint.name: Navigation Beacon
MapRadarPoint.description: A complimentary device to the radar detector. The only choice for Wanderers.

Mount_017_a.name: Nova Engine
Mount_017_a.description: Don't underestimate its horsepower based on its cute appearance!

Mount_017_b.name: Nova Base
Mount_017_b.description: A three-wheeled design, stable and safe. Great for travel, food delivery, cargo transportation, and household essentials!

Mount_017_c.name: Nova Hull
Mount_017_c.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...

fragment_Mount_017_c.name: Nova Shard (Hull)
fragment_Mount_017_c.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...

fragment_Mount_024.description: A scientific research achievement of the Wildlife Research Institute. Users of this potion tend to become docile.

Blindbox_EarlySpring_2022_pack.description: One of the most popular limited-edition giftboxes at the Banges Expo. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.

choose_elemine_p1_pack.name: Elemental Ore Shard Box
choose_elemine_p1_pack.description: A box containing a selection of elemental ore shards to choose from.

tianlang.name: Tian Lang
tianlang.description: I am the owner of the Mirroria Nursery. Don't spill the beans on my alter ego!

AvatarFrame_Overseas_1.description: Limited reward for outstanding creators during the CBT.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.name: Illusory Link
AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.description: Do we exist, or are we just shadows of some parallel universe?

AvatarFrame_tencent_1.description: An outstanding ToF creator. We can tell you love the game!

AvatarFrame_tencent_2.name: Creatower Master
AvatarFrame_tencent_2.description: An extremely professional ToF creator. ToF is grateful to have an inspiration like you!

AvatarFrame_tencent_3.name: Creatower of Fantasy
AvatarFrame_tencent_3.description: A fantastical ToF creator, one who is already one with the team... You are already one with the team, congrats!

Avatar_Overseas_1.name: Zeke: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_1.description: Maybe ol' Zeke can even be cute sometimes?

Avatar_Overseas_2.name: Shirli: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_2.description: "Do I look silly to you when I smile?" Some dumb cute girl said so while swinging her fists.

Avatar_korea_1.name: Mi-a: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_1.description: Mi-a is currently executing the dressing sequence, please wait.

Avatar_korea_2.name: Nemesis: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_2.description: I think I had a dream. I saw a lot of things in this dream.

Avatar_korea_3.name: Shirli: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_3.description: Do we wanna go to Cetus Island together?

Item_gift_T101008.name: A Screenwriter's Blog
Item_gift_T101008.description: A book that contains the screenwriter's personal experiences. Due to its incredible ability to put its readers to sleep, some use it as a sleeping aid.

Item_gift_T101010.name: Security Force Training Diary
Item_gift_T101010.description: A training manual for special agents of the Security Force. It contains training methods shared by senior members, making it a must-read for new members.

Item_gift_T101015.name: Rider Postcard
Item_gift_T101015.description: A postcard signed by a famous rider.

Item_gift_T101037.name: Umi's Poker Deck
Item_gift_T101037.description: Umi's magic items. I don't seem to notice anything special about them... If you could give them to her, maybe she will teach you a little trick.

annabeila.name: Annabella
annabeila.description: How do the orders from her Master sound to her?

Mount_Racing_001.name: Thunder Roar
Mount_Racing_001.description: When its engine roared and it sped away, there was only one sound left ringing in the ears of the crowd: Thunder.
source: Obtained from the Race the Wind event

ailisi.description: Trust me! I will give it my all!

Title_Overseas2_7.description: Thank you for helping out new adventurers.

Title_Overseas2_8.description: A pair of hands capable of creating beauty.

Title_Overseas2_9.name: Dawnbreaker
Title_Overseas2_9.description: Thank you for your honesty, Executor.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_3.name: Raging Sands
AvatarFrame_Overseas_3.description: The desert, where a new adventure begins.

Avatar_Overseas_8.name: The Queen
Avatar_Overseas_8.description: Want to taste my boot and chainsaw?

Mount_018.name: Rapid Propulsion
Mount_018.description: A popular vehicle in Aesperia, featuring outstanding acceleration and shock absorption systems. The bold paintwork on its wheels seems to emphasize the owner's unrestrained personality.
source: Obtained from the Magnificent Nightmare gachapon event.

Item_manasample_3.name: Neon Energy Pool
Item_manasample_3.description: Limited-time event currency. Used for donation conversion.

Item_VeraPoison_001.name: Revelation Seeds
Item_VeraPoison_001.description: Strange tree species that grow in the poisonous areas of the Miasmic Swamp. Different elemental ores create different reactions from the Brood.

Item_VeraPoison_002.name: Germinated Revelation Seeds
Item_VeraPoison_002.description: Sprouting revelation seeds obtained by defeating enemies from broods. They can wipe out the poisonous plants in the Miasmic Swamp.

Avatar_FishKing_007.name: Blue Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_007.description: A blue fish with white stripes and gold accents. It's hard to believe such a stunning fish even exists!

Avatar_FishKing_008.name: Flashy Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_008.description: A variant of the fairy fish. Its stripes resemble lightning, making them even rarer.

Avatar_FishKing_009.name: Black Tigerfly Fish
Avatar_FishKing_009.description: This fish with tiger-like markings likes to hide in coral reefs, hence the name.

Avatar_FishKing_010.name: Round Sea Bream
Avatar_FishKing_010.description: Common snapper with round white scales that look like pearls.

Avatar_FishKing_011.name: Blue Surgeonfish
Avatar_FishKing_011.description: There is a sharp thorn at the tail. Be careful not to cut yourself.

Avatar_FishKing_012.name: Purple Puffer
Avatar_FishKing_012.description: The purple patterns on their bodies swell when they're angry.

Avatar_FishKing_013.name: High-Back Fish
Avatar_FishKing_013.description: Their high back give them strong dorsal fins and balance, enabling them to survive the sea without fear of being pushed around by the waves.

Avatar_FishKing_014.name: Green Snapper
Avatar_FishKing_014.description: The cyan back and dark red belly make this snapper highly recognizable.

Avatar_FishKing_015.name: Scarlet Eye
Avatar_FishKing_015.description: A terrifying deep-sea fish characterized by its red eyes.

Avatar_FishKing_016.name: Golden Stripe Puffer
Avatar_FishKing_016.description: With its long body and black tiger-like stripes, it is among the strongest fish in the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_017.name: Bell Fish
Avatar_FishKing_017.description: Their color is as beautiful as a bellflower.

Avatar_FishKing_018.name: Fruit Goby
Avatar_FishKing_018.description: A school of these fish swimming together looks like a cornucopia of fruit and vegetables coming toward you.

Avatar_FishKing_019.name: Fantasy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_019.description: The purple body is coated with creamy white stripes which emit a dazzling light under the sun.

Avatar_FishKing_020.name: Silver Bone
Avatar_FishKing_020.description: Its body is almost completely transparent. You can see its bones.

Avatar_FishKing_021.name: Lemon Yellow
Avatar_FishKing_021.description: It looks like a big lemon from a distance. It shouldn't taste sour, right?

Avatar_FishKing_022.name: Cloudy Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_022.description: The new variety of fairy fish looks like a painting of a sunset.

Avatar_FishKing_023.name: Red Mane Fish
Avatar_FishKing_023.description: The red dorsal fin is their most distinctive feature, but the patterns elsewhere are more random.

Avatar_FishKing_024.name: Changing Fish
Avatar_FishKing_024.description: The dazzling pattern can change into a variety of colors under the refraction of seawater.

Avatar_FishKing_025.name: Wingless
Avatar_FishKing_025.description: With their bright green appearance, these fish look like they have no eyes. In fact, it is merely a pattern, and their eyes are hidden between the patterns.

Avatar_FishKing_026.name: Sparky Fish
Avatar_FishKing_026.description: Catching this fish was a marvellous surprise. Its white pattern flashing in the sunshine as it came out of the water was dazzling.

Avatar_FishKing_027.name: Maroon Night Goby
Avatar_FishKing_027.description: A rare species of goby. Their neon-lit bodies can be seen roaming around the ocean depths.

Avatar_FishKing_028.name: Midnight Fish
Avatar_FishKing_028.description: Their patterns can be seen even in the deep sea. What could possibly be a more pleasant surprise than catching one under the moonlight?

Avatar_FishKing_029.name: Green-Blue Fish
Avatar_FishKing_029.description: Even the most brilliant turquoise is not as dazzling as they are!

Avatar_FishKing_030.name: Angry Fish
Avatar_FishKing_030.description: As deep-sea fish, they are free to choose how to grow their bodies. The spikes are for defense. Fish growing like into this form can naturally run rampant in the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_031.name: Spiky Sea Bream
Avatar_FishKing_031.description: Outliers among snappers, their bones grow outside of their body. They use their hard bones to defend against their natural enemies. Their hard armor makes them mighty and unyielding, but this one still took the bait.

Avatar_FishKing_032.name: Anchovy
Avatar_FishKing_032.description: Their long, beautiful fins are as majestic as a phoenix's tail.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_001.name: Black Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_001.description: Prefers to live near the bottom of lakes or rivers. It is stout somewhat tubular. Its name comes from the blue-black fins and scales above its white abdomen.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_003.name: Bighead Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_003.description: Named for its wide head and short, rounded snout. The short dorsal fin tends toward the rear half of the spine. The back and spine are relatively dark with irregular black markings.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_004.name: Lanternfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_004.description: It has a flat body and separated dorsal fins. Yellowish glands beneath the scales create the golden color.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_005.name: Blackfin Grouper
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_005.description: Characterized by its all-black head and fins. Its lower jaw protrudes notably ahead of the upper jaw, and both its head and back exhibit remarkable bulges.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_007.name: Cyan Grouper
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_007.description: Characterized by its cyan-colored head and fins. Its lower jaw protrudes notably ahead of the upper jaw, and both its head and back exhibit remarkable bulges. A common species of grouper found in bodies of water in Aquaville.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_008.name: Scarlet Fin
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_008.description: It has a long, flat body, a stout back and abdomen, a continuous dorsal fin, and black fin stripes. It's known for being particularly delicious.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_009.name: Lava Gold
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_009.description: It boasts a small head, a humpbacked dorsal region, a plump body, and a gracefully flowing tail. It displays vibrant and flawless coloring.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_012.name: Striped Goby
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_012.description: A slender goby with blue stripes, separate dorsal fins, and soft fin spines.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_014.name: Red Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_014.description: While primarily golden in color, its fins are red and its scales have reddish edges. The large, reflective scales almost resemble enchanting rubies.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_015.name: Silver Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_015.description: Its body is greenish-silver, its fins are grayish-blue, and its scales have silvery-white edges with blue-green spots.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_016.name: Golden Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_016.description: Its large, flat body and dazzling golden body give it a highly-prized, majestic appearance. It has a protruding abdomen and whisker-like barbels on the lower jaw.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_018.name: Pearl Volt Dragon
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_018.description: It features an elongated body with a short, rounded snout. Its body is grayish-brown and adorned with pearl-like spots.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_019.name: Darkfrost Betta
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_019.description: It possesses a rather flat body shape, fine teeth on both upper and lower jaws, and a striking ice-white coloration on its tail and dorsal fins. It thrives in colder water temperatures.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_020.name: Snakehead
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_020.description: It has a wide, flat head and a cylindrical body that flattens near the end. The fins appear brightly-colored when underwater, but appear pale pink in the air.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_022.name: Pineneedle Koi
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_022.description: It is characterized by its golden-red scales adorned with scattered black markings, reminiscent of pine needles in the water.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_024.name: Golden-Cloud Minnow
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_024.description: Characterized by its long, flat shape and a colorful fluorescent stripe that runs across its body. The scales above the stripe are gold, while the scales below the stripe are gray. It is very fast but has average stamina.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_025.name: Crimson Betta
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_025.description: Characterized by its olive-shaped body and large, elegant fins. While its body is covered with red scales, its dorsal and tail fins display a beautiful red-to-white gradient and its pectoral fins have a colorful gradient of green, yellow, red, and white.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_026.name: Cardinalfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_026.description: It has a tall, flat, oval body with a blunt snout, a small mouth, and an abnormally raised section just behind the head. Its body is covered with colorful, iridescent patches.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_027.name: Lava Bream
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_027.description: It has an oval body with a blunt snout, small mouth, green-black spine, and red abdomen. Its name comes from its small, burning-red scales.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_028.name: Yellow Mackerel
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_028.description: Its slender, yellow body has lighter-yellow markings on the back and green-blue fins.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_029.name: Bluetooth Fish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_029.description: Characterized by a round, flat body and a long, saw-like dorsal fin. It is covered with aquamarine-blue patterns that look like shark teeth. People like to eat its delicious meat.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_030.name: Vermilion Betta
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_030.description: Its body is reddish-orange with small pectoral fins and a long dorsal fin. The males are brighter and more aggressive.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_031.name: Red Goosehead Goldfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_031.description: Its body is short and thick with a continuous dorsal fin. The vivid contrast between its white body and the bright red spot on the top of its head makes it quite popular.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_032.name: Glass Catfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_032.description: It features a pointed snout, a broad and robust front body, and a slender, elongated rear half, resembling a willow leaf. Its transparent body allows for clear visibility of its spine, fishbones, fin rays, and internal organs.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_034.name: Butterfly Anchovy
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_034.description: A rare species of anchovy known for its beautiful appearance. It has a bright, orange-red body that gleams with a unique brilliance in the light, as well as a butterfly-shaped, violet tail that is large and elegant.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_035.name: Koi
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_035.description: It features a strong body and vivid, colorful patterns that are unique to each individual. It is said that they bring good luck.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_037.name: Emperor Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_037.description: A large species of fish characterized by a long, slender body. It has a bright-red dorsal fin that is short and neat, as well as two long barbel on the bottom of its head. It is a powerful swimmer.

Title_1_4_7_1.name: Legendary Racer
Title_1_4_7_1.description: Rank 1 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_4_7_2.name: Epic Racer
Title_1_4_7_2.description: Rank 2 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_4_7_3.name: Star Racer
Title_1_4_7_3.description: Rank 3 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_4_7_4.name: Elite Racer
Title_1_4_7_4.description: Rank 4 to 10 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_1_12_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Miasmic Swamp exploration.

item_SecretAction_103.name: Armor Sample
item_SecretAction_103.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP, and they suffer 95% less damage except when attacked from above.

item_SecretAction_104.name: Mono Sample
item_SecretAction_104.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP, and they suffer 95% less damage when there are other enemies within a 5-meter radius.

item_SecretAction_105.name: Berserker Sample
item_SecretAction_105.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 100% increased HP, and they can fully recover HP 15 seconds after they enter battle.

item_SecretAction_106.name: Flamebath Sample
item_SecretAction_106.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP. Once their HP reaches 0, they can only be defeated with a flame weapon.

Mount_Racing_002.description: This superb car resembles a rushing mammoth when traversing treacherous terrain at high speeds.
source: Obtained from the Wild Beat event

Title_1_1_13_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Grand Sea exploration.

MountWater1_a.name: Diamond Wings: Engine
MountWater1_a.description: The engine of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_b.name: Diamond Wings: Frame
MountWater1_b.description: The frame of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_c.name: Diamond Wings: Booster Fin
MountWater1_c.description: Booster fin of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_d.name: Diamond Wings: Dorsal Fin
MountWater1_d.description: Dorsal fin of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater2_a.name: Vision Sphere: Cabin
MountWater2_a.description: The view is good, but it's better to add a device to scrape off the seaweed that sticks on the window...

MountWater2_b.name: Vision Sphere: Engine
MountWater2_b.description: In fact, when resurfacing, it doesn't contract like a jellyfish every once in a while... It's a machine, after all.

MountWater3.name: Sunfish
MountWater3.description: The way it swims by propelling through the water is lithe and graceful like gliding in the air. Its delicate design allows it to move efficiently without disturbing the undersea creatures.
source: Obtained from the Reflected Whispers event

item_BurgerKing_Whopper.name: Whopper
item_BurgerKing_Whopper.description: A popular product made with a carefully grilled beef patty, crunchy and fresh lettuce, juicy tomato slices, and refreshing pickles.

Avatar_FishKing_033.name: Lightning Eel
Avatar_FishKing_033.description: The slender rainbow figure is so inviting, but danger lurks behind such temptation.

Avatar_FishKing_034.name: Puffy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_034.description: Its puffed-up body serves to display its grand resentment of being caught.

Avatar_FishKing_035.name: Angry Puffy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_035.description: It's only natural to be angry when you get pulled up from the warm waters you call home.

Avatar_FishKing_036.name: Cross Fish
Avatar_FishKing_036.description: It is often used as an ornamental fish because of its beautiful tail.

Avatar_FishKing_037.name: Floppy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_037.description: Many people who do not know better will think that it's just a half-eaten fish put back to the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_038.name: Red Comet
Avatar_FishKing_038.description: Living in warmer waters gives them a reddish color. They swim so fast that they would occasionally wander into shallow water.

Avatar_FishKing_039.name: Lionfish
Avatar_FishKing_039.description: It normally likes to hide in the coral reef. The poisonous spines all over its body are not only dangerous, but also make it easy for the fish to get entangled in the fishing line.

Avatar_FishKing_040.name: Angry Lionfish
Avatar_FishKing_040.description: It prefers warmer waters. The fish struggles harder when it leaves the water, making it more likely to be entangled by the fishing line.

Avatar46.name: Fantasy Trip
Avatar46.description: Look back and feel the wonder of this adventure. Happy anniversary!
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

yikaluosi.name: Icarus
yikaluosi.description: Forever striving to reach what can never be attained.

Fireworks.name: Flower Frenzy
Fireworks.description: Woosh... Bang! Wishing you wealth and luck under the firework sky.
source: Obtained from the Spring Dance event

Fireworks_used.name: Flower Frenzy (Custom)
Fireworks_used.description: Woosh... Bang! Wishing you wealth and luck under the firework sky.
source: Obtained from the Spring Dance event

feiouna.name: Fiona
feiouna.description: A bright tomorrow must be forged by our hands.

MountWater5.name: Drifter
MountWater5.description: Suitable for calm water, looking very comfortable as it moves quickly while drawing beautiful ripples. It can also handle certain wind speeds and waves. (Only usable on water and the ocean.)

Title_1_1_17_1.name: Dark Source Wanderer
Title_1_1_17_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Dark Source Cave exploration.

Avatar37_2.name: Pumpkin Enchantment
source: Obtained from the Thorned Rose event

Title_1_6_1_7.name: Incense Tracker
Title_1_6_1_7.description: Unlocks through the Candlelight Banquet event.

Title_1_6_1_8.name: Final Nightmare
Title_1_6_1_8.description: Unlocks through the Nightmare's Edge event.

genuonuo.name: Gnonno
genuonuo.description: She looks like she would never lose curiosity about the world and what lies beyond, no matter what happens.

MountWater6.name: Tamed Dragon-neck
MountWater6.description: Domesticated dragon-necked turtles are free to cruise about the Deep Sea. The spines on their shells go through a procedure to ensure that there is no longer any poison to pose any risk. Can only be used in the Deep Sea.

Title_1_6_3_1.name: Endless Expedition
Title_1_6_3_1.description: Unlocks within the time limit every week by clearing the Raid on Challenging difficulty.

Title_1_6_1_9.name: Domain 9 Morning Call
Title_1_6_1_9.description: Unlocks through the Domain 9 Strategics event.

Title_1_6_1_10.name: Forgeborn
Title_1_6_1_10.description: Unlocks in the World Forge event.

Title_2_1_0_1.name: Model Worker of Domain 9
Title_2_1_0_1.description: Obtained from Domain 9 Four Symbols Cauldron.

Item_JiuYu_YN_001.name: Field Energy (Vermilion)
Item_JiuYu_YN_001.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
source: Ignisville: Use a signet to open a Tai Chi Chest

Item_JiuYu_YN_002.name: Field Energy (Azure)
Item_JiuYu_YN_002.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
source: Joltville: Use a Signet to open a Tai Chi Chest

Item_JiuYu_YN_003.name: Field Energy (Alabaster)
Item_JiuYu_YN_003.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
source: Marshville: Use a Signet to open a Tai Chi Chest

Item_JiuYu_YN_004.name: Field Energy (Onyx)
Item_JiuYu_YN_004.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
source: Aquaville: Use a Signet to open a Tai Chi Chest

leibiliya.name: Rubilia
leibiliya.description: Form doesn't matter as much as significance.

Mount_019.name: Enigmatic Stag
Mount_019.description: Prototyped after a deer, this vehicle can be powered and piloted through the use of timestamp energy. Its four-legged design renders it well-suited for the mountainous terrain of Domain 9, with the trade-off being a rather bumpy ride.
source: Obtained from the Starry Cruise gachapon event

Mount_020.name: Bionic Hornmane
Mount_020.description: A byproduct of Yuheng's research, these creatures were cultivated using genetic technology to assimilate information on the Darkness obtained in combat. Although it resembles an organic hornmane, it will not attack humans. This has allowed some to use them as mounts.

Mount_020_a.name: Taming Bell
Mount_020_a.description: Necessary for controlling Bionic Hornmanes. Through this device, the hornmane gains the ability to understand and obey instructions.

Mount_020_b.name: Hornmane: Power Core
Mount_020_b.description: Auxiliary exoskeleton energy source of the Bionic Hornmane. Improves durability upon installation.

Mount_021.name: Tamed Tricoon
Mount_021.description: A tricoon tamed from a young age. It is gentle and docile, and can be used as a mount. It is highly intelligent and can understand some human language with training, making it an excellent companion.

Time_artifact_001.name: Cybernetic Arm (3d)
Time_artifact_001.description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_1.name: Bloody Letter
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_1.description: An exquisite letter stained by blood. Feels cold to the touch.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_2.name: Small Dice
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_2.description: A hollow dice with a red bean inside. It seems to be an important thing as it was placed in the pocket closest to the body.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_3.name: Frosty Wild Super Quartet Bracelet
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_3.description: Looks like a crystal bangle sold in the market. It is made of glass and too small. Completely unwearable.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_4.name: Ruo's Kite
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_4.description: Traditional handicraft of Domain 9 handmade by Ruo. A gift for Master Yu Lan.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_1.name: Yu Lan's Hand-Minced Meatballs
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_1.description: Handmade by Yu Lan. Mix the meat and seasoning evenly, then pound it and roll it into balls with a delicate and sweet taste.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_2.name: Yu Lan's Leg-Split Bamboo Rice
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_2.description: Handmade by Yu Lan. Gather bamboo split during training, stuff them with some meat and glutinous rice, then cook them. A masterpiece that's both fragrant and delicious.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60023_1.name: Xiu Chun's Handmade Buns
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60023_1.description: Handmade buns made by Xiu Chun from the steamed bun shop in Yuhua Quarter. Their thin skin, tender filling, freshness, and lack of greasiness make them loved by all the locals.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_3.name: Yuhua Quarter Tang Hulu
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_3.description: Skewer hawthorns on bamboo sticks, then sprinkle on some maltose sugar and sesame. A combination of sweet and sour.

Avatar_85.name: Harrah
Avatar_85.description: The hunter is also the hunted.

Avatar_86.name: Let's Write
Avatar_86.description: Let's write with Liu Huo! Huh? Did I write something wrong?

Avatar_87.name: Scholar
Avatar_87.description: If you stay still, everything will be solid as steel.

Avatar_88.name: Vermilion Fairy
Avatar_88.description: I'm a natural beauty and intelligent beyond compare, and my skill in martial arts is... outstanding! My legend will be passed down for generations throughout the world.
source: Obtained from the Dreamy Phantom gachapon event

Avatar_89.name: Maple Girl
Avatar_89.description: Named after maple leaves that can be seen anywhere in Ignisville. It's more like a spiritual pursuit of hermitage in the city.
source: Obtained from the Starry Cruise gachapon event

Avatar_90.name: Reed Warrior
Avatar_90.description: I go to school and help out with the housework from Monday through Friday, and I practice martial arts on the weekend. Reed Warrior's daily routine is both disciplined and respectful.

Avatar_91.name: Old Friend
source: Obtained from the Jade Pavilion Path event

Avatar_92.name: Huang's Arrival
Avatar_92.description: The beautiful and pleasing spring has arrived with Madam Huang.
source: Obtained from the Serene Grove gachapon event

Avatar_93.name: Zhuyan
Avatar_93.description: Something bad happens every time it appears. Since then, people referred to it as an ancient mythical creature.

Avatar_94.name: Zongyun's Vision
Avatar_94.description: It's got dragon horns and tails.

Avatar_95.name: Excited Tata
Avatar_95.description: National Maritime Museum Collab Rewards. Sun, beach, sea waves, and—new friends from the ocean! Weeeeeeee!

AvatarFrame_86.name: Write 'Em Up
AvatarFrame_86.description: Look beyond the words! The goal is to excel in both writing and martial arts!

AvatarFrame_87.name: Painting
AvatarFrame_87.description: Even though it's been rated as an inferior piece of work, the sentiment it holds is undeniable. To the beloved Ignisville.

AvatarFrame_88.name: Fairy's Dressing Case
AvatarFrame_88.description: To keep your elegancy 24/7, please carry this at all times.
source: Obtained from the Dreamy Phantom gachapon event

AvatarFrame_89.name: Maple & Jade
AvatarFrame_89.description: The maple leaf dyes the memory, and everyone finds their own path at the end.
source: Obtained from the Starry Cruise gachapon event

AvatarFrame_90.name: In the Name of Warriorhood
AvatarFrame_90.description: It's a long way with heavy burdens to become a warrior. Let's wait and see.

AvatarFrame_91.name: Full Moon Reunion
AvatarFrame_91.description: May we enjoy the beautiful scenery of Jade Pavilion together.
source: Obtained from the Jade Pavilion Path event

AvatarFrame_92.name: Bamboo Court Clear Skies
AvatarFrame_92.description: The scenery of flowers in bloom under a clear sky is right here.
source: Obtained from the Serene Grove gachapon event

AvatarFrame_93.name: Bronze Shackles
AvatarFrame_93.description: It is not only power that will be released once it has been unshackled.

AvatarFrame_94.name: Clear Clouds
AvatarFrame_94.description: Watch the clouds return as you ride the azure dragon.

AvatarFrame_95.name: Shy Sprigy
AvatarFrame_95.description: National Ocean Museum Collab Rewards. "Hmm... Ahem..." She is a giant squid and goes by the name, Sprigy.

chat_qipao_87.name: Recitation
chat_qipao_87.description: The next is a poem composed and recited by Liu Huo... Listen up.

chat_qipao_88.name: Melodious Echo
chat_qipao_88.description: Many years later when you look back at this sweaty afternoon under the waterfall, can you still hear those words of encouragement?
source: Obtained from the Dreamy Phantom gachapon event

chat_qipao_89.name: Ingenious Design
chat_qipao_89.description: The Maple Girl has a pure heart and the demeanor of a noble lady.
source: Obtained from the Starry Cruise gachapon event

chat_qipao_90.name: Chivalrous Essentials
chat_qipao_90.description: A person is a reed with thoughts, and a chivalrous person is someone with a rebellious heart toward destiny and oneself.

chat_qipao_91.name: Bright Evening Lights
chat_qipao_91.description: A beautiful occasion on a full moon night.
source: Obtained from the Jade Pavilion Path event

chat_qipao_92.name: Forest Whispers
chat_qipao_92.description: Shh! The birds, the beasts, and the flowers are all whispering.
source: Obtained from the Serene Grove gachapon event

chat_qipao_94.name: Soaring Dragon
chat_qipao_94.description: Words travel fast, on the tongue of a dragon!

chat_qipao_95.name: Shy Sprigy
chat_qipao_95.description: National Ocean Museum Collab Rewards. "Hmm... Ahem..." She is a giant squid and goes by the name, Sprigy.

liuhuo.name: Liu Huo
liuhuo.description: Also known as "The blaze of Ignisville"!

mahjong_back_1.name: Red Maple Dolly
mahjong_back_1.description: Dolly's cuteness can distract the enemy. But don't get distracted yourself!

mahjong_back_2.name: Zhuque Tile (Limited-Time)
mahjong_back_2.description: The Zhuque tile goes best with snacks!

mahjong_back_3.name: Master of Zhen Gong (Limited-Time)
mahjong_back_3.description: The little tile requires much strategy, but despite that, luck is also necessary.

mahjong_back_4.name: I Won!? (Limited-Time)
mahjong_back_4.description: I'm calling it a win!! A long hand? What?! 1, 2, 3... 14. So what if I have an extra tile?!

mahjong_table_2.name: Visitors from Outside (Limited-Time)
mahjong_table_2.description: Travelers from beyond the celestial gate: are you ready to begin a new adventure?

mahjong_table_3.name: Summer Break (Limited-Time)
mahjong_table_3.description: Playing with friends by the sea on a bright summer day. All that's missing is an ice-cold drink!

mahjong_table_4.name: Moonlit Haze (Limited-Time)
mahjong_table_4.description: As the moon bathes the world in its soft, pale glow, it whispers silently to the flowers, stirring them from their dreams.

cardgame_table_1.name: Lucky Mi-a
cardgame_table_1.description: Lucky Mi-a has red packets for everyone! Come get yours!

Item_e600050_3.name: Modified Safeguard Bracelet
Item_e600050_3.description: Shelly added some mechanical modifications to the safeguard bracelet from the fair. Stay safe!

Item_e600050_4.name: Shelly's Custom Ceramic Bowl
Item_e600050_4.description: A ceramic bowl crafted to Shelly's specifications. The only thing that the craftsman had to say about her choice of graphic was, "ridiculous."
