Mount_Racing_003.name: Bluefrost Bloom
Mount_Racing_003.description: A confidential product from Hykros's Vehicle Research Lab. It incorporates some of the latest technology, which still requires testing. Can only be claimed via limited means.

mimi.name: Mimi Is Here
mimi.description: Hey, hey! Madam Huang is speaking to you!

linghan.name: Ling Han
linghan.description: Ling Han, Chief of the Marshville Domain Guards, reporting in.

nanyin.name: Nan Yin
nanyin.description: As the music sounds, the musician has already gone.

Mount_022.name: Floating Bubble
Mount_022.description: Soft, light and most importantly, it's gorgeous! Collect 3 to unlock the National Maritime Museum collab vehicle Floating Bubble.
source: Reward from the Refreshing Summer Breeze event

Mount_023.name: Ink Fox
Mount_023.description: A tamed ink fox, bright, adorable, and very approachable. It can be mounted.

Mount_024.name: Taming Potion Pack
Mount_024.description: A scientific research achievement of the Wildlife Research Institute. Users of this potion tend to become docile.

Item_PermanentCommonAtk25.name: Power Shot
Item_PermanentCommonAtk25.description: A bio-injection developed by Hykros to improve the offensive ability of Executors. After use, all attack is permanently increased.

Item_PermanentHealth1200.name: Source Shot
Item_PermanentHealth1200.description: A bio-injection developed by Hykros to improve the survivability of Executors. After use, HP is permanently increased.

Avatar_97.name: Heartsong
Avatar_97.description: "Things are looking up." I certainly hope this is more than just empty words of encouragement...
source: Obtained from the Silent Serenade event

Avatar_98.name: Summer Break
Avatar_98.description: Mi-a is on vacation. Program has been halted!
source: Obtained from the Seabreeze Whispers event

Avatar_99.name: Shirli: Journey
Avatar_99.description: It's me, Shirli, and I'm looking forward to taking on this journey with you!

Avatar_100.name: Nemesis: New Life
Avatar_100.description: Oh, it's you again, Wanderer. I mean, it's been a while... How have you been lately?

Avatar_101.name: Seaside Beauty
Avatar_101.description: Dance with the sea, embracing with tenderness.
source: Obtained from the Summer Frost gachapon event

Avatar_102.name: Sparrotail
Avatar_102.description: An elite Domain Guard of Ignisville under the leadership of Zhuque. Each bears distinct fates under their standardized equipment.

Avatar_103.name: Snowy
Avatar_103.description: Snowy, the latest smart servant, reports to you!

Avatar_104.name: Childish Laughter
Avatar_104.description: The camera captured a casual glance of a little girl on the street corner. Whose child is this?
source: Obtained from the Elite Grandeur gachapon event

Avatar_105.name: Flute Master
Avatar_105.description: Amidst jade pipes, clouds take flight; mystic mists veil the hidden light. Nan Yin has long mastered the art of the bamboo flute. As a renowned maestro, her melodies compel all to pause and listen.
source: Obtained from the Tranquil Melody gachapon event

Avatar_106.name: Prisoner
Avatar_106.description: Watch out for the flashing purple light. That's the color of the desire to kill.

Avatar_107.name: Night Mask
source: Obtained from the Silken Adornment event

Avatar_108.name: Taotie
Avatar_108.description: After I swallow the entire world, I am the world. And the world is me.

Avatar_110.name: Count Dracula
Avatar_110.description: Ha-ha-ha-ha, you're really quite something! I can barely keep my fake teeth from falling out laughing. Hopefully not, as they're not an easy thing to find in the nursery.

Avatar_111.name: Princess Woodley
Avatar_111.description: This is a gesture I just learned, and it seems to be very suitable for the current situation.

Avatar_112.name: Ms. Jumpy
Avatar_112.description: Are you intending to scare Ruby like this...

Avatar_113.name: Little Spirit
Avatar_113.description: You'll regret seeing this side of me!!!

Avatar_114.name: Sleepyhead
Avatar_114.description: "Looks like it's about time to turn in... Huh? I think I was dreaming that Teacher was glaring at me... Oh... I guess I'm still in the middle of the report..."
source: Obtained from the Sleep Talking gachapon event.

Avatar_115.name: Familiar Metz
Avatar_115.description: In the busy cafe, the well-behaved Metz is also quietly helping out.
source: Purchased from the Mirroria Trip Event Store.

CN_Avatar_1.name: Mi-a on Cyber Friday
CN_Avatar_1.description: Even Mi-a can't help but feel like shopping on this day every year.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_Avatar_2.name: Windchasing Maiden
CN_Avatar_2.description: Step on the gas and race ahead.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_Avatar_3.name: Birthday Mi-a
CN_Avatar_3.description: Mi-a heard today is special, dressed up in new clothes to celebrate with you.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_Avatar_4.name: N/A
source: Purchased from the Mirroria Trip Event Store.

CN_Avatar_5.name: N/A
source: Purchased from the Mirroria Trip Event Store.

AvatarFrame_96.name: Dragon Cloud & Jade Leaf
AvatarFrame_96.description: The dragon soars over the forest as the wind whips over Joltville's moon.

AvatarFrame_97.name: Vase
AvatarFrame_97.description: "She's just a flower they keep around because she looks good." Someone from the last team actually dared to say this, thinking she was out of earshot.
source: Obtained from the Silent Serenade event

AvatarFrame_98.name: Under the Sunglasses
AvatarFrame_98.description: Putting on filters makes even summer days cool and refreshing!
source: Obtained from the Seabreeze Whispers event

AvatarFrame_100.name: Embracing New Life
AvatarFrame_100.description: I'm still not quite used to these arms, so I've been practicing how to hug lately...

AvatarFrame_101.name: Rugged
AvatarFrame_101.description: The waves shimmer with the play of light, as radiant as the moon.
source: Obtained from the Summer Frost gachapon event

AvatarFrame_102.name: In the Name of Zhuque
AvatarFrame_102.description: Every elite member who joins the Sparrotails has taken an oath in the presence of Lady Zhuque.

AvatarFrame_103.name: Ear Touch
AvatarFrame_103.description: These are the ears of a tiger, not a cat!

AvatarFrame_104.name: Little Playmate
AvatarFrame_104.description: Little playmates in joyful spree, sharing tales and kites so free.
source: Obtained from the Elite Grandeur gachapon event

AvatarFrame_105.name: Blue Silk Ribbon
AvatarFrame_105.description: A delicate lace skirt with a belt tightly wrapped around... What is this attire? "Just an old performance costume..."
source: Obtained from the Tranquil Melody gachapon event

AvatarFrame_106.name: Bones
AvatarFrame_106.description: Broken bones are medals of victory.

AvatarFrame_107.name: Silken Plume
AvatarFrame_107.description: Listen! In the hush of night, bats dance and night ravens sing their eerie song. Shadowy feathers drift silently down—was it merely the wind, or something more that whispered along?
source: Obtained from the Silken Adornment event

AvatarFrame_108.name: Abyss Megamouth
AvatarFrame_108.description: Eat! Eat! Eat! I want to eat! Everything!

AvatarFrame_109.name: Magic Harvest
AvatarFrame_109.description: Come on and join the party!

AvatarFrame_110.name: Domain of the Four Symbols
AvatarFrame_110.description: Field energy is omnipresent within Domain 9 across the lands of the four states.

AvatarFrame_114.name: Fantasy Break
AvatarFrame_114.description: This is a cup of magical coffee that can extradite consciousness to the realm of fairies. While the soul rests, tasks will be unconsciously completed... Hehe...
source: Obtained from the Sleep Talking gachapon event.

AvatarFrame_115.name: Friendship Caffeine
AvatarFrame_115.description: Specially infused with friendship magic by Brevey, each cup of coffee is filled with a magical dose of caffeine!
source: Purchased from the Mirroria Trip Event Store.

CN_AvatarFrame_1.name: Friday Energy
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_AvatarFrame_2.name: Unrestrained Strides
CN_AvatarFrame_2.description: Sprint like a mammoth. Not even the shadows can keep up.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_AvatarFrame_3.name: Fervent Winter Flame
CN_AvatarFrame_3.description: Flames lash wildly, keeping the cold at bay and warming the snow and ice.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_AvatarFrame_4.name: Flourishing Brush
CN_AvatarFrame_4.description: One stroke sweeps away armies, and one line brings flowers to life.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_AvatarFrame_5.name: Thoughts of Winter
CN_AvatarFrame_5.description: One can still dream of a white winter in a neon city that never snows.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

chat_qipao_96.name: Unstoppable
chat_qipao_96.description: Tianzhang Pavilion will never falter, and neither will I!

chat_qipao_97.name: Virtual Chat
chat_qipao_97.description: How far is it from silent exchange of words on paper to face-to-face communication?
source: Obtained from the Silent Serenade event

chat_qipao_98.name: Summer Souvenir
chat_qipao_98.description: By the beach, under the parasol, a cool breeze is by my ears, and memories are in my heart.
source: Obtained from the Seabreeze Whispers event

chat_qipao_100.name: Emerging New Life
chat_qipao_100.description: I'm doing my best to decode the message you sent...

chat_qipao_101.name: Icy Stroll
chat_qipao_101.description: Walk lightly on the beach and feel the icy sensation underfoot.
source: Obtained from the Summer Frost gachapon event

chat_qipao_102.name: Ignisville Comm Channel
chat_qipao_102.description: This channel is reserved for internal Sparrotail communications only. Unauthorized disclosure is prohibited and will result in legal action.

chat_qipao_104.name: I promise.
chat_qipao_104.description: Alright, no backing out! Pinky swear for a hundred years!
source: Obtained from the Elite Grandeur gachapon event

chat_qipao_105.name: Graceful Blossoms
chat_qipao_105.description: Her enchanting performance brings forth melodies that blossom like flowers.
source: Obtained from the Tranquil Melody gachapon event

chat_qipao_107.name: Adornment Scroll
chat_qipao_107.description: Unfurl the scroll to reveal mysterious writings. Beware, those unreadable characters might contain the secrets of the night.
source: Obtained from the Silken Adornment event

chat_qipao_114.name: Floating Secrets
chat_qipao_114.description: Maybe the next time you wake up, a miracle will happen...!? "Good morning! A miraculously peaceful new day is about to begin~"
source: Obtained from the Sleep Talking gachapon event.

chat_qipao_115.name: Amazing Aroma
chat_qipao_115.description: Ah, the fragrance of coffee... Is it coming from over there?...Oh! Is that a new pop-up cafe?
source: Purchased from the Mirroria Trip Event Store.

CN_chat_qipao_1.name: High and Mighty
CN_chat_qipao_1.description: Wait no longer, time to take action!
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_chat_qipao_2.name: Set Forth
CN_chat_qipao_2.description: Set forth, and race through the vast wilderness.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_chat_qipao_3.name: Obedient Spark
CN_chat_qipao_3.description: Entrusted by Ruby, Spark brings sincere blessings to you, Executor.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_chat_qipao_4.name: Sweeping Strokes
CN_chat_qipao_4.description: Liu Huo's calligraphy style is valiant and unstoppable. May you also write your own brave story.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

CN_chat_qipao_5.name: Enchanting Ice and Snow
CN_chat_qipao_5.description: "Is snow synonymous with beauty? Actually, it's synonymous with power!" A middle school swordswoman said with a tremor in her voice.
source: Obtained from the Warm Winter Serenade event

animated_qipao_1.name: Poetic Inspiration
animated_qipao_1.description: Joy and sorrow, separation and reunion, phases of the moon and sun. With whom can these poetic sentiments be shared?

Item_BigWorldSnow.name: Unmelted Snow
Item_BigWorldSnow.description: A lump of freshly collected snow. Looks very clean.

Mount025_skin_02.name: Archeagle
Mount025_skin_02.description: A tamed archeagle, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount025_skin_03.name: Dazzling Archeagle
Mount025_skin_03.description: A tamed dazzling archeagle, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount025_skin_04.name: Hornfeather
Mount025_skin_04.description: A tamed hornfeather, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount025_skin_05.name: Crimson Hornfeather
Mount025_skin_05.description: A tamed crimson hornfeather, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount025_skin_06.name: Nightmare Scourge
Mount025_skin_06.description: A tamed nightmare scourge, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount025_skin_07.name: Thorny Nightmare Scourge
Mount025_skin_07.description: A tamed thorny nightmare scourge, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount025_skin_08.name: Qilin
Mount025_skin_08.description: A tamed Qilin, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount025_skin_09.name: Scarlet Archeagle
Mount025_skin_09.description: Responding to the call, the scarlet archeagle arrives, its bright red tail feathers a symbol of friendship.
source: Obtained from the Proof of Scarlet mission.

linghan_lv2.name: Ling Han: Awakened
linghan_lv2.description: The beast is about to be unleashed, and the fight is upon us.

feise_lv2.name: Fei Se: Awakened
feise_lv2.description: Her eyes are sweet, her gaze so deep, the story of life she sees.

mimi_lv2.name: Mimi: Awakened
mimi_lv2.description: Bamboo births rare blooms. When will they enchant us next?

mingjing_lv2.name: Ming Jing: Awakened
mingjing_lv2.description: The weight of duty is immense, but I shoulder it with a bittersweet resolve.

peipei_lv2.name: Outstanding Nurse Award
peipei_lv2.description: After my nap, I found a tiny cake adorned with heart-shaped cherries on the table—surely, this is the recognition my hard work deserves!

moliniya.name: Travel Application
moliniya.description: No matter how obedient a child is, when pushed to the limit, they might be forced to speak half-truths and lies, right?

Mount_Water_007_Skin_02.name: Phantom Dolphin
Mount_Water_007_Skin_02.description: A tamed phantom dolphin, very friendly to humans and fond of playing with them in the sea. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount_Water_007_Skin_03.name: Gold Phantom Dolphin
Mount_Water_007_Skin_03.description: A tamed gold phantom dolphin, very friendly to humans and fond of playing with them in the sea. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount_Water_007_Skin_04.name: Crimson Phantom Dolphin
Mount_Water_007_Skin_04.description: A tamed crimson phantom dolphin, very friendly to humans and fond of playing with them in the sea. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount_Water_007_Skin_05.name: Jade Phantom Dolphin
Mount_Water_007_Skin_05.description: A tamed jade phantom dolphin, very friendly to humans and fond of playing with them in the sea. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount_Water_007_Skin_06.name: Black Phantom Dolphin
Mount_Water_007_Skin_06.description: A tamed black phantom dolphin, very friendly to humans and fond of playing with them in the sea. Can be used as a vehicle.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

nanyin_lv2.name: Nan Yin: Awakened
nanyin_lv2.description: For Domain 9's future, and for everyone to be safe from the Darkness's onslaught.

linye_lv2.name: Lin: Awakened
linye_lv2.description: In the shadow of the city, wearing a mask brings you closer to being your true self.

feiouna_lv2.name: Fiona: Awakened
feiouna_lv2.description: Sound the music and let courage roam freely in this beautiful ocean.

genuonuo_lv2.name: Gnonno: Awakened
genuonuo_lv2.description: "Pip! You always loved these lacy dresses, didn't you?...Hmm, why aren't you as excited as before?"

leibiliya_lv2.name: Rubilia: Awakened
leibiliya_lv2.description: For a sliver of hope, even if it's the darkest kind.

liuhuo_lv2.name: Liu Huo: Awakened
liuhuo_lv2.description: Work hard toward being a refined lady with a belly full of ink! Not literally, though!

aige_lv2.name: Wastewalker
aige_lv2.description: Another day of standing up for justice and lending a hand to those in need!

yanmiao_lv2.name: Yan Miao: Awakened
yanmiao_lv2.description: From this day forward, I am the overseer of the Department of Yuheng.

wumi_lv2.name: Umi: Awakened
wumi_lv2.description: Umi and "Umi" are just parts of the same curved surface that extends into infinity.

lan_lv2.name: Lan: Awakened
lan_lv2.description: Be not afraid of mountains of blades and seas of fire.

fenlier_lv2.name: Fenrir: Awakened
fenlier_lv2.description: Boom, boom, boom! Turn up the volume! It's normal to lose yourself in the moment of the perfect beat!

yikaluosi_lv2.name: Icarus: Awakened
yikaluosi_lv2.description: "Now that's what a son of the Ptéryga family should look like." Is that right?

hida_lv2.name: Harbor Girl
hida_lv2.description: Are you ready to keep up with the star of Banges?

bulewei_lv2.name: Brevey: Awakened
bulewei_lv2.description: I like stories about magical girls more than science! Relax and have a loving and peaceful time away from reality.

xinghuan_lv2.name: Lyra: Awakened
xinghuan_lv2.description: The dawn I've been on the lookout for has quietly awakened.

tianlang_lv2.name: Tian Lang: Awakened
tianlang_lv2.description: With this order, Mirroria Nursery won't have to worry about R&D expenses for a while.

ailisi_lv2.name: Alyss: Awakened
ailisi_lv2.description: Special Forces Agent, code name M-sec 2000.

annabeila_lv2.name: Annabella: Awakening
annabeila_lv2.description: "Vampires" can also refer to selfish humans who sacrifice others for their own interests.

bailing_lv2.name: Shelter Leader
bailing_lv2.description: Is the leader of HT201 Shelter capable enough to hold her own ground now?

paluodi_lv2.name: Plotti: Awakened
paluodi_lv2.description: Titi, can you tell me where the fun stuff is?

naimeixisi_lv2.name: Nemesis: Awakened
naimeixisi_lv2.description: Have you forgotten she was once a merciless, terrifying human weapon? You worked really hard to turn her back to the girl you knew.

leibei_lv2.name: Ruby: Awakened
leibei_lv2.description: For Ruby, you are the only one that matters in this world.

bupoxiao_lv2.name: Saki Fuwa: Awakened
bupoxiao_lv2.description: The true identity of Ultimate Warriors often remains unknown!

kelaodiya_lv2.name: Claudia: Awakened
kelaodiya_lv2.description: Carry out my justice with my sword.

yanuo_lv2.name: Yanuo: Awakened
yanuo_lv2.description: Dispel the darkness with the power of love and friendship! Remember to strike a Kirala pose while saying it.

bulewei.name: Brevey
bulewei.description: Rumor has it that this nerdy scientist's special glasses allow her to see the world through a sparkly magic filter...

paluodi.name: Plotti
paluodi.description: I let it slide this time, but it won't happen again.

yanuo.name: Yanuo
yanuo.description: Let's polish this gem of friendship together to make it even more radiant.

asuka.name: Asuka
asuka.description: I'm Asuka Shikinami Langley, the pilot of Unit-02!

asuka_lv2.name: Pilot
asuka_lv2.description: Any idea of the weight behind the control stick I'm holding?

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuCompass1.name: Compass: 210-225-240
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuCompass1.description: A disc-shaped object made of unknown materials. One side of it is brilliant enough to reflect one's image like a mirror, while the other side is divided into several sectors with many incomprehensible symbols.

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuCompass2.name: Compass: 30-255-60
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuCompass2.description: A disc-shaped object made of unknown materials. One side of it is brilliant enough to reflect one's image like a mirror, while the other side is divided into several sectors with many incomprehensible symbols.

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuCompass3.name: Compass: 120-135,150
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuCompass3.description: A disc-shaped object made of unknown materials. One side of it is brilliant enough to reflect one's image like a mirror, while the other side is divided into several sectors with many incomprehensible symbols.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking1.name: Thick Cut Rib Noodles
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking1.description: 10 simple steps can transform an ordinary piece of chop into a braised heaven. The meat is so tender and the sauce so fragrant. A lunch option for the Domain Guards at the Pass of Ao.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking2.name: Juicy Steamed Stuffed Bun
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking2.description: A bite-sized steamed bun with a juicy meat filling. Take a bite and all your craving for food will be satisfied. Better enjoyed with dark vinegar. A lunch option for the Domain Guards at the Pass of Ao.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking3.name: Power Tea Egg
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking3.description: A flavored boiled egg braised with tea leaves, spices and soy sauce. Once the egg is set, its shell is gently cracked to better absorb the flavor. It makes a perfect snack between meals. A lunch option for the Domain Guards at the Pass of Ao.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking4.name: Hot and Sour Vermicelli
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Cooking4.description: Boiled vermicelli served in a carefully prepared soup. It's numbing, spicy, refreshing, fragrant and sour all at once. You are guaranteed to sweat! A lunch option for the Domain Guards at the Pass of Ao.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book1.name: 100,000 Repair Tips (Volume I)
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book1.description: It explains why things are broken.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book2.name: 100,000 Repair Tips (Volume II)
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book2.description: It introduces how to fix things using technology.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book3.name: 100,000 Repair Tips (Volume III)
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book3.description: It introduces how to fix things using supernatural powers.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book4.name: 100,000 Repair Tips (Volume IV)
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Book4.description: It explains how to take care of things after damage.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass1.name: Compass: Broken Hand
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass1.description: "Gazing upon the plane of white, breathing in the aroma where manifestations ignite. Hearing whispers of distant sound, touching with a feeling, subtle and profound. Tasting flavors of hardship and zest, soaring freely above, beyond the highest crest." The places mentioned in this poem seem to be located in the Pass of Ao...

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass2.name: Compass: Shard I
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass2.description: A Compass shard found in the Planar Loft. The disk seems to have shattered into five pieces. If all parts can be found, one should be able to put the compass back together.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass3.name: Compass: Shard II
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass3.description: A Compass shard found in Exquisite Taste Bistro. The disk seems to have shattered into five pieces. If all parts can be found, one should be able to put the compass back together.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass4.name: Compass: Shard III
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass4.description: A Compass shard found at the chimes in the Pass of Ao. The disk seems to have shattered into five pieces. If all parts can be found, one should be able to put the compass back together.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass5.name: Compass: Shard IV
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass5.description: A Compass shard found in Subtle Enlightenment Tower. The disk seems to have shattered into five pieces. If all parts can be found, one should be able to put the compass back together.

Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass6.name: Compass: Shard V
Item_FiveSenseRddles_Compass6.description: A Compass shard found in Manifestation Pavilion. The disk seems to have shattered into five pieces. If all parts can be found, one should be able to put the compass back together.

Item_JiuYu_quest_lingpai.name: Chen Yuan's Command Seal
Item_JiuYu_quest_lingpai.description: A command seal reserved for the Captain of the Domain Guards, inscribed with the name "Chen Yuan." It might be best to entrust this to someone who knew him...

Mount_026.name: Wondrous Vessel
Mount_026.description: A vehicle developed using the latest research findings of the Department of Yuheng, featuring a unique curved body and a smooth driving experience on top of the distinctive back push from the field energy-powered engine. Shift the gear to the highest and prepare your ears for the thunderous roar of the exhaust pipe.

TicketCard01.name: Orion Lucky Points: Phase One
TicketCard01.description: Obtain to get one Orion Lucky Card: Phase One scratch-off.

TicketCard02.name: Venus Lucky Points: Phase One
TicketCard02.description: Obtain to get one Venus Lucky Card: Phase One scratch-off.

TicketCard03.name: Orion Lucky Points: Phase Two
TicketCard03.description: Obtain to get one Orion Lucky Card: Phase Two scratch-off.

TicketCard04.name: Venus Lucky Points: Phase Two
TicketCard04.description: Obtain to get one Venus Lucky Card: Phase Two scratch-off.

TicketCard05.name: Orion Lucky Points: Phase Three
TicketCard05.description: Obtain to get one Orion Lucky Card: Phase Three scratch-off.

TicketCard06.name: Venus Lucky Points: Phase Three
TicketCard06.description: Obtain to get one Venus Lucky Card: Phase Three scratch-off.

Item_MegaGuruCoin.name: Master Coin
Item_MegaGuruCoin.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to warriors.

Item_SummerCoin_03.name: Bamboo Breeze Token
Item_SummerCoin_03.description: A commemorative token made of bamboo. Hold it in your hand and let it cool off the heat.

Item_SummerCoin_04.name: Shell Coin
Item_SummerCoin_04.description: A token made from carving shells found at the beach. They serve as souvenirs of the summer beach event, and carry the sounds and smells of the sea with them wherever they go.

Item_BleviCoin.name: Bestie Token
Item_BleviCoin.description: A treasure designed and meticulously crafted by Brevey herself. Only close friends who accompany Brevey to visit Mirroria can obtain this treasure~

Item_LuckyTarotCoin.name: Eternal Gold
Item_LuckyTarotCoin.description: A balance within unity. It contains infinite magical energy and only obeys the call of courage. Legend has it that one can collect it to redeem certain surprises. (A maximum of 98 Eternal Gold can be obtained. Please use wisely.)

Item_NoteCoin.name: Serenade Note
Item_NoteCoin.description: A commemorative badge released by Hykros during the Warm Winter Serenade event. Feel free to dance along with the music.

Item_SnowCoin.name: Warm Winter Snowball
Item_SnowCoin.description: "Edelweiss, edelweiss, everlasting snowballs in warm winter..." This mysterious rhyme has recently become popular, and I heard that snowballs that don't melt actually appeared!

Item_IceFlowerCoin.name: Frozen Flower
Item_IceFlowerCoin.description: Suddenly, a cold wave arrives, and the blossoming flowers, in their most beautiful moment, are forever frozen.

Item_firecracker_Coin.name: Firecracker
Item_firecracker_Coin.description: With the sound of firecrackers, we bid farewell to the old year and welcome the arrival of the New Year amidst the crackling sound of firecrackers!

item_eva_coin.name: Radiant Commemorative Medal
item_eva_coin.description: A commemorative medal with the head of MX-00 engraved on it. It represents and recognizes the outstanding contributions of pilots.

Item_IceCrystalCoin.name: Ice Crystal
Item_IceCrystalCoin.description: Commemorative coins containing frost energy made from crystalline ore mined in extremely cold regions. Feels cold to the touch when you hold one. Some also use them as ice for their drinks.

Item_MowingCoin.name: Conflict Coupon
Item_MowingCoin.description: A coupon obtained from Conflict Frontline. Exquisitely crafted, it is embedded with an anti-counterfeit chip. Can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_WeaponSurvivalCoin.name: Maple Emblem
Item_WeaponSurvivalCoin.description: A reward for participating in Assembling for Combat.

Item_TheAsianGamesCoin.name: Challenger Medal
Item_TheAsianGamesCoin.description: Extreme sports are all about challenging yourselves. Valiant challengers, we praise your spirits with this reward for participating in the Ultimate Champion Tournament.

Item_JuiceCoin.name: Juice
Item_JuiceCoin.description: The bottle is filled with sweet juice.

Item_AutumnCoin_01.name: Golden Maple Token
Item_AutumnCoin_01.description: Tokens obtained by participating in the autumn activities at the garden party. They carry the unique fragrance of the garden.

Item_CountryDay_Coin.name: Rainbow token
Item_CountryDay_Coin.description: A token that is handed out during the carnival in Mirroria. The brilliant lights embedded in each one add a nice touch to the lively atmosphere, but it would have been nicer if they came with batteries that lasted longer...

Item_CountryDay_Coin_02.name: Lucky Money
Item_CountryDay_Coin_02.description: Welcome the new year. May you be healthy, wealthy, and lucky!

Item_Carp.name: Koi of Prosperity
Item_Carp.description: Its scales shine as the fish leaps over the dragon gate.

Item_HideAndSeekCoin_01.name: Camo Coin
Item_HideAndSeekCoin_01.description: Increase the value of the currency with camo technology... Something that's not supposed to be done!

Item_HideAndSeekCoin_02.name: Camo Coin
Item_HideAndSeekCoin_02.description: Increase the value of the currency with camo technology... Something that's not supposed to be done!

Item_SecretActionCoin.name: Ocean Chip
Item_SecretActionCoin.description: A custom chip that records information about the ocean and continuously updates with each submitted sample.

Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin.name: Gift Voucher
Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin.description: There must be mysterious treasures hidden in the ocean, why else would there be many treasure-hunting legends?

Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin_02.name: Trove Fountain
Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin_02.description: A coin minted from metal with a square hole at its center and a blue data stripe that stores the coin's minting information. It was once widely circulated in Domain 9 and is now being used as a souvenir that can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_LaserBattleCoin.name: Penannular Jade
Item_LaserBattleCoin.description: Exquisitely crafted rare metal inlaid with a jade stone. Can be exchanged for items.

Item_ExplorationBookCoin.name: Green Beetle
Item_ExplorationBookCoin.description: A coin with an insect engraving. Legend has it that they fly back once they are spent, though no one knows where they fly to.

Item_HalloweenCoin_01.name: Cream Cookie
Item_HalloweenCoin_01.description: Covered in a snowflake-like cream, it's more filling than candy.

Item_HalloweenCoin_02.name: Crackling Hard Candy
Item_HalloweenCoin_02.description: Bulk candy that will crackle and pop in your mouth. Best to eat with your mouth closed.

Item_HalloweenCoin_04.name: Soft Jelly Candy
Item_HalloweenCoin_04.description: This candy with a crisp coating and melted interior will fill you with happiness when you bite into it.

Item_SeizeFlagCoin_01.name: Star sand
Item_SeizeFlagCoin_01.description: The bottle is filled with childhood dreams.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_02.name: Rumble Token
Item_OrienteeringCoin_02.description: Won in Rumble Racing and etched with hubcap patterns, these tokens are redeemable for prizes.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_03.name: Driftstone
Item_OrienteeringCoin_03.description: Floats in the water, flies in the air! Once, twice, three times... it bounces on the water until it takes flight toward the opposite bank!

Item_MorePlayerHarmonyCoin.name: Skill Commendation
Item_MorePlayerHarmonyCoin.description: For whose hands masterfully cut through the air, launching strikes like a musician crafts music, this commendation stands to honor their heroic bearing.

BreakFate_InnerCoin.name: Break From Destiny coin
BreakFate_InnerCoin.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to warriors.

Item_battery.name: Energy Activation Charger
Item_battery.description: Special material used to power machines.

Item_BossCustommadeCoin.name: Spiritual Point
Item_BossCustommadeCoin.description: Proof of victory earned from Spiritual Clash combat missions.

Item_BossCustommadeScore.name: Spiritual Clash Virtual Modules
Item_BossCustommadeScore.description: Produced by the Hykros Combat Simulation Bureau.

Item_BossCustommadeCoin_02.name: Spiritual Point
Item_BossCustommadeCoin_02.description: Proof of victory earned from Spiritual Clash combat missions.

Item_BossCustommadeScore_02.name: Spiritual Clash Virtual Modules
Item_BossCustommadeScore_02.description: Produced by the Hykros Combat Simulation Bureau.

Item_YunTaiMarticalCoin.name: Battle Badge
Item_YunTaiMarticalCoin.description: Hone and prove your skills with Yu Lan at the Cloud Arena Martial Arts.

Item_ClashRoyaleCoin.name: Proof of Precaution
Item_ClashRoyaleCoin.description: Proof of helping Hykros complete the City Siege drill.

Item_BreakFateBossCoin.name: Encirclement Coin
Item_BreakFateBossCoin.description: Splurging over a limited time can reverse your fate. This is your reward for helping your friends out of difficulty.

Item_BreakFateBossCoin_02.name: Co-Op Coin
Item_BreakFateBossCoin_02.description: Splurging over a limited time can reverse your fate. This is your reward for helping your friends out of difficulty.

Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin1.name: Jade Coin
Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin1.description: A currency obtained from the Jade Pavilion Fair. The design stands for the expectations that people have for this event, which hasn't been held in a long time. Chant a poem for the beautiful future of Domain 9.

Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin2.name: Jade Ingot
Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin2.description: A currency obtained from the Jade Pavilion Fair. Hand-made by the craftsmen of Domain 9 to look like an ingot, this year's coins are shinier than the ones twelve years ago.

Item_AnniversaryCoin.name: Commemorative Anniversary Medal
Item_AnniversaryCoin.description: Coins made of rare metals and engraved with exquisite patterns, can be worn on the chest as a medallion or exchanged for prizes.

Item_Incarnation_03.name: Elite Battle Orders
Item_Incarnation_03.description: The mark of an elite vanguard. An order of battle, a sigil of glory.

HXXK_clue.name: Look for Clues
HXXK_clue.description: A special clue provided by the Comet Monthly Editorial Department. It assists readers in completing missions and exchanging them for stamps more efficiently.

Item_FollowGhostCoin.name: Candy Apple
Item_FollowGhostCoin.description: Freshly harvested apples, coated with syrup and topped with nuts, perfect for children coming to trick-or-treat.

Item_MultiLeagueCoin_01.name: Shadow Coin
Item_MultiLeagueCoin_01.description: Be they echoes of the past or bygone phantasm, they all shattered into ashes in the corridors of time, forged into this one gold coin.

Item_MultiLeagueCoin_02.name: Shadow Coin
Item_MultiLeagueCoin_02.description: Be they echoes of the past or bygone phantasm, they all shattered into ashes in the corridors of time, forged into this one gold coin.

Item_EscortingCoin.name: Convoy Coin
Item_EscortingCoin.description: A commemorative token obtained through participation in the Perfect Convoy. Engraved with the image of the Cargo Dragonfly Cruiser, it is used to redeem items.

Item_ColosseumFood_01.name: Combat Feed (Small)
Item_ColosseumFood_01.description: Specially formulated feed for combat beasts. Slightly increases EXP while maintaining their fighting instincts.

Item_ColosseumFood_02.name: Combat Feed (Medium)
Item_ColosseumFood_02.description: Specially formulated feed for combat beasts. Moderately increases EXP while maintaining their fighting instincts.

Item_ColosseumFood_03.name: Combat Feed (Large)
Item_ColosseumFood_03.description: Specially formulated feed for combat beasts. Significantly increases EXP while maintaining their fighting instincts.

Item_ColosseumCoin_packwin.name: Beast Coin
Item_ColosseumCoin_packwin.description: Coins earned through matches in the Beast Brawl Arena. Can be used to redeem rewards.

Mount008_1_Skin_01.name: Dream Star
Mount008_1_Skin_01.description: Bleep-bleep! Now let me talk about how it works! It uses the most precious gem in the universe as its engine—the friendship gem! It is specially designed to travel between different domains, and all powered by just the love and hope in your heart!

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_1.name: Sugar Figurine
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_1.description: A sugar figurine drawn by the auntie herself. Very popular with kids.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_2.name: Kite
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_2.description: A kite from the vendor. It has a classical pattern.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_3.name: Broken Blade
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_3.description: The broken sword that Gu Chen used while still a ranger.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_4.name: Gem
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_4.description: The most precious gemstone of the great merchant Zheng. Most suitable for making a ring.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_5.name: Gemstone Ring
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_5.description: A gemstone ring carefully crafted by an artisan. Beautiful and hard.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_6.name: Final Letter
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_6.description: The final letter Gu Chen originally intended to write for Man He. However, due to the loss of Man He's whereabouts, it has been kept in Roadcharge Camp.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_7.name: Manual of War
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60108_7.description: Gu Chen's detailed battle notes from the combat experiences in Hendeca County.

Avatar_116.name: Radiant Overflow
Avatar_116.description: Neon lights illuminate the city, and cheers overflow the streets. Join the festive crowd!

Avatar_117.name: Roving Dragon
Avatar_117.description: Longxiang Domain Guards move like roving dragons, swift and electrifying.

Avatar_118.name: Nightmarish Secret Realm
Avatar_118.description: Mi-a had a nightmare last night, dreaming of wandering through a secret garden under a lunar eclipse, lured and devoured by a nightmarish figure in a top hat.
source: Obtained from the Magnificent Nightmare gachapon event.

Avatar_119.name: Zekie
Avatar_119.description: "Don't underestimate Zekie's shell. A punch might hurt your hand more than it hurts him," said the designer.

Avatar_120.name: Top DJ
Avatar_120.description: "Wishing for a piece of chocolate, sweet and unforgettable."

Avatar_121.name: Intruder
Avatar_121.description: An intruder? Not really, she just arrived here as naturally as one could.
source: Obtained from the Infiltrating Shadow gachapon event.

Avatar_122.name: Declaration of Companionship
Avatar_122.description: The singer of the 2nd-anniversary theme song will be with you indefinitely.

Avatar_126.name: Piping Hot
Avatar_126.description: Phew, phew... so hot! Steamed buns with seafood filling, my first time trying them. Oh, almost forgot, Happy New Year, everyone!
source: Obtained from the Majestic Dragon event

Avatar_127.name: EVA-00 Avatar
Avatar_127.description: Avatar of Evangelion Proto Type-00. A Multipurpose Humanoid Decisive Weapon.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

Avatar_2nd_Anni.name: Birthday Declaration
Avatar_2nd_Anni.description: Yay, Tata is amazing! Stage cleared. Level up!

AvatarFrame_116.name: Flickering Rhythm
AvatarFrame_116.description: A serenade of light and shadow plays to thank you for your arrival!

AvatarFrame_117.name: Silver Lightning
AvatarFrame_117.description: Silver lightning leads, and thunder rumbles close behind. Keep up but beware.

AvatarFrame_118.name: Splendid Enchantress
AvatarFrame_118.description: In the garden of nightmares, eucalyptus grows into bone-like shapes, surrounding the splendid blue enchantress and hiding all secrets beneath.
source: Obtained from the Magnificent Nightmare gachapon event.

AvatarFrame_119.name: Turtle-Snake
AvatarFrame_119.description: The body of a snake and the shell of a turtle. Onyx Tortoise is not too dissimilar...

AvatarFrame_120.name: Oasis
AvatarFrame_120.description: Dance floor, music, and disco balls. The longing for rhythm urges people to go to this paradise.

AvatarFrame_121.name: Elite Agent
source: Obtained from the Infiltrating Shadow gachapon event.

AvatarFrame_122.name: Fantasy Declaration
AvatarFrame_122.description: Wishing Tata joyous fantasies every day, not just today.

AvatarFrame_123.name: Fantasy P World Creation
AvatarFrame_123.description: 2nd Anniversary, Tata Unleashed! Dive into the artistic world of Tower of Fantasy and create memories for the Harmony Season.

AvatarFrame_126.name: Inverted Scale
AvatarFrame_126.description: Beneath the neck of the divine dragon, there is a white inverted scale, about a foot long, crescent-shaped, untouchable, provoking anger if disturbed.
source: Obtained from the Majestic Dragon event

chat_qipao_116.name: Byte Bounce
chat_qipao_116.description: With every word, fingers dance across the keys, ringing in a prelude of blessings!

chat_qipao_117.name: Thunder Rumble
chat_qipao_117.description: Unfazed by thunder rumbles and still able to laugh and chat—that's how a true gentleman behaves.

chat_qipao_118.name: Polite Greeting
chat_qipao_118.description: The nightmare invites you to its garden tonight. Remember to greet politely.
source: Obtained from the Magnificent Nightmare gachapon event.

chat_qipao_119.name: Resolute
chat_qipao_119.description: Zekie is a silent one, but each word of it is powerful and reassuring.

chat_qipao_120.name: Drumbeat Rhythm
chat_qipao_120.description: Language too is a note, with rhythm and beat born from every tap.

chat_qipao_121.name: Code: Flood
chat_qipao_121.description: On April 19, 2703, an Executor single-handedly completed a special operation against the Heirs of Aida: Nasr faction, destroying its organization.
source: Obtained from the Infiltrating Shadow gachapon event.

chat_qipao_122.name: Adventure Declaration
chat_qipao_122.description: Wishing Tata joyous adventures every day and, not just today.

chat_qipao_126.name: Fiery Dragon's Roar
chat_qipao_126.description: Among the deities of Zhong Shan, Zhu Long stands resplendent. With a single inhale and exhale, they conjure a boundless wind, charged with the blessings of the divine dragons. This wind, a powerful surge of fortune, lifts the spirits and propels those who dare to face the tempestuous waves.
source: Obtained from the Majestic Dragon event

Item_ColosseumFood_04.name: Taming Manual
Item_ColosseumFood_04.description: A folk beast training manual compiled by the people. By following the instructions in the manual, there is a chance that the combat beast will be able to master SSR skills.

Item_ColosseumFood_05.name: Taming Guide
Item_ColosseumFood_05.description: A scientific taming guide written by biological experts. Trains beasts based on biological instincts and grants a higher chance of mastering SSR skills. It is well-founded and convincing.

Mount029_skin_02.name: Shrooman
Mount029_skin_02.description: A tamed Shrooman, a rideable marvel. Its plush mushroom cap provides a soft and cozy journey, but beware of occasional spore explosions.
source: Obtained by capturing and taming rare beasts.

Mount_028.name: Coaster
Mount_028.description: "Please, no more calling me a hamster ball! Can't you see my rockin' hairstyle? I'm Coaster! Call me Coaster!" the vehicle's built-in AI roars.

Mount_027.name: Mirroria Soul Plug
Mount_027.description: Based on the acquired intel, Mirroria has carried out specialized adaptive modifications to a batch of ATVs. Now, they are capable of meeting the new operational requirements.

Item_JiuYu_Navigator.name: GPS Locator
Item_JiuYu_Navigator.description: A GPS that records the location of Field Energy Collectors and helps users find the closest available one based on their coordinates.

Item_YNStone_01.name: Field Energy Stone
Item_YNStone_01.description: A by-product ore from Lifeblood, primarily used to activate the Field Energy Collector. Research has shown that Domain 9 has already mastered the method of artificial synthesis.

king_memory_1.name: KING: Memory Shard I
king_memory_1.description: Increase damage dealt to enemies by 20%.
source: Obtained from the Grand Chapters event.

king_memory_2.name: KING: Memory Shard II
king_memory_2.description: Restore HP equal to 25% of the damage dealt when attacking, up to 25% of ATK. Cooldown: 0.1 seconds.

bupoxiao_memory_1.description: Every 8 seconds, the first attack deals damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP.

feiouna_memory_2.description: Provide teammates with your movement speed (only if your speed is faster than theirs).

breakfate_buff_6.name: Ultimate Defense Shield
breakfate_buff_6.description: Grants immunity to lethal damage 1 time and damage immunity for 2s (effective only 1 time).

Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_001.name: Gravity Rail Registration Form
Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_001.description: Registration form required for using gravity rails. Fill in relevant information for subsequent modification services.

Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_002.name: Gravity Rail Tire Mod
Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_002.description: Modification made to prevent any consequences that misfit tires may cause on gravity rails, ensuring safe driving on the road as well.

Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_003.name: Gravity Rail Engine Mod
Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_003.description: Engine technology adapted for better compatibility with gravity rails, providing an experience of flying speeds.

Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_004.name: Gravity Rail Acceleration Ring Modification
Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_004.description: An acceleration ring developed by the Nine Arks Industry Research Institution that significantly increases speed on gravity rails.

Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_005.name: Gravity Rail Acceleration Ring Upgrade
Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_005.description: An upgraded version of the acceleration ring that raises the maximum speed limit, though with minor side effects.

Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_006.name: Gravity Rail Advanced Acceleration Ring
Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_006.description: Designed for racing experts, this advanced acceleration ring boosts speed instantly. Do remember to brake in time.

Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_007.name: Gravity Rail Fast Transit
Item_JiuYuWorld_XW_YLG_007.description: If you're tired of driving, use the fast transit service at the service counter for quicker travel to other service stations.

Crystal_Jiuyu_XW.name: Aquaville Bright Crystal
Crystal_Jiuyu_XW.description: More dazzling than ordinary crystals but used only in children's toy parts due to low-pressure resistance. Mech moundslingers seem to be collecting them, as they can be used to unseal Thawing Talismans.

Title_2_4_0_1.name: Ultimate Ace
Title_2_4_0_1.description: Rank 1 in Biochemical Collapse at the results tally.

Title_2_4_0_2.name: Extraordinary Elite
Title_2_4_0_2.description: Rank 2 in Biochemical Collapse at the results tally.

Title_2_4_0_3.name: Fearless Geek
Title_2_4_0_3.description: Rank 3 in Biochemical Collapse at the results tally.

Title_2_4_0_4.name: Pioneering Warrior
Title_2_4_0_4.description: Rank 4–5 in Biochemical Collapse at the results tally.

Title_2_4_0_5.name: Vanguard of Hope
Title_2_4_0_5.description: Rank 6–10 in Biochemical Collapse at the results tally.

FightPet_1_Balance.name: Kalka
FightPet_1_Balance.description: An early smart servant model developed by Dr. Claire of Cetus Island.

FightPet_2_Balance.name: Void Angel
FightPet_2_Balance.description: A multi-purpose smart servant from the Old Federation days that can be used in a variety of situations.

FightPet_3_Balance.name: Angela
FightPet_3_Balance.description: A smart servant from the Old Federation days originally intended for use as an entertainment performer.

FightPet_4_Balance.name: Moonrabbit
FightPet_4_Balance.description: A mechanical assistant smart servant developed by Banges Tech.

FightPet_5_Balance.name: Flame Sparrow
FightPet_5_Balance.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the local Flaming Finch.

FightPet_7_Balance.name: Zongyun
FightPet_7_Balance.description: A key product created through collaboration between Tianzhang Pavilion and Niners Heavy Machinery. Its main goal is said to be investing R&D toward the universalization of Madam Qinglong's partner pets.

FightPet_8_Balance.name: Leia
FightPet_8_Balance.description: The "Ultimate Weapon" series manufactured by Xiling Alliance Co. Ltd., model γ1O-A. Xiling is the sole smart servant supplier to Hykros and is part of the Hykros-Domain 9 Smart Servant Committee. Founded by Ms. Shelly and Ms. Ling Qiao, two of this century's greatest female engineers, the company launched its first mass-produced smart servant in small batches within just a month of its founding. The company is mainly known for its research and production of smart servants, related products, and merchandise. As it moves into the future, the company is focusing more on vertical integration by forming deep connections with famous brands, such as Ultimate Warriors, and creating an original commercial complex. If you're interested in investing, please contact us at * * * - * * * *.

FightPet_9_Balance.name: Aurawolf
FightPet_9_Balance.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the legends of Domain 9.

FightPet_10_Balance.name: Snowy
FightPet_10_Balance.description: A tiger-themed smart servant that leaves ice crystals in her path.

FightPet_11_Balance.name: Pen Pen
FightPet_11_Balance.description: Misato's pet, usually housed in a custom freezer in Misato Katsuragi's apartment. It enjoys hot baths and can cleverly press buttons with its wingtips. Besides adopting human habits of sleeping and bathing, it even enjoys reading newspapers. However, it somehow got into the fridge when Shinji and others moved into the Star Apartments in Mirroria.
source: Obtained from the Absolute Defense Front event.

choose_homecoins1.name: Home Currency Box I
choose_homecoins1.description: Home currency free pick box. Open to freely pick 100 from metal materials, energy materials, fiber materials, and supply materials.

choose_homecoins2.name: Home Currency Box II
choose_homecoins2.description: Home currency free pick box. Open to freely pick 5 from composite materials and quality materials.

Mount_Racing_002_2.name: Lumino Blade Mammoth
Mount_Racing_002_2.description: Boom, boom! Attention all vehicles, the monster-class off-road racer, Mammoth, is charging ahead. If you get hit, those fluorescent blades will cut right through you!

Eva_Boss_ticket_01.name: Defensive Protocol: Ying Zhao
Eva_Boss_ticket_01.description: Defensive Protocol: Ying Zhao Instance Admission

Eva_Boss_ticket_02.name: Defensive Protocol: Taotie
source: Defeat Ying Zhao in Defense Breach

Mount_030.name: Swift Raptor
Mount_030.description: A new type of vehicle modeled after an ancient creature of humanity's home planet. As the name suggests, it is swift and ferocious upon activation, so riders must make sure to press the foot pedals tightly and grasp the handle tightly to avoid falling off.
source: Obtained from the Majestic Dragon event

Item_Carp_Activity_ZSLJ.name: Golden Koi
Item_Carp_Activity_ZSLJ.description: Unlike the ordinary koi, this one has subtle golden threads across its body, visible only in the glint of sunlight. It's said that only those with exceptional luck can catch it. There's a fishing champion who's particularly eager to get their hands on it.

Item_Cooking_Activity_ZSLJ_1.name: Tipsy Grape Juice
Item_Cooking_Activity_ZSLJ_1.description: Unfermented grape juice, after special treatment, can give one a slightly tipsy feeling.

Item_Cooking_Activity_ZSLJ_3.name: Fresh Orange Juice
Item_Cooking_Activity_ZSLJ_3.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, a drink rich in Vitamin C, can boost immunity.

Avatar_128.description: Avatar of Evangelion Test Type-01. A Multipurpose Humanoid Decisive Weapon.

Avatar_133.description: Pen Pen is a pet penguin that followed Shinji, Asuka, Rei, and others into the Vera Sector.

Avatar_134.description: Are you ready? If you are, then let's go!

Avatar_137.description: To welcome the Year of the Dragon, Mi-a has not only slipped into new clothes but also adorned herself with cute dragon horns!

brush_fire_trial_OS.name: Pine Comet (24h)
brush_fire_trial_OS.description: "No violence please! Real academics wouldn't hit anyone with stationery!" —Rong Jin

yulan_ice_trial_OS.name: Unity (24h)
yulan_ice_trial_OS.description: Unity, in other words, consolidation. It's the weapon Ji Yu handpicked for Yu Lan, which possesses the latest tech from Domain 9. Please don't be surprised if you witness some miraculous sights after using it with the timestamp.

Zeke_physic_trial_OS.name: Onyx Tortoise (24h)
Zeke_physic_trial_OS.description: An imposing and sharp greatsword that ordinary people can barely muster the strength to pick up. Its destructive power is juxtaposed by the wide blade and the sense of security it brings.

mimi_thunder_trial_OS.name: Azure Dragon (24h)
mimi_thunder_trial_OS.description: A pair of fans that contains enormous energy capable of collapsing mountains and tearing the world apart. When Azure Dragon soars the clouds, the world is buffeted by the wind.

linghan_ice_trial_OS.name: Alabaster Tiger (24h)
linghan_ice_trial_OS.description: With a flourish of sleeves and sword's dance divine, who can fathom the depths of this heart o' mine?

nanyin_superpower_trial_OS.name: Purple Bamboo (24h)
nanyin_superpower_trial_OS.description: Purple Bamboo uses music and rhythm to utilize field energy for combat. After the Hendeca County Calamity, when Nan Yin reappeared, her flute also carried terrifying Darkness energy. Whenever Nan Yin played it, countless lives would be turned into dark wretches and fall under its control.

killknife_physic_trial_OS.name: Equilibrium (24h)
killknife_physic_trial_OS.description: With rules, the universe is in balance. After thousands of trials, only the sharpest remain. Without bias, all colors wither and fade. Like the clouds, justice rains swords upon the earth.

Paradox_fire_trial_OS.name: EP-7000 Skyfire (24h)
Paradox_fire_trial_OS.description: Produced by Hykros Headquarters's Defense Ark's first manufacturing bureau, this special weapon was tailor-made for the Authorizer on rotation, Plotti, to meet her combat needs. Even picky Poppa was very satisfied.

asuka_physic_trial_OS.name: Spear of Longinus (24h)
asuka_physic_trial_OS.description: Legend has it that these are the roots of the Tree of Life, possessing powers no one can withstand.
