Avatar_Overseas_38.name: Golden Team Doggo
Avatar_Overseas_38.description: Onions, potatoes, Team Doggo's golden holiday collection!

artifact_ssr_001.name: Colossus Arm
artifact_ssr_001.description: Not happy with your own arms? Try this one! A powerful arm with a polished finish and a flashy design. Your best bet in just about every situation.

artifact_ssr_002.name: Omnium Shield
artifact_ssr_002.description: Do you want to be the lead character of a movie? Do you want to stop any incoming bullets by simply raising your hand? Try out the Omnium Shield, which has a powerful barrier and stops incoming projectiles.

artifact_ssr_004.name: Type V Armor
artifact_ssr_004.description: Worried about losing battles and tucking your tail? Do your feet constantly weigh you down? Then, try this transformation on for size. Anytime, anywhere, deploy and pilot the Type V-II Droid. For an entire minute, experience what it's like to chase the wind in this new era of technology!

artifact_ssr_005.name: Spacetime Rift
artifact_ssr_005.description: Envious of others' ability to stop time? Trigger dimensional collapses with Spacetime Rift and become the master of time, drawing in nearby targets.

artifact_ssr_008.name: Drone
artifact_ssr_008.description: Are you fighting alone? Summon support drones to help you battle, so you can fight with confidence.

artifact_ssr_010.name: Hologram Projector
artifact_ssr_010.description: Project a hologram that synchronously replays the Wanderer's attacks.

artifact_ssr_011.name: Alternate Destiny
artifact_ssr_011.description: A mysterious organization is said to have invented this device to prevent the death of the user. Some claim the device came from the tale of golden fruit and a satyr archer, while others believe it was created specifically to deal with the explosion of Omnium Towers.

artifact_ssr_012.name: Type II Couant
artifact_ssr_012.description: As a result of the new Relic developed by Couant, Executors no longer need to be put in dangerous situations.

artifact_ssr_013.name: Hoverboard
artifact_ssr_013.description: Roam the endless wilderness with this under your feet.

artifact_ssr_018.name: Thalassic Heart
artifact_ssr_018.description: Legend has it that a mythical siren heart hidden within a thorny conch shell is capable of calling a storm upon the waves. Honoring this myth, the Ocean Development Group chose to name one of their important instruments after the heart. Though it cannot command storms, it can control water flow to augment the tide. Its complete model is even capable of transforming into a dolphin.

artifact_ssr_020.name: Bubble Gun
artifact_ssr_020.description: They said that a short blond creator in Mirroria made this on a whim...

artifact_ssr_021.name: Triple Mask
artifact_ssr_021.description: Originally developed to assist patients with facial injuries, it ended up accumulating a great deal of versatile functions beyond its ornamental value. While a mask is typically used to hide the wearer, the technology within one can also unveil new aspects of the world.

artifact_ssr_023.name: Bioelectric Control Rifle
artifact_ssr_023.description: A bio-rifle developed by Hykros, capable of disrupting the bioelectric currents of its target and confusing their ability to distinguish friends from foes.

artifact_sr_001.name: Hovering Cannon
artifact_sr_001.description: While attacking, the Hovering Cannon generates additional attacks that deal damage to the same enemies. Your damage will never be too low again.

artifact_sr_004.name: Jetpack
artifact_sr_004.description: A great device to have for roaming around.

artifact_sr_005.name: Lava Bomb
artifact_sr_005.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.

artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.name: Lava Bomb
artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.

artifact_sr_006.name: Jetboard
artifact_sr_006.description: Roam the endless wilderness with this under your feet.

artifact_sr_007.name: Magnetic Storm
artifact_sr_007.description: Contain a powerful device that transmits the magnetic field nearby, producing an electric tornado that throws enemies into the air.

artifact_sr_009.name: Quantum Cloak
artifact_sr_009.description: With this, you no longer need your robe and wizard hat. Become the hero in your own magical world when you put on this cloak, which makes your body intangible, taking no damage.

artifact_sr_010.name: Missile Barrage
artifact_sr_010.description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!

artifact_sr_011.name: Cybernetic Arm
artifact_sr_011.description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.

artifact_sr_012.name: Couant
artifact_sr_012.description: You dare strike me? You'll get what's coming to you!

artifact_sr_013.name: Strange Cube
artifact_sr_013.description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Levitate the target and launch them into the air.

artifact_sr_014.name: Omnium Handcannon
artifact_sr_014.description: The compressed cold jet is able to freeze the air.

artifact_sr_015.name: Magnetic Pulse
artifact_sr_015.description: Greetings. Please maintain appropriate social distance.

wormhole_artifact_sr_001.name: Hovering Cannon
wormhole_artifact_sr_001.description: While attacking, the Hovering Cannon generates additional attacks that deal damage to the same enemies. Your damage will never be too low again.

wormhole_artifact_sr_004.name: Jetpack
wormhole_artifact_sr_004.description: A great device to have for roaming around.

wormhole_artifact_sr_005.name: Lava Bomb
wormhole_artifact_sr_005.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.

wormhole_artifact_sr_007.name: Magnetic Storm
wormhole_artifact_sr_007.description: Contain a powerful device that transmits the magnetic field nearby, producing an electric tornado that throws enemies into the air.

wormhole_artifact_sr_009.name: Quantum Cloak
wormhole_artifact_sr_009.description: With this, you no longer need your robe and wizard hat. Become the hero in your own magical world when you put on this cloak, which makes your body intangible, taking no damage.

wormhole_artifact_sr_010.name: Missile Barrage
wormhole_artifact_sr_010.description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!

wormhole_artifact_sr_011.name: Cybernetic Arm
wormhole_artifact_sr_011.description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.

wormhole_artifact_sr_012.name: Couant
wormhole_artifact_sr_012.description: You dare strike me? You'll get what's coming to you!

wormhole_artifact_sr_013.name: Strange Cube
wormhole_artifact_sr_013.description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Levitate the target and launch them into the air.

wormhole_artifact_sr_014.name: Omnium Handcannon
wormhole_artifact_sr_014.description: The compressed cold jet is able to freeze the air.

wormhole_artifact_sr_015.name: Magnetic Pulse
wormhole_artifact_sr_015.description: Greetings. Please maintain appropriate social distance.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_001.name: Colossus Arm
wormhole_artifact_ssr_001.description: Not happy with your own arms? Try this one! A powerful arm with a polished finish and a flashy design. Your best bet in just about every situation.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_002.name: Omnium Shield
wormhole_artifact_ssr_002.description: Do you want to be the lead character of a movie? Do you want to stop any incoming bullets by simply raising your hand? Try out the Omnium Shield, which has a powerful barrier and stops incoming projectiles.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_004.name: Type V Armor
wormhole_artifact_ssr_004.description: Worried about losing battles and tucking your tail? Do your feet constantly weigh you down? Then, try this transformation on for size. Anytime, anywhere, deploy and pilot the Type V-II Droid. For an entire minute, experience what it's like to chase the wind in this new era of technology!

wormhole_artifact_ssr_005.name: Spacetime Rift
wormhole_artifact_ssr_005.description: Envious of others' ability to stop time? Trigger dimensional collapses with Spacetime Rift and become the master of time, drawing in nearby targets.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_008.name: Drone
wormhole_artifact_ssr_008.description: Are you fighting alone? Summon support drones to help you battle, so you can fight with confidence.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_010.name: Hologram Projector
wormhole_artifact_ssr_010.description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!

wormhole_artifact_ssr_011.name: Alternate Destiny
wormhole_artifact_ssr_011.description: A mysterious organization is said to have invented this device to prevent the death of the user. Some claim the device came from the tale of golden fruit and a satyr archer, while others believe it was created specifically to deal with the explosion of Omnium Towers.

artifact_sr_005_WXM.name: Lava Bomb
artifact_sr_005_WXM.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.

matrix_exp_n.name: Matrix data pack I
matrix_exp_n.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_exp_r.name: Matrix Data Pack II
matrix_exp_r.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_exp_sr.name: Matrix Data Pack III
matrix_exp_sr.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_exp_ssr.name: Matrix Data Pack IV
matrix_exp_ssr.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_N1_1.name: Wandering Aberrant
matrix_N1_1.description: It's been wandering since it escaped from the lab. Is the aberration due to experiments or Omnium radiation? No one knows.

matrix_N1_2.name: Feral Nature
matrix_N1_2.description: The nature suppressed by domestication slowly returns as it acclimates to the wild.

matrix_N1_3.name: Brute Force
matrix_N1_3.description: Seems like it knew it could break the cage by force and escape the bondage.

matrix_N1_4.name: Homeseeker
matrix_N1_4.description: Despite footprints all over Aesperia, still couldn't find its home... For it was born in a lab.

matrix_N2_1.name: Overheat
matrix_N2_1.description: The heat makes one squirm and want to vent by breaking things.

matrix_N2_2.name: Hack & Slash
matrix_N2_2.description: Never had any formal training. Fighting means hacking away randomly with a weapon.

matrix_N2_3.name: Might Makes Right
matrix_N2_3.description: All's fair in love and war. Do what you can to win.

matrix_N2_4.name: Handy Tool
matrix_N2_4.description: Weapons are just instruments of destruction. Don't count on pilots to invest emotions into armor.

matrix_R1_1.name: Explosive Core
matrix_R1_1.description: The Omnium core burns bright within.

matrix_R1_2.name: Binding Thread
matrix_R1_2.description: Not the actual thread, of course. The creator just wanted to inspire fear.

matrix_R1_3.name: Web of Dread
matrix_R1_3.description: A spider's look often scares people more than the damage it can deal.

matrix_R1_4.name: Overwhelm
matrix_R1_4.description: They would be a nightmare to deal with in groups.

matrix_R2_1.name: Hauler
matrix_R2_1.description: Back and forth, it shuttles between the mines and the track.

matrix_R2_2.name: Restart
matrix_R2_2.description: Vehicles can attack if they receive a new command.

matrix_R2_3.name: Mind of Machine
matrix_R2_3.description: A cyber modification without any free will, thus carrying out orders like a machine.

matrix_R2_4.name: Bullseye
matrix_R2_4.description: The biggest edge in a modification is the precision attack unhindered by emotions or sensibility.

matrix_R3_1.name: Standard Guard
matrix_R3_1.description: Being a good armed guard means protecting the thing you're guarding.

matrix_R3_2.name: Terminator Guard
matrix_R3_2.description: Merciless to anyone attempting to destroy what it's guarding.

matrix_R3_3.name: Unyielding Guard
matrix_R3_3.description: No matter how powerful the enemy, it will not fall until it's utterly destroyed.

matrix_R3_4.name: Tenet Guard
matrix_R3_4.description: Industrial creations have no free will, but the rules they follow could probably be called their tenets.

matrix_R4_1.name: Provocateurs
matrix_R4_1.description: Ravagers that raise hell everywhere just because they have the might to do so.

matrix_R4_2.name: Anarchists
matrix_R4_2.description: They follow no orders. Chaos is what they want.

matrix_R4_3.name: Melee Killer
matrix_R4_3.description: No one wants to fight them again.

matrix_R4_4.name: Chaosbringer
matrix_R4_4.description: Some things are chaotic in nature and wouldn't mind getting more chaotic.

matrix_R6_1.name: Attack Analyzer
matrix_R6_1.description: Any fighting style has a weakness if you observe long enough.

matrix_R6_2.name: Feared Thug
matrix_R6_2.description: The timid feared this name, and the thug cared not.

matrix_R6_3.name: Electricks
matrix_R6_3.description: Electroshock is one of their powers. Or rather, the one they used most.

matrix_R6_4.name: Fighting Spirit
matrix_R6_4.description: As a fighter, fighting is in their blood.

matrix_R7_2.name: Ready to Go
matrix_R7_2.description: Has anyone ever beaten this person before? No, as far as we know. However, it is certain that no one will ever run into someone who can.

matrix_R7_3.name: Unshakable
matrix_R7_3.description: Hide your weak points and be invincible.

matrix_R7_4.name: Bland
matrix_R7_4.description: Being too powerful is a problem too... One that the less competent can never understand.

matrix_SR1_1.name: Robarg: Greed
matrix_SR1_1.description: Rooted in avarice and without an end in sight.

matrix_SR1_2.name: Robarg: Instinct
matrix_SR1_2.description: Its instinct is always surging ahead.

matrix_SR1_3.name: Robarg: Exhaustion
matrix_SR1_3.description: Devours everything, from body and energy to your will to survive.

matrix_SR1_4.name: Robarg: The End
matrix_SR1_4.description: It has been looking forward to the end.

matrix_SR2_1.name: Apophis: Giant Body
matrix_SR2_1.description: Huge in size, with every move causing great changes.

matrix_SR2_2.name: Apophis: Confrontation
matrix_SR2_2.description: What am I fighting against? Fate or myself?

matrix_SR2_3.name: Apophis: Weak Point
matrix_SR2_3.description: The weakness is the security configurations embedded in the chip, which cannot be overcome or resisted.

matrix_SR2_4.name: Apophis: Hatred
matrix_SR2_4.description: Why was it made, and why was it modified?

matrix_SR3_1.name: Frost Bot: Formidable
matrix_SR3_1.description: It looks like food, indeed, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't be cautious.

matrix_SR3_2.name: Frost Bot: Swift End
matrix_SR3_2.description: The combat system of armor has only one goal: End the fight as swiftly as possible.

matrix_SR3_3.name: Frost Bot: Quick Freeze
matrix_SR3_3.description: Freeze the surrounding in blocks of ice.

matrix_SR4_1.name: Sobek: Scheme
matrix_SR4_1.description: Be careful not to get dragged into the mire it's in.

matrix_SR4_2.name: Sobek: Opportunity
matrix_SR4_2.description: It's always patient, enough for some unlucky sap to step on it eventually.

matrix_SR4_3.name: Sobek: Confusion
matrix_SR4_3.description: It's not moving. Is it asleep or just conserving energy?

matrix_SR4_4.name: Sobek: Restlessness
matrix_SR4_4.description: It gets bored too, and when it feels restless, it's some innocent passersby who might suffer.

matrix_SR5_1.name: Barbarossa: Power Play
matrix_SR5_1.description: The two heads usually fight over who gets to kill the prey. A little instigation and the fight turns physical.

matrix_SR5_2.name: Barbarossa: Divided Land
matrix_SR5_2.description: Where was it from? Maybe it still somewhat knows.

matrix_SR5_3.name: Barbarossa: Natural Aggression
matrix_SR5_3.description: It never gets tired of the eternal biting and grinding, always eagerly awaits the next victim.

matrix_SR5_4.name: Barbarossa: Intimidating Roar
matrix_SR5_4.description: It starts with a roar—that is also the death knell for the innocent victims.

matrix_SR6_1.name: Pepper: Assembly Line
matrix_SR6_1.description: Who can explain to her that she has been toiling away for a long time now?

matrix_SR6_2.name: Pepper: Surgical Scar
matrix_SR6_2.description: Aberrations cannot be reversed. Just like post-surgery scars, you don't get a chance.

matrix_SR6_3.name: Pepper: Armband
matrix_SR6_3.description: As a doctor, you cannot turn away, cannot be complacent, cannot be helpless.

matrix_SR6_4.name: Pepper: Sleeping Pill
matrix_SR6_4.description: She has insomnia from not wanting to face the dead in her dreams.

matrix_SR7_2.name: Hilda: Dockbred
matrix_SR7_2.description: The nostrils have been smelling the salty scent of the sea for far too long. They're uncomfortable when it's missing.

matrix_SR7_3.name: Hilda: Haggler
matrix_SR7_3.description: Never buy things at full price, always haggle till your last breath!

matrix_SR7_4.name: Hilda: Smash Ball
matrix_SR7_4.description: There are not many recreations you can do with physically handicapped friends.

matrix_SR8_1.name: Ene: Competitive
matrix_SR8_1.description: The accelerated output when power is increased will also be delivered in faint tremors to the weapon.

matrix_SR8_2.name: Ene: Loose Cannon
matrix_SR8_2.description: The Hykros Suppressor Lab never forgets the fight she put up.

matrix_SR8_3.name: Ene: Second Life
matrix_SR8_3.description: A body without pain will function to the last ounce of energy until complete destruction.

matrix_SR8_4.name: Ene: Family Photo
matrix_SR8_4.description: It was taken only because her father begged her to.

matrix_SR9_1.name: Bai Ling: Diverse
matrix_SR9_1.description: What to do when you think about it and it spreads?

matrix_SR9_2.name: Bai Ling: Dissipation
matrix_SR9_2.description: From disorderly to orderly? Outside interference is probably needed. Probably, I said.

matrix_SR9_3.name: Bai Ling: Fair Trade
matrix_SR9_3.description: Goods should be traded according to their own value. But how do you put a value on something that's immeasurable?

matrix_SR9_4.name: Bai Ling: Nth Power
matrix_SR9_4.description: If only experience gained and ROI worked exponentially...

matrix_SR12_1.name: Echo: Until the End
matrix_SR12_1.description: A straight line of thought to completing the current goal.

matrix_SR12_2.name: Echo: Post Crisis
matrix_SR12_2.description: Memory of the snowfield on a truck after surviving a crisis.

matrix_SR12_3.name: Echo: Black or White
matrix_SR12_3.description: It's too hard for her to comprehend anything complicated.

matrix_SR12_4.name: Echo: Homesick
matrix_SR12_4.description: Two homes, two shelters, both cozy. Either way, it's the homecoming.

matrix_SSR1_1.name: Meryl: Swordfight Simulation
matrix_SSR1_1.description: Complex swordfight simulation seemingly used for calibration. Anyway, not something for the average person.

matrix_SSR1_2.name: Meryl: Wake-Up Call
matrix_SSR1_2.description: Chained memory shards used to implant consciousness. Note that it doesn't come with an instruction manual.

matrix_SSR1_3.name: Meryl: Absolute Authority
matrix_SSR1_3.description: It, of course, represents the self-approval and outside recognition of an Executor's power.

matrix_SSR1_4.name: Meryl: Detached
matrix_SSR1_4.description: Mental communication barriers set up by rejecting all socialization.

matrix_SSR2_1.name: Tsubasa: Weather Vane
matrix_SSR2_1.description: "The wind blows." That sums up every cause for leaving and setting off again.

matrix_SSR2_2.name: Tsubasa: Gravitator
matrix_SSR2_2.description: She's always moving about and only stays in the spot she had thoroughly scouted.

matrix_SSR2_3.name: Tsubasa: Drifter
matrix_SSR2_3.description: How can you tell which faith is the right one? Answer: The one that ultimately emerges victorious.

matrix_SSR3_1.name: Cocoritter: Artistic Instinct
matrix_SSR3_1.description: The thoughts behind the creation of craft can also be applied on the battlefield.

matrix_SSR3_2.name: Cocoritter: Identity Overlap
matrix_SSR3_2.description: Her silhouette is overlapping with the protector she remembered.

matrix_SSR3_3.name: Cocoritter: Caregiver
matrix_SSR3_3.description: Her expectation is simple—just easing your pain.

matrix_SSR3_4.name: Cocoritter: Helper
matrix_SSR3_4.description: Trust me, leave the support to me.

matrix_SSR4_1.name: KING: Underground Ruler
matrix_SSR4_1.description: A good reputation still won't change the inability to get by with an empty wallet, so let's fill it up first and ask questions later.

matrix_SSR4_2.name: KING: Live to Fight
matrix_SSR4_2.description: These miners work mindlessly like zombies. You'll become one of them if you don't get away.

matrix_SSR4_3.name: KING: Thrillseeker
matrix_SSR4_3.description: Craves excitement and seemingly over-the-top joy... which does not include career aspirations.

matrix_SSR4_4.name: KING: One Man Army
matrix_SSR4_4.description: Still, there's a limit to fighting with just fists, which he learned at a very young age.

matrix_SSR40_1.name: Brevey: Transformation
matrix_SSR40_1.description: Since ancient times, science has transformed things that were once miracles into commonplace occurrences.

matrix_SSR40_2.name: Brevey: Thesis
matrix_SSR40_2.description: In an era where the shoulders of giants are already high enough, ordinary scientific findings are insignificant.

matrix_SSR40_3.name: Brevey: Reclusion
matrix_SSR40_3.description: Perhaps part of the reason why we are immersed in our own world or behave strangely is that we don't want others to impose their expectations on us again.

matrix_SSR40_4.name: Brevey: Revelation
matrix_SSR40_4.description: Can you believe it? In a part of the world I have yet to experience, there is pure beauty and incredible existences that need not be explained.

matrix_SSR41_1.name: Plotti: Future Humanity
matrix_SSR41_1.description: Omnium technology is the future of humanity. The Blue Aidans must be stopped.

matrix_SSR41_2.name: Plotti: Poppa
matrix_SSR41_2.description: Happy memories that have been destroyed and buried in the past.

matrix_SSR41_3.name: Plotti: Authorizer
matrix_SSR41_3.description: Watching over the most important things to humanity.

matrix_SSR41_4.name: Plotti: The You Within Me
matrix_SSR41_4.description: You are me and I am you. You are who I rely on.

matrix_SSR42_1.name: Yanuo: Sentience
matrix_SSR42_1.description: You feel a sharp gaze from someone in a sea of people.

matrix_SSR42_2.name: Yanuo: Radio Wave
matrix_SSR42_2.description: Communication simply requires tuning into the right frequency.

matrix_SSR42_3.name: Yanuo: Magic
matrix_SSR42_3.description: Magic probably exists. Do you want to see a spell for quickly making friends with someone you want to meet?

matrix_SSR42_4.name: Yanuo: Echo
matrix_SSR42_4.description: The secret messages that ordinary people don't bother to understand are suddenly receiving replies in the form of echoes.

matrix_SSR43_2.name: Asuka: Bonds
matrix_SSR43_2.description: It feels good to be together with others.

matrix_SSR43_3.name: Asuka: Cherish
matrix_SSR43_3.description: I will fight with all my strength for the present.

matrix_SSR43_4.name: Asuka: Pride
matrix_SSR43_4.description: I am Asuka, the star of tomorrow!

matrix_SSR5_1.name: Cobalt-B: Sixth Sense
matrix_SSR5_1.description: It's as keen as forced static observation upon various planes, with some strong luck to boot.

matrix_SSR5_2.name: Cobalt-B: Starting Capital
matrix_SSR5_2.description: Two pieces of collateral, uncollected even after the debt had been repaid, were seemingly left as a sort of generous memento... or perhaps they were simply forgotten.

matrix_SSR5_3.name: Cobalt-B: Master Artist
matrix_SSR5_3.description: What's wrong with calling this "artwork"? You don't think a wrench is as elegant as a paintbrush?

matrix_SSR5_4.name: Cobalt-B: Rise and Shine
matrix_SSR5_4.description: Put an alarm clock on the mini-drone to wake you up in the morning.

matrix_SSR6_1.name: Claudia: Rational Analysis
matrix_SSR6_1.description: First, learn to accept popular opinions, then make judgments about the issue at hand.

matrix_SSR6_2.name: Claudia: True Self
matrix_SSR6_2.description: Be true to yourself so you're no longer bound by the past and will hold the future.

matrix_SSR6_3.name: Claudia: Righteous
matrix_SSR6_3.description: All efforts made to uphold justice will be proven worthwhile.

matrix_SSR6_4.name: Claudia: Aura of Determination
matrix_SSR6_4.description: Bring values into action, even spread them around without being aware.

matrix_SSR7_1.name: Shiro: Isolated
matrix_SSR7_1.description: Like a wild cat, she is skittish toward others. Yet sometimes she'll sit by a pond and play with the water, wondering why she is so lonely.

matrix_SSR7_2.name: Shiro: Longing for Sea
matrix_SSR7_2.description: A big part of the ocean's beauty stems from the fact that it could never be fully understood.

matrix_SSR7_3.name: Shiro: Great Singer
matrix_SSR7_3.description: Proof of her awesome singing voice, from a researcher who defied death to smuggle the recording out.

matrix_SSR7_4.name: Shiro: Cat-like
matrix_SSR7_4.description: Every touch is cautious, every gaze deftly avoided... That's her humble way to pursue happiness.

matrix_SSR8_1.name: Zero: Paranormal Calculation
matrix_SSR8_1.description: Break through logic, subvert reality, completely abandon formulas based on experience to arrive at the final result.

matrix_SSR8_2.name: Zero: Terminal Protocol
matrix_SSR8_2.description: Memories are just matters of imprints. As for whether they're real or false, you must decide for yourself.

matrix_SSR8_3.name: Zero: Info Sort
matrix_SSR8_3.description: Intel is generated through sorting loose info and data.

matrix_SSR8_4.name: Zero: Survival of Fittest
matrix_SSR8_4.description: Survival of the fittest is the law of nature and the manifestation of individual superiority.

matrix_SSR9_1.name: Samir: Just Kidding
matrix_SSR9_1.description: If you said her jokes are corny, she would reply, "Why so serious?"

matrix_SSR9_2.name: Samir: Dearly Departed
matrix_SSR9_2.description: One who lives in the past is unreachable and can't let go.

matrix_SSR9_3.name: Samir: Silver Bullet
matrix_SSR9_3.description: She owns a silver bullet. Is she hunting vampires?

matrix_SSR9_4.name: Samir: Future Focus
matrix_SSR9_4.description: She's always certain of her destiny.

matrix_SSR10_1.name: Huma: Disoriented
matrix_SSR10_1.description: It was the instinct to see the light that led the baby birds out of their shells.

matrix_SSR10_2.name: Huma: Blank Slate
matrix_SSR10_2.description: Start writing the program for a completely new personality right now.

matrix_SSR10_3.name: Huma: Easy Does It
matrix_SSR10_3.description: An amnesiac, just like you. Always tries to do whatever can be done first.

matrix_SSR10_4.name: Huma: Innocent
matrix_SSR10_4.description: The stiff expression is a part of the package.

matrix_SSR11_1.name: Crow: Eleventh Dimension
matrix_SSR11_1.description: Some things are intangible but do truly exist.

matrix_SSR11_2.name: Crow: Formitized
matrix_SSR11_2.description: The past is in the past. The present is what you need to seize.

matrix_SSR11_3.name: Crow: Dire Survivor
matrix_SSR11_3.description: Never give up, even though it's more than a long shot.

matrix_SSR11_4.name: Crow: Rendition
matrix_SSR11_4.description: A bizarre clown show, sometimes very hard to fathom.

matrix_SSR12_1.name: Marc: Burden
matrix_SSR12_1.description: I'm the mightiest warrior and the people here need me.

matrix_SSR12_2.name: Marc: Sister's Hope
matrix_SSR12_2.description: I drink a bottle of milk everyday now... Can you see it?

matrix_SSR12_3.name: Marc: Fair World
matrix_SSR12_3.description: Every one of us is a unique creation.

matrix_SSR12_4.name: Marc: Dreamworld
matrix_SSR12_4.description: Dreaming of walking into the Hall with you one day.

matrix_SSR13_1.name: Bai Yuekui: Seeking Truth
matrix_SSR13_1.description: Have the courage to make mistakes in course of seeking scientific truth.

matrix_SSR13_2.name: Bai Yuekui: Memory & Life
matrix_SSR13_2.description: One can keep making new memories as long as one keeps on living.

matrix_SSR13_3.name: Bai Yuekui: Window of Opportunity
matrix_SSR13_3.description: Always be prepared for the opportunity to escape the doom.

matrix_SSR13_4.name: Bai Yuekui: Spiritual Advent
matrix_SSR13_4.description: Emotion is the source of power to advent our spirit.

matrix_SSR14_1.name: Nemesis: Alloy Cells
matrix_SSR14_1.description: More than half of the hull has been replaced. I wonder if there is a way to measure the proportion of souls?

matrix_SSR14_2.name: Nemesis: Teddy Bear
matrix_SSR14_2.description: I have lost two places to call home, but fortunately I've managed to hold on to some belongings from those times.

matrix_SSR14_3.name: Nemesis: Refreshed
matrix_SSR14_3.description: The courage of maturity shines through as innocence is worn away.

matrix_SSR14_4.name: Nemesis: Inner Drive
matrix_SSR14_4.description: The memory and heart of humanity can be a stumbling block or a driving force.

matrix_SSR15_1.name: Frigg: Soulblade
matrix_SSR15_1.description: I will cut off your greed for the forbidden things.

matrix_SSR15_2.name: Frigg: Post-Cataclysm
matrix_SSR15_2.description: My family... friends... I'm the only one left now...

matrix_SSR15_3.name: Frigg: Stance
matrix_SSR15_3.description: You have your definition, so what is justice to me?

matrix_SSR15_4.name: Frigg: Doubt
matrix_SSR15_4.description: Who's behind all this? Can anybody tell me?

matrix_SSR16_1.name: Ruby: From Behind
matrix_SSR16_1.description: This delicate bud is always carefully protected, but she also wants to walk to the frontline and be side by side with her, even if she needs to stand on her tiptoes.

matrix_SSR16_2.name: Ruby: Vapor
matrix_SSR16_2.description: As hazy as transpiring vapor, are the so-called past events just illusions in dreams?

matrix_SSR16_3.name: Ruby: Shadowing
matrix_SSR16_3.description: You have to trot to keep up with her, but if you do fall behind, she'll be waiting for you not far away.

matrix_SSR17_4.name: Saki Fuwa: In Control
matrix_SSR17_4.description: An action that feels like everything is under control.

matrix_SSR18_1.name: Lin: Bow Down
matrix_SSR18_1.description: Responsibility that comes with identity, a burden and a trial.

matrix_SSR18_2.name: Lin: Light Pollution
matrix_SSR18_2.description: Light that flows through every corner of the city, and above it...

matrix_SSR18_3.name: Lin: Standing in a Mirror
matrix_SSR18_3.description: An impeccable and dazzling figure, regardless of the angle.

matrix_SSR18_4.name: Lin: Black Fox Mask
matrix_SSR18_4.description: Sometimes, she transforms into a shadow that moves freely between the building.

matrix_SSR19_2.name: Lyra: Revived Symphony
matrix_SSR19_2.description: Even the most perfect and precise performance does not come close to the symphony on that day...

matrix_SSR19_3.name: Lyra: Candlelight
matrix_SSR19_3.description: Protecting this flickering candlelight is not just a term of the will.

matrix_SSR19_4.name: Lyra: Endless Study
matrix_SSR19_4.description: It may take a lifetime to uncover the true meaning of that book.

matrix_SSR20_1.name: Tian Lang: Astral General
matrix_SSR20_1.description: If he was born in ancient times, he might have been a great general defending his land.

matrix_SSR20_2.name: Tian Lang: Avoiding Conflict
matrix_SSR20_2.description: Rather than fighting, he prefers to spend time with flowers and plants in peace.

matrix_SSR20_3.name: Tian Lang: Turmoil
matrix_SSR20_3.description: The trees long for peace, but the wind will never cease. There is nothing that can be done.

matrix_SSR21_2.name: Annabella: Blank Command
matrix_SSR21_2.description: It easily becomes unresponsive without a command.

matrix_SSR21_3.name: Annabella: Altruism
matrix_SSR21_3.description: —One of the last words you would use to describe a vampire.

matrix_SSR21_4.name: Annabella: Dead Leaves
matrix_SSR21_4.description: There will always be people who are only willing to act within their comfort zone.

matrix_SSR22_2.name: Alyss: Shared Vision
matrix_SSR22_2.description: Become someone who can protect everybody...

matrix_SSR22_3.name: Alyss: Legacy
matrix_SSR22_3.description: The mission is passed on from generation to generation.

matrix_SSR22_4.name: Alyss: Lasting Motive
matrix_SSR22_4.description: Even if we are battered and broken, we won't back down.

matrix_SSR23_1.name: Umi: Bewitch
matrix_SSR23_1.description: Slowly and patiently guide the audience and self into the magic illusion.

matrix_SSR23_2.name: Umi: Mystify
matrix_SSR23_2.description: The most fundamental laws are "deception," "misdirection," and "manipulation." This is what I tell myself before each performance.

matrix_SSR23_3.name: Umi: Beguile
matrix_SSR23_3.description: Sometimes "she" can't decide whether to be blissfully unaware or feign ignorance.

matrix_SSR23_4.name: Umi: Deceive
matrix_SSR23_4.description: She has to deceive everyone, including herself.

matrix_SSR24_1.name: Fenrir: Dream
matrix_SSR24_1.description: I dream of chocolate. Can I believe that this is real?

matrix_SSR24_2.name: Fenrir: Abandoned Dog
matrix_SSR24_2.description: A shackled past, a wandering present.

matrix_SSR24_3.name: Fenrir: Home
matrix_SSR24_3.description: Will I ever have a home?

matrix_SSR24_4.name: Fenrir: Dependence
matrix_SSR24_4.description: If there are no more goodbyes, I am alright with being used.

matrix_SSR25_2.name: Haboela: Circuit Breaker
matrix_SSR25_2.description: How did it get here after the terrain change?

matrix_SSR25_3.name: Haboela: Erupt
matrix_SSR25_3.description: Gather and absorb the lava, and then...

matrix_SSR25_4.name: Haboela: Wrath
matrix_SSR25_4.description: The guardian of the volcano with a temper. A very, very bad temper.

matrix_SSR26_1.name: Scylla: Rip
matrix_SSR26_1.description: The barbaric gesture doesn't match its elegant appearance.

matrix_SSR26_3.name: Scylla: Discord
matrix_SSR26_3.description: This may be your final opportunity to listen to a melody.

matrix_SSR27_1.name: Lan: Solitude
matrix_SSR27_1.description: She often explores dangerous situations by herself.

matrix_SSR27_2.name: Lan: A Hundred Faces
matrix_SSR27_2.description: Every name has a unique history behind it.

matrix_SSR27_3.name: Lan: Compassion
matrix_SSR27_3.description: Her compassion for the vulnerable signifies that her true self remains intact.

matrix_SSR27_4.name: Lan: Obscurity
matrix_SSR27_4.description: Hiding in plain sight and waiting for the right opportunity to strike.

matrix_SSR28_1.name: Icarus: Solipsism
matrix_SSR28_1.description: Strategies and plans. My fate lies in my hands.

matrix_SSR28_2.name: Icarus: Witness
matrix_SSR28_2.description: It's all about witnessing that leads to the path.

matrix_SSR28_4.name: Icarus: Passerby
matrix_SSR28_4.description: Strangers come and go as they pass by.

matrix_SSR29_1.name: Fiona: Brain and Brawn
matrix_SSR29_1.description: A powerful Executor and an outstanding Archon.

matrix_SSR29_2.name: Fiona: Pioneer
matrix_SSR29_2.description: On her shoulders is the responsibility to build a home for everyone.

matrix_SSR29_3.name: Fiona: Unyielding
matrix_SSR29_3.description: Stand up over and over again in the face of failure, that is what it means to be part of Vera.

matrix_SSR29_4.name: Fiona: Path of Succession
matrix_SSR29_4.description: I inherit the path of my predecessor, and those who come after shall inherit mine.

matrix_SSR30_1.name: Gnonno: Unintended Excursion
matrix_SSR30_1.description: Tragedy is born from impulsive, risky decisions.

matrix_SSR30_2.name: Gnonno: Unknown Companion
matrix_SSR30_2.description: It's not that the memories are gone; rather, they can only be recalled when one is fully awake.

matrix_SSR30_3.name: Gnonno: Reclamation
matrix_SSR30_3.description: It drifts off into the universe, taking most of the sane with it.

matrix_SSR30_4.name: Gnonno: Paradox Discard
matrix_SSR30_4.description: If I don't do this, then I won't be able to feel the simple happiness that I used to...

matrix_SSR31_1.name: Rubilia: Wayfarer
matrix_SSR31_1.description: She is hesitant, yet still clings to the darkest of hopes.

matrix_SSR31_3.name: Rubilia: Rebirth
matrix_SSR31_3.description: There were many ways she thought it could end, but this was completely different from her expectations.

matrix_SSR31_4.name: Rubilia: Kinship
matrix_SSR31_4.description: Her instinct and humanity are calling out to her. Do you worry about her choices?

matrix_SSR32_1.name: Liu Huo: Storytelling
matrix_SSR32_1.description: In the vast expanse of poetic art, my love for literacy halted just before the covers' part...

matrix_SSR32_2.name: Liu Huo: Anecdote
matrix_SSR32_2.description: "C'mere, take this pancake home and eat it while it's hot, and don't forget to give one to your little brother!"

matrix_SSR32_3.name: Liu Huo: Ascent
matrix_SSR32_3.description: The journey within requires effort and sweat, yet the peak's view stays hidden in the haze.

matrix_SSR32_4.name: Liu Huo: Elegance
matrix_SSR32_4.description: Grace and sophistication are built upon a steady foundation of personal growth, not a last-minute scramble for improvement.

matrix_SSR33_1.name: Yu Lan: Embrace Sincerity
matrix_SSR33_1.description: Stay true and sincere, pure and natural.

matrix_SSR33_2.name: Yu Lan: Always Diligent
matrix_SSR33_2.description: I have never slacked off since I started practicing martial arts.

matrix_SSR33_3.name: Yu Lan: Sincerity Moves Mountains
matrix_SSR33_3.description: The longest path is the shortcut.

matrix_SSR33_4.name: Yu Lan: Sincere & Earnest
matrix_SSR33_4.description: Being honest with people can sometimes lead to misunderstandings.

matrix_SSR34_1.name: Ming Jing: Infused in Tea
matrix_SSR34_1.description: Deep thoughts buried within a strong fragrance.

matrix_SSR34_2.name: Ming Jing: Blank Slate
matrix_SSR34_2.description: In the midst of the fog, there is something that must be held onto dearly, lest it be gone once more.

matrix_SSR34_3.name: Ming Jing: Rebuilding
matrix_SSR34_3.description: Picking the pieces back up is the first step toward putting things back together.

matrix_SSR34_4.name: Ming Jing: Passionate
matrix_SSR34_4.description: Burning thoughts masked in blank expression.

matrix_SSR35_1.name: Huang: Ruler's Dominion
matrix_SSR35_1.description: The fate of all the world is connected to me.

matrix_SSR35_2.name: Huang: Bright Sun
matrix_SSR35_2.description: A bright sun in the clear sky, these radiant days are fleeting.

matrix_SSR35_3.name: Huang: Blessing
matrix_SSR35_3.description: Tianzhang Pavilion is paramount to protecting all lives.

matrix_SSR35_4.name: Huang: Ambition
matrix_SSR35_4.description: Ambitions are meant to be heavy.

matrix_SSR36_1.name: Fei Se: Traceless
matrix_SSR36_1.description: She's hard to pin down, but the moment you wish to see her, she gracefully appears.

matrix_SSR36_2.name: Fei Se: Whirling Sleeves
matrix_SSR36_2.description: Her skirt's soft caress showcases her finesse.

matrix_SSR36_3.name: Fei Se: Solitary Radiance
matrix_SSR36_3.description: In solitude, she goes against the tide.

matrix_SSR37_1.name: Ling Han: Misty
matrix_SSR37_1.description: The sword is like a mist, traveling swiftly and indiscriminately.

matrix_SSR37_2.name: Ling Han: Chill in the Air
matrix_SSR37_2.description: Proud as pure snow, unsullied by dust.

matrix_SSR37_3.name: Ling Han: Flowing Clouds
matrix_SSR37_3.description: Like the flowing water and drifting clouds.

matrix_SSR37_4.name: Ling Han: Snow Plum
matrix_SSR37_4.description: The fragrance of plum blossoms cuts through the bitter cold.

matrix_SSR38_1.name: Nan Yin: Karma
matrix_SSR38_1.description: Right and wrong, love and hate.

matrix_SSR38_2.name: Nan Yin: Shadowing
matrix_SSR38_2.description: The pain has been sealed away, but it follows her like a shadow.

matrix_SSR38_4.name: Nan Yin: Lone Shadow
matrix_SSR38_4.description: Her time has passed, and she finds solace in solitude.

matrix_SSR39_1.name: Yan Miao: Hope
matrix_SSR39_1.description: Carrying the expectations of a great many people.

matrix_SSR39_2.name: Yan Miao: Against the Odds
matrix_SSR39_2.description: Knowingly venturing into the lion's den.

matrix_SSR39_3.name: Yan Miao: Clever
matrix_SSR39_3.description: Gifted with amazing charm and wits.

Item_Mine_Crystal.name: Crystal
Item_Mine_Crystal.description: A common ore, popular for its crystalline and dazzling beauty.

Item_Mine_Crystal_02.name: Crystal Chunk
Item_Mine_Crystal_02.description: A common ore, popular for its crystalline and dazzling beauty.

Item_Mine_Crystal_03.name: Cluster
Item_Mine_Crystal_03.description: A cluster of crystals, which is a quality source for crystals.
source: Random reward from the Dream Machine after Lv. 51

Item_Mine_Crystal_04.name: Refined Cluster
Item_Mine_Crystal_04.description: High-quality refined crystal cluster that has a stable structure and wide applications.

core_exp_n.name: Universal Combat Parts I
core_exp_n.description: Common universal combat parts. Have a wide variety of usages, but there is nothing special about them.

core_exp_r.name: Universal Combat Parts II
core_exp_r.description: Universal combat parts circulating in the black market in secret. Considering their performance and price, one may feel they're ripped off by the merchants selling them.
source: Recycle a Combat Engine of the same grade

core_exp_sr.name: Universal Combat Parts III
core_exp_sr.description: Universal combat parts manufactured by Banges Tech. Compatible and useful.
source: Recycle a Combat Engine of the same grade

core_exp_ssr.name: Universal Combat Parts IV
core_exp_ssr.description: The newest creation from Hykros Equipment R&D. Can boost the performance of combat support equipment to the maximum.
source: Recycle a Combat Engine of the same grade

armband_orange.name: Fortress Bracers
armband_orange.description: Equipment crafted for the special ops team. Highly protective and mobile.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 55.
Play Frontier Clash after reaching Lv. 50

armband_orangeTupo.description: Equipment crafted for the special ops team. Highly protective and mobile.

helmet_orangeTupo.name: Fortress Helm

glove_orangeTupo.name: Fortress Handguards
glove_orangeTupo.description: These heavy handguards are specifically designed to handle a large variety of weapons.

belt_orange.description: Contains several sensors to transmit data directly to the suit's information handling system.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 55.

belt_orangeTupo.name: Fortress Belt
belt_orangeTupo.description: Contains several sensors to transmit data directly to the suit's information handling system.

shawl_orange.description: The sturdy and bulletproof material provides perfect protection to the wearer's shoulders and neck.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 55.
Play Frontier Clash after reaching Lv. 50

shawl_orangeTupo.name: Fortress Spaulders
shawl_orangeTupo.description: The sturdy and bulletproof material provides perfect protection to the wearer's shoulders and neck.

armband_purple.name: Elite Armbands
armband_purple.description: Capable of changing coverage area based on the current situation.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

armband_red.name: Titan Armbands
armband_red.description: Equipment crafted for the special ops team. Highly protective and mobile.

cloth_purple.name: Elite Combat Suit
cloth_purple.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. Provides excellent defense and resistance in just about any extreme circumstances.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

cloth_red.name: Titan Armor
cloth_red.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.

pants_purple.name: Elite Combat Leggings
pants_purple.description: Now with complex armor modules at the joints to better accommodate dangerous battles for Special Forces agents.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

pants_red.name: Titan Legguards
pants_red.description: These legguards are powered to give the wearer more mobility while in the heavy fortress armor.

shoes_purple.name: Elite Combat Boots
shoes_purple.description: The new composite automatically adjusts the surface texture based on the battlefield condition.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

shoes_red.name: Titan Sabatons
shoes_red.description: The sounds of these heavy boots stomping are the best deterrent.

helmet_purple.name: Elite Combat Helmet
helmet_purple.description: An advanced helmet equipped with enemy identification and aim assist.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

helmet_red.name: Titan Helmet
helmet_red.description: A fully sealed helmet that provides defense, circulation and information handling.

glove_purple.name: Elite Gloves
glove_purple.description: Magnetization modules enable the wearer to attach themselves to metallic surfaces when necessary.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

glove_red.name: Titan Handguards
glove_red.description: These heavy handguards are specifically designed to handle a large variety of weapons.

belt_purple.name: Elite Combat Belt
belt_purple.description: Designed with multifunctional module slots for different mission needs.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

belt_red.name: Titan Belt
belt_red.description: Contains several sensors to transmit data directly to the suit's information handling system.

shawl_purple.name: Elite Shoulderguards
shawl_purple.description: Equipped with a deflection shield generator to protect the wearer's head and shoulders.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 45.

shawl_red.name: Titan Spaulders
shawl_red.description: The sturdy and bulletproof material provides perfect protection to the wearer's shoulders and neck.

armband_blue.name: Falcon Wristbands
armband_blue.description: The new alloy provides the perfect balance between weight and protection.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

cloth_blue.name: Falcon Combat Suit
cloth_blue.description: The new material guarantees protection with a simplified design.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

pants_blue.name: Falcon Combat Leggings
pants_blue.description: A much improved version of its predecessor, with better materials and design.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

shoes_blue.name: Falcon Combat Boots
shoes_blue.description: The double shock-absorbing layers provide both comfort and durability.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

helmet_blue.name: Falcon Combat Helmet
helmet_blue.description: The sturdy material protects the wearer even in heavy gunfire.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

glove_blue.name: Falcon Gloves
glove_blue.description: The light polymer material doesn't take away the wearer's agility at all.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

belt_blue.name: Falcon Belt
belt_blue.description: Contains a micro-sensor to monitor the wearer's vital stats.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

shawl_blue.name: Falcon Shoulderguards
shawl_blue.description: An upgraded version of the vanguard spaulders that provides excellent defense.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

armband_green.name: Vanguard Bracers
armband_green.description: Sacrifices a bit of mobility for better protection.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

cloth_green.name: Vanguard Suit
cloth_green.description: No longer used by Hykros, but still a hot item on the black market.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

pants_green.name: Vanguard Legguards
pants_green.description: The old version of Hykros's combat pants. The weakest link in the vanguard series.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

shoes_green.name: Vanguard Boots
shoes_green.description: These old Hykros boots look great and do their job well.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

helmet_green.name: Vanguard Helmet
helmet_green.description: A great helmet for protecting the wearer's head.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

glove_green.name: Vanguard Gloves
glove_green.description: These gloves are controversial because they sacrifice mobility for protection.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

belt_green.name: Vanguard Belt
belt_green.description: The buckle uses an older design that is durable but cannot be adjusted.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

shawl_green.name: Vanguard Spaulders
shawl_green.description: Designed to be used in conjunction with the Vanguard Suit only, and focuses on protecting the wearer's upper arms.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

armband_white.name: Explorer's Bracers
armband_white.description: These bracers are made for adventuring, so they are lighter and thinner.

cloth_white.name: Explorer's Uniform
cloth_white.description: Lightweight leather armor worn by the shelter's exploration team.

pants_white.name: Explorer's Pants
pants_white.description: Not exactly the best-looking bottom, but durable and practical.

shoes_white.name: Explorer's Boots
shoes_white.description: These heavy and sturdy boots are specifically designed for the shelter's exploration team.

glove_white.name: Explorer's Gloves
glove_white.description: Additional padding makes it easier to respond to different situations in the wild.

belt_white.name: Explorer's Belt
belt_white.description: The belt has slots for holding tools and attaching ropes while exploring.

shawl_white.name: Explorer's Shoulderpads
shawl_white.description: Provides basic protection without affecting upper body movements.

unid_armband_orange.description: Equipment crafted for the special ops team. Highly protective and mobile.

unid_pants_blue.description: A much improved version of its predecessor, with better materials and design.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

unid_shoes_blue.name: Falcon Combat Boots
unid_shoes_blue.description: The double shock-absorbing layers provide both comfort and durability.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

unid_helmet_blue.name: Falcon Combat Helmet
unid_helmet_blue.description: The sturdy material protects the wearer even in heavy gunfire.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

unid_glove_blue.name: Falcon Gloves
unid_glove_blue.description: The light polymer material doesn't take away the wearer's agility at all.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

unid_belt_blue.name: Falcon Belt
unid_belt_blue.description: Contains a micro-sensor to monitor the wearer's vital stats.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

unid_shawl_blue.name: Falcon Shoulderguards
unid_shawl_blue.description: An upgraded version of the vanguard spaulders that provides excellent defense.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 35.

unid_armband_green.name: Vanguard Bracers
unid_armband_green.description: Sacrifices a bit of mobility for better protection.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_cloth_green.name: Vanguard Suit
unid_cloth_green.description: No longer used by Hykros, but still a hot item on the black market.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_pants_green.name: Vanguard Legguards
unid_pants_green.description: The old version of Hykros's combat pants. The weakest link in the vanguard series.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_shoes_green.name: Vanguard Boots
unid_shoes_green.description: These old Hykros boots look great and do their job well.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_helmet_green.name: Vanguard Helmet
unid_helmet_green.description: A great helmet for protecting the wearer's head.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_glove_green.name: Vanguard Gloves
unid_glove_green.description: These gloves are controversial because they sacrifice mobility for protection.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_belt_green.name: Vanguard Belt
unid_belt_green.description: The buckle uses an older design that is durable but cannot be adjusted.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_shawl_green.name: Vanguard Spaulders
unid_shawl_green.description: Designed to be used in conjunction with the Vanguard Suit only, and focuses on protecting the wearer's upper arms.
source: Crack open password chests after Dimension level 20.

unid_armband_white.name: Explorer's Bracers
unid_armband_white.description: These bracers are made for adventuring, so they are lighter and thinner.

unid_cloth_white.name: Explorer's Uniform
unid_cloth_white.description: Lightweight leather armor worn by the shelter's exploration team.

unid_pants_white.name: Explorer's Pants
unid_pants_white.description: Not exactly the best-looking bottom, but durable and practical.

unid_shoes_white.name: Explorer's Boots
unid_shoes_white.description: These heavy and sturdy boots are specifically designed for the shelter's exploration team.

unid_glove_white.name: Explorer's Gloves
unid_glove_white.description: Additional padding makes it easier to respond to different situations in the wild.

unid_belt_white.name: Explorer's Belt
unid_belt_white.description: The belt has slots for holding tools and attaching ropes while exploring.

unid_shawl_white.name: Explorer's Shoulderpads
unid_shawl_white.description: Provides basic protection without affecting upper body movements.

unid_visor_blue.name: Falcon Tactics Eyepiece
unid_visor_blue.description: A tactics eyepiece manufactured by Banges Tech. Used to be a popular piece of civilian equipment.
source: Type III Key: Harrah password chest
Type III Key: Culton password chest

unid_core_orange.name: Fortress Combat Engine
unid_core_orange.description: The newest creation of Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with superior support.
source: Type III Key: Rudolph password chest
Type III Key: Magma password chest

unid_core_purple.name: Elite Combat Engine (Overload)
unid_core_purple.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. It has helped them in many difficult tasks.
source: Type III Key: Rudolph password chest
Type III Key: Magma password chest

unid_core_blue.name: Falcon Combat Engine
unid_core_blue.description: A combat engine manufactured by Banges Tech. Used to be a popular piece of civilian equipment.

unid_core_green.name: Vanguard Combat Engine
unid_core_green.description: The old version of Hykros's combat engine. It can still run steadily.

unid_visor_orange.name: Fortress Tactics Eyepiece
unid_visor_orange.description: The newest creation of Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with superior support.
source: Type III Key: Harrah password chest
Type III Key: Culton password chest

unid_visor_purple.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. It has helped them in many difficult tasks.

Type III Key: Culton password chest

unid_reactor_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor
unid_reactor_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides stat support. Get one of the following fortress microreactor types randomly: Overload, Erupt, Glaze, Arc.

unid_reactor_purple.name: Elite Microreactor
unid_reactor_purple.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities. Get one of the following elite microreactor types randomly: Overload, Erupt, Glaze, Arc.

unid_reactor_blue.name: Falcon Microreactor
unid_reactor_blue.description: Standard equipment for Vera surface exploration team members. Provides sufficient energy and keeps them ready for any mission. Get one of the following falcon microreactor types randomly: Overload, Erupt, Glaze, Arc.

unid_exoskeleton_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton
unid_exoskeleton_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides outstanding stat support. Randomly receive one of the following fortress exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.

unid_exoskeleton_purple.name: Elite Exoskeleton
unid_exoskeleton_purple.description: A standard micro-exoskeleton for District 7 Executors to combat Grayspace Entities. Randomly receive one of the following elite exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.
source: Type III Key: Eva password chest

unid_exoskeleton_blue.name: Falcon Exoskeleton
unid_exoskeleton_blue.description: Standard equipment for Vera surface exploration team members. Provides sufficient energy and keeps them ready for any mission. Randomly receive one of the following falcon exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.
source: Type III Key: Eva password chest
